2816 
2825  public function setBankAccount($fk_account, $notrigger = false, $userused = null)
2826  {
2827  global $user;
2828 
2829  if (empty($userused)) {
2830  $userused = $user;
2831  }
2832 
2833  $error = 0;
2834 
2835  if (!$this->table_element) {
2836  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setBankAccount was called on objet with property table_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
2837  return -1;
2838  }
2839  $this->db->begin();
2840 
2841  if ($fk_account < 0) {
2842  $fk_account = 'NULL';
2843  }
2844  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::setBankAccount('.$fk_account.')');
2845 
2846  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element;
2847  $sql .= " SET fk_account = ".((int) $fk_account);
2848  $sql .= " WHERE rowid=".((int) $this->id);
2849 
2850  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
2851  if (!$resql) {
2852  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::setBankAccount Error '.$sql.' - '.$this->db->error());
2853  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
2854  $error++;
2855  } else {
2856  if (!$notrigger) {
2857  // Call trigger
2858  $this->context = array('bankaccountupdate'=>1);
2859  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper(get_class($this)).'_MODIFY', $userused);
2860  if ($result < 0) {
2861  $error++;
2862  }
2863  // End call trigger
2864  }
2865  }
2866  if ($error) {
2867  $this->db->rollback();
2868  return -1;
2869  } else {
2870  $this->fk_account = ($fk_account == 'NULL') ?null:$fk_account;
2871  $this->db->commit();
2872  return 1;
2873  }
2874  }
2875 
2876 
2877  // TODO: Move line related operations to CommonObjectLine?
2878 
2879  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
2889  public function line_order($renum = false, $rowidorder = 'ASC', $fk_parent_line = true)
2890  {
2891  // phpcs:enable
2892  if (!$this->table_element_line) {
2893  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_order was called on objet with property table_element_line not defined", LOG_ERR);
2894  return -1;
2895  }
2896  if (!$this->fk_element) {
2897  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_order was called on objet with property fk_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
2898  return -1;
2899  }
2900 
2901  // Count number of lines to reorder (according to choice $renum)
2902  $nl = 0;
2903  $sql = "SELECT count(rowid) FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
2904  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
2905  if (!$renum) {
2906  $sql .= ' AND rang = 0';
2907  }
2908  if ($renum) {
2909  $sql .= ' AND rang <> 0';
2910  }
2911 
2912  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_order", LOG_DEBUG);
2913  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
2914  if ($resql) {
2915  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
2916  $nl = $row[0];
2917  } else {
2918  dol_print_error($this->db);
2919  }
2920  if ($nl > 0) {
2921  // The goal of this part is to reorder all lines, with all children lines sharing the same counter that parents.
2922  $rows = array();
2923 
2924  // We first search all lines that are parent lines (for multilevel details lines)
2925  $sql = "SELECT rowid FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
2926  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
2927  if ($fk_parent_line) {
2928  $sql .= ' AND fk_parent_line IS NULL';
2929  }
2930  $sql .= " ORDER BY rang ASC, rowid ".$rowidorder;
2931 
2932  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_order search all parent lines", LOG_DEBUG);
2933  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
2934  if ($resql) {
2935  $i = 0;
2936  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
2937  while ($i < $num) {
2938  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
2939  $rows[] = $row[0]; // Add parent line into array rows
2940  $childrens = $this->getChildrenOfLine($row[0]);
2941  if (!empty($childrens)) {
2942  foreach ($childrens as $child) {
2943  array_push($rows, $child);
2944  }
2945  }
2946  $i++;
2947  }
2948 
2949  // Now we set a new number for each lines (parent and children with children included into parent tree)
2950  if (!empty($rows)) {
2951  foreach ($rows as $key => $row) {
2952  $this->updateRangOfLine($row, ($key + 1));
2953  }
2954  }
2955  } else {
2956  dol_print_error($this->db);
2957  }
2958  }
2959  return 1;
2960  }
2961 
2969  public function getChildrenOfLine($id, $includealltree = 0)
2970  {
2971  $rows = array();
2972 
2973  $sql = "SELECT rowid FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
2974  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
2975  $sql .= ' AND fk_parent_line = '.((int) $id);
2976  $sql .= ' ORDER BY rang ASC';
2977 
2978  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::getChildrenOfLine search children lines for line ".$id, LOG_DEBUG);
2979  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
2980  if ($resql) {
2981  if ($this->db->num_rows($resql) > 0) {
2982  while ($row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql)) {
2983  $rows[] = $row[0];
2984  if (!empty($includealltree)) {
2985  $rows = array_merge($rows, $this->getChildrenOfLine($row[0]), $includealltree);
2986  }
2987  }
2988  }
2989  }
2990  return $rows;
2991  }
2992 
2993  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3001  public function line_up($rowid, $fk_parent_line = true)
3002  {
3003  // phpcs:enable
3004  $this->line_order(false, 'ASC', $fk_parent_line);
3005 
3006  // Get rang of line
3007  $rang = $this->getRangOfLine($rowid);
3008 
3009  // Update position of line
3010  $this->updateLineUp($rowid, $rang);
3011  }
3012 
3013  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3021  public function line_down($rowid, $fk_parent_line = true)
3022  {
3023  // phpcs:enable
3024  $this->line_order(false, 'ASC', $fk_parent_line);
3025 
3026  // Get rang of line
3027  $rang = $this->getRangOfLine($rowid);
3028 
3029  // Get max value for rang
3030  $max = $this->line_max();
3031 
3032  // Update position of line
3033  $this->updateLineDown($rowid, $rang, $max);
3034  }
3035 
3043  public function updateRangOfLine($rowid, $rang)
3044  {
3045  global $hookmanager;
3046  $fieldposition = 'rang'; // @todo Rename 'rang' into 'position'
3047  if (in_array($this->table_element_line, array('bom_bomline', 'ecm_files', 'emailcollector_emailcollectoraction'))) {
3048  $fieldposition = 'position';
3049  }
3050 
3051  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldposition." = ".((int) $rang);
3052  $sql .= ' WHERE rowid = '.((int) $rowid);
3053 
3054  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::updateRangOfLine", LOG_DEBUG);
3055  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
3056  dol_print_error($this->db);
3057  return -1;
3058  } else {
3059  $parameters=array('rowid'=>$rowid, 'rang'=>$rang, 'fieldposition' => $fieldposition);
3060  $action='';
3061  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('afterRankOfLineUpdate', $parameters, $this, $action);
3062  return 1;
3063  }
3064  }
3065 
3066  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3073  public function line_ajaxorder($rows)
3074  {
3075  // phpcs:enable
3076  $num = count($rows);
3077  for ($i = 0; $i < $num; $i++) {
3078  $this->updateRangOfLine($rows[$i], ($i + 1));
3079  }
3080  }
3081 
3089  public function updateLineUp($rowid, $rang)
3090  {
3091  if ($rang > 1) {
3092  $fieldposition = 'rang';
3093  if (in_array($this->table_element_line, array('ecm_files', 'emailcollector_emailcollectoraction'))) {
3094  $fieldposition = 'position';
3095  }
3096 
3097  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldposition." = ".((int) $rang);
3098  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3099  $sql .= ' AND rang = '.((int) ($rang - 1));
3100  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3101  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldposition." = ".((int) ($rang - 1));
3102  $sql .= ' WHERE rowid = '.((int) $rowid);
3103  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
3104  dol_print_error($this->db);
3105  }
3106  } else {
3107  dol_print_error($this->db);
3108  }
3109  }
3110  }
3111 
3120  public function updateLineDown($rowid, $rang, $max)
3121  {
3122  if ($rang < $max) {
3123  $fieldposition = 'rang';
3124  if (in_array($this->table_element_line, array('ecm_files', 'emailcollector_emailcollectoraction'))) {
3125  $fieldposition = 'position';
3126  }
3127 
3128  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldposition." = ".((int) $rang);
3129  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3130  $sql .= ' AND rang = '.((int) ($rang + 1));
3131  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3132  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldposition." = ".((int) ($rang + 1));
3133  $sql .= ' WHERE rowid = '.((int) $rowid);
3134  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
3135  dol_print_error($this->db);
3136  }
3137  } else {
3138  dol_print_error($this->db);
3139  }
3140  }
3141  }
3142 
3149  public function getRangOfLine($rowid)
3150  {
3151  $sql = "SELECT rang FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
3152  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $rowid);
3153 
3154  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::getRangOfLine", LOG_DEBUG);
3155  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3156  if ($resql) {
3157  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
3158  return $row[0];
3159  }
3160  }
3161 
3168  public function getIdOfLine($rang)
3169  {
3170  $sql = "SELECT rowid FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
3171  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3172  $sql .= " AND rang = ".((int) $rang);
3173  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3174  if ($resql) {
3175  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
3176  return $row[0];
3177  }
3178  }
3179 
3180  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3187  public function line_max($fk_parent_line = 0)
3188  {
3189  // phpcs:enable
3190  $positionfield = 'rang';
3191  if ($this->table_element == 'bom_bom') {
3192  $positionfield = 'position';
3193  }
3194 
3195  // Search the last rang with fk_parent_line
3196  if ($fk_parent_line) {
3197  $sql = "SELECT max(".$positionfield.") FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
3198  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3199  $sql .= " AND fk_parent_line = ".((int) $fk_parent_line);
3200 
3201  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_max", LOG_DEBUG);
3202  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3203  if ($resql) {
3204  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
3205  if (!empty($row[0])) {
3206  return $row[0];
3207  } else {
3208  return $this->getRangOfLine($fk_parent_line);
3209  }
3210  }
3211  } else {
3212  // If not, search the last rang of element
3213  $sql = "SELECT max(".$positionfield.") FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
3214  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3215 
3216  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_max", LOG_DEBUG);
3217  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3218  if ($resql) {
3219  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
3220  return $row[0];
3221  }
3222  }
3223  }
3224 
3225  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3232  public function update_ref_ext($ref_ext)
3233  {
3234  // phpcs:enable
3235  if (!$this->table_element) {
3236  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_ref_ext was called on objet with property table_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
3237  return -1;
3238  }
3239 
3240  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element;
3241  $sql .= " SET ref_ext = '".$this->db->escape($ref_ext)."'";
3242  $sql .= " WHERE ".(isset($this->table_rowid) ? $this->table_rowid : 'rowid')." = ".((int) $this->id);
3243 
3244  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_ref_ext", LOG_DEBUG);
3245  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3246  $this->ref_ext = $ref_ext;
3247  return 1;
3248  } else {
3249  $this->error = $this->db->error();
3250  return -1;
3251  }
3252  }
3253 
3254  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3262  public function update_note($note, $suffix = '')
3263  {
3264  // phpcs:enable
3265  global $user;
3266 
3267  if (!$this->table_element) {
3268  $this->error = 'update_note was called on objet with property table_element not defined';
3269  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_note was called on objet with property table_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
3270  return -1;
3271  }
3272  if (!in_array($suffix, array('', '_public', '_private'))) {
3273  $this->error = 'update_note Parameter suffix must be empty, \'_private\' or \'_public\'';
3274  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_note Parameter suffix must be empty, '_private' or '_public'", LOG_ERR);
3275  return -2;
3276  }
3277 
3278  $newsuffix = $suffix;
3279 
3280  // Special cas
3281  if ($this->table_element == 'product' && $newsuffix == '_private') {
3282  $newsuffix = '';
3283  }
3284  if (in_array($this->table_element, array('actioncomm', 'adherent', 'advtargetemailing', 'cronjob', 'establishment'))) {
3285  $fieldusermod = "fk_user_mod";
3286  } elseif ($this->table_element == 'ecm_files') {
3287  $fieldusermod = "fk_user_m";
3288  } else {
3289  $fieldusermod = "fk_user_modif";
3290  }
3291  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element;
3292  $sql .= " SET note".$newsuffix." = ".(!empty($note) ? ("'".$this->db->escape($note)."'") : "NULL");
3293  $sql .= ", ".$fieldusermod." = ".((int) $user->id);
3294  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
3295 
3296  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_note", LOG_DEBUG);
3297  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3298  if ($suffix == '_public') {
3299  $this->note_public = $note;
3300  } elseif ($suffix == '_private') {
3301  $this->note_private = $note;
3302  } else {
3303  $this->note = $note; // deprecated
3304  $this->note_private = $note;
3305  }
3306  return 1;
3307  } else {
3308  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
3309  return -1;
3310  }
3311  }
3312 
3313  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3322  public function update_note_public($note)
3323  {
3324  // phpcs:enable
3325  return $this->update_note($note, '_public');
3326  }
3327 
3328  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3339  public function update_price($exclspec = 0, $roundingadjust = 'none', $nodatabaseupdate = 0, $seller = null)
3340  {
3341  // phpcs:enable
3342  global $conf, $hookmanager, $action;
3343 
3344  $parameters = array('exclspec' => $exclspec, 'roundingadjust' => $roundingadjust, 'nodatabaseupdate' => $nodatabaseupdate, 'seller' => $seller);
3345  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('updateTotalPrice', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
3346  if ($reshook > 0) {
3347  return 1; // replacement code
3348  } elseif ($reshook < 0) {
3349  return -1; // failure
3350  } // reshook = 0 => execute normal code
3351 
3352  // Some external module want no update price after a trigger because they have another method to calculate the total (ex: with an extrafield)
3353  $MODULE = "";
3354  if ($this->element == 'propal') {
3355  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_PROPOSAL";
3356  } elseif ($this->element == 'commande' || $this->element == 'order') {
3357  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_ORDER";
3358  } elseif ($this->element == 'facture' || $this->element == 'invoice') {
3359  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_INVOICE";
3360  } elseif ($this->element == 'facture_fourn' || $this->element == 'supplier_invoice' || $this->element == 'invoice_supplier') {
3361  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_SUPPLIER_INVOICE";
3362  } elseif ($this->element == 'order_supplier' || $this->element == 'supplier_order') {
3363  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_SUPPLIER_ORDER";
3364  } elseif ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal') {
3365  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL";
3366  }
3367 
3368  if (!empty($MODULE)) {
3369  if (!empty($conf->global->$MODULE)) {
3370  $modsactivated = explode(',', $conf->global->$MODULE);
3371  foreach ($modsactivated as $mod) {
3372  if ($conf->$mod->enabled) {
3373  return 1; // update was disabled by specific setup
3374  }
3375  }
3376  }
3377  }
3378 
3379  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/price.lib.php';
3380 
3381  if ($roundingadjust == '-1') {
3382  $roundingadjust = 'auto'; // For backward compatibility
3383  }
3384 
3385  $forcedroundingmode = $roundingadjust;
3386  if ($forcedroundingmode == 'auto' && isset($conf->global->MAIN_ROUNDOFTOTAL_NOT_TOTALOFROUND)) {
3387  $forcedroundingmode = $conf->global->MAIN_ROUNDOFTOTAL_NOT_TOTALOFROUND;
3388  } elseif ($forcedroundingmode == 'auto') {
3389  $forcedroundingmode = '0';
3390  }
3391 
3392  $error = 0;
3393 
3394  $multicurrency_tx = !empty($this->multicurrency_tx) ? $this->multicurrency_tx : 1;
3395 
3396  // Define constants to find lines to sum
3397  $fieldtva = 'total_tva';
3398  $fieldlocaltax1 = 'total_localtax1';
3399  $fieldlocaltax2 = 'total_localtax2';
3400  $fieldup = 'subprice';
3401  if ($this->element == 'facture_fourn' || $this->element == 'invoice_supplier') {
3402  $fieldtva = 'tva';
3403  $fieldup = 'pu_ht';
3404  }
3405  if ($this->element == 'expensereport') {
3406  $fieldup = 'value_unit';
3407  }
3408 
3409  $sql = "SELECT rowid, qty, ".$fieldup." as up, remise_percent, total_ht, ".$fieldtva." as total_tva, total_ttc, ".$fieldlocaltax1." as total_localtax1, ".$fieldlocaltax2." as total_localtax2,";
3410  $sql .= ' tva_tx as vatrate, localtax1_tx, localtax2_tx, localtax1_type, localtax2_type, info_bits, product_type';
3411  if ($this->table_element_line == 'facturedet') {
3412  $sql .= ', situation_percent';
3413  }
3414  $sql .= ', multicurrency_total_ht, multicurrency_total_tva, multicurrency_total_ttc';
3415  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
3416  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3417  if ($exclspec) {
3418  $product_field = 'product_type';
3419  if ($this->table_element_line == 'contratdet') {
3420  $product_field = ''; // contratdet table has no product_type field
3421  }
3422  if ($product_field) {
3423  $sql .= " AND ".$product_field." <> 9";
3424  }
3425  }
3426  $sql .= ' ORDER by rowid'; // We want to be sure to always use same order of line to not change lines differently when option MAIN_ROUNDOFTOTAL_NOT_TOTALOFROUND is used
3427 
3428  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_price", LOG_DEBUG);
3429  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3430  if ($resql) {
3431  $this->total_ht = 0;
3432  $this->total_tva = 0;
3433  $this->total_localtax1 = 0;
3434  $this->total_localtax2 = 0;
3435  $this->total_ttc = 0;
3436  $total_ht_by_vats = array();
3437  $total_tva_by_vats = array();
3438  $total_ttc_by_vats = array();
3439  $this->multicurrency_total_ht = 0;
3440  $this->multicurrency_total_tva = 0;
3441  $this->multicurrency_total_ttc = 0;
3442 
3443  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3444  $i = 0;
3445  while ($i < $num) {
3446  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3447 
3448  // Note: There is no check on detail line and no check on total, if $forcedroundingmode = 'none'
3449  $parameters = array('fk_element' => $obj->rowid);
3450  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('changeRoundingMode', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
3451 
3452  if (empty($reshook) && $forcedroundingmode == '0') { // Check if data on line are consistent. This may solve lines that were not consistent because set with $forcedroundingmode='auto'
3453  // This part of code is to fix data. We should not call it too often.
3454  $localtax_array = array($obj->localtax1_type, $obj->localtax1_tx, $obj->localtax2_type, $obj->localtax2_tx);
3455  $tmpcal = calcul_price_total($obj->qty, $obj->up, $obj->remise_percent, $obj->vatrate, $obj->localtax1_tx, $obj->localtax2_tx, 0, 'HT', $obj->info_bits, $obj->product_type, $seller, $localtax_array, (isset($obj->situation_percent) ? $obj->situation_percent : 100), $multicurrency_tx);
3456 
3457  $diff_when_using_price_ht = price2num($tmpcal[1] - $obj->total_tva, 'MT', 1); // If price was set with tax price adn unit price HT has a low number of digits, then we may have a diff on recalculation from unit price HT.
3458  $diff_on_current_total = price2num($obj->total_ttc - $obj->total_ht - $obj->total_tva - $obj->total_localtax1 - $obj->total_localtax2, 'MT', 1);
3459  //var_dump($obj->total_ht.' '.$obj->total_tva.' '.$obj->total_localtax1.' '.$obj->total_localtax2.' =? '.$obj->total_ttc);
3460  //var_dump($diff_when_using_price_ht.' '.$diff_on_current_total);
3461 
3462  if ($diff_when_using_price_ht && $diff_on_current_total) {
3463  $sqlfix = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldtva." = ".price2num((float) $tmpcal[1]).", total_ttc = ".price2num((float) $tmpcal[2])." WHERE rowid = ".((int) $obj->rowid);
3464  dol_syslog('We found unconsistent data into detailed line (diff_when_using_price_ht = '.$diff_when_using_price_ht.' and diff_on_current_total = '.$diff_on_current_total.') for line rowid = '.$obj->rowid." (total vat of line calculated=".$tmpcal[1].", database=".$obj->total_tva."). We fix the total_vat and total_ttc of line by running sqlfix = ".$sqlfix, LOG_WARNING);
3465  $resqlfix = $this->db->query($sqlfix);
3466  if (!$resqlfix) {
3467  dol_print_error($this->db, 'Failed to update line');
3468  }
3469  $obj->total_tva = $tmpcal[1];
3470  $obj->total_ttc = $tmpcal[2];
3471  }
3472  }
3473 
3474  $this->total_ht += $obj->total_ht; // The field visible at end of line detail
3475  $this->total_tva += $obj->total_tva;
3476  $this->total_localtax1 += $obj->total_localtax1;
3477  $this->total_localtax2 += $obj->total_localtax2;
3478  $this->total_ttc += $obj->total_ttc;
3479  $this->multicurrency_total_ht += $obj->multicurrency_total_ht; // The field visible at end of line detail
3480  $this->multicurrency_total_tva += $obj->multicurrency_total_tva;
3481  $this->multicurrency_total_ttc += $obj->multicurrency_total_ttc;
3482 
3483  if (!isset($total_ht_by_vats[$obj->vatrate])) {
3484  $total_ht_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] = 0;
3485  }
3486  if (!isset($total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate])) {
3487  $total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] = 0;
3488  }
3489  if (!isset($total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate])) {
3490  $total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] = 0;
3491  }
3492  $total_ht_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] += $obj->total_ht;
3493  $total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] += $obj->total_tva;
3494  $total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] += $obj->total_ttc;
3495 
3496  if ($forcedroundingmode == '1') { // Check if we need adjustement onto line for vat. TODO This works on the company currency but not on multicurrency
3497  $tmpvat = price2num($total_ht_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] * $obj->vatrate / 100, 'MT', 1);
3498  $diff = price2num($total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] - $tmpvat, 'MT', 1);
3499  //print 'Line '.$i.' rowid='.$obj->rowid.' vat_rate='.$obj->vatrate.' total_ht='.$obj->total_ht.' total_tva='.$obj->total_tva.' total_ttc='.$obj->total_ttc.' total_ht_by_vats='.$total_ht_by_vats[$obj->vatrate].' total_tva_by_vats='.$total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate].' (new calculation = '.$tmpvat.') total_ttc_by_vats='.$total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate].($diff?" => DIFF":"")."<br>\n";
3500  if ($diff) {
3501  if (abs($diff) > 0.1) {
3502  $errmsg = 'A rounding difference was detected into TOTAL but is too high to be corrected. Some data in your line may be corrupted. Try to edit each line manually.';
3503  dol_syslog($errmsg, LOG_WARNING);
3504  dol_print_error('', $errmsg);
3505  exit;
3506  }
3507  $sqlfix = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldtva." = ".price2num($obj->total_tva - $diff).", total_ttc = ".price2num($obj->total_ttc - $diff)." WHERE rowid = ".((int) $obj->rowid);
3508  dol_syslog('We found a difference of '.$diff.' for line rowid = '.$obj->rowid.". We fix the total_vat and total_ttc of line by running sqlfix = ".$sqlfix);
3509  $resqlfix = $this->db->query($sqlfix);
3510  if (!$resqlfix) {
3511  dol_print_error($this->db, 'Failed to update line');
3512  }
3513  $this->total_tva -= $diff;
3514  $this->total_ttc -= $diff;
3515  $total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] -= $diff;
3516  $total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] -= $diff;
3517  }
3518  }
3519 
3520  $i++;
3521  }
3522 
3523  // Add revenue stamp to total
3524  $this->total_ttc += isset($this->revenuestamp) ? $this->revenuestamp : 0;
3525  $this->multicurrency_total_ttc += isset($this->revenuestamp) ? ($this->revenuestamp * $multicurrency_tx) : 0;
3526 
3527  // Situations totals
3528  if (!empty($this->situation_cycle_ref) && $this->situation_counter > 1 && method_exists($this, 'get_prev_sits') && $this->type != $this::TYPE_CREDIT_NOTE) {
3529  $prev_sits = $this->get_prev_sits();
3530 
3531  foreach ($prev_sits as $sit) { // $sit is an object Facture loaded with a fetch.
3532  $this->total_ht -= $sit->total_ht;
3533  $this->total_tva -= $sit->total_tva;
3534  $this->total_localtax1 -= $sit->total_localtax1;
3535  $this->total_localtax2 -= $sit->total_localtax2;
3536  $this->total_ttc -= $sit->total_ttc;
3537  $this->multicurrency_total_ht -= $sit->multicurrency_total_ht;
3538  $this->multicurrency_total_tva -= $sit->multicurrency_total_tva;
3539  $this->multicurrency_total_ttc -= $sit->multicurrency_total_ttc;
3540  }
3541  }
3542 
3543  $this->db->free($resql);
3544 
3545  // Now update global field total_ht, total_ttc, total_tva, total_localtax1, total_localtax2, multicurrency_total_*
3546  $fieldht = 'total_ht';
3547  $fieldtva = 'tva';
3548  $fieldlocaltax1 = 'localtax1';
3549  $fieldlocaltax2 = 'localtax2';
3550  $fieldttc = 'total_ttc';
3551  // Specific code for backward compatibility with old field names
3552  if ($this->element == 'facture' || $this->element == 'facturerec') {
3553  $fieldtva = 'total_tva';
3554  }
3555  if ($this->element == 'facture_fourn' || $this->element == 'invoice_supplier') {
3556  $fieldtva = 'total_tva';
3557  }
3558  if ($this->element == 'propal') {
3559  $fieldtva = 'total_tva';
3560  }
3561  if ($this->element == 'expensereport') {
3562  $fieldtva = 'total_tva';
3563  }
3564  if ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal') {
3565  $fieldtva = 'total_tva';
3566  }
3567  if ($this->element == 'commande') {
3568  $fieldtva = 'total_tva';
3569  }
3570  if ($this->element == 'order_supplier') {
3571  $fieldtva = 'total_tva';
3572  }
3573 
3574  if (empty($nodatabaseupdate)) {
3575  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element.' SET';
3576  $sql .= " ".$fieldht." = ".((float) price2num($this->total_ht)).",";
3577  $sql .= " ".$fieldtva." = ".((float) price2num($this->total_tva)).",";
3578  $sql .= " ".$fieldlocaltax1." = ".((float) price2num($this->total_localtax1)).",";
3579  $sql .= " ".$fieldlocaltax2." = ".((float) price2num($this->total_localtax2)).",";
3580  $sql .= " ".$fieldttc." = ".((float) price2num($this->total_ttc));
3581  $sql .= ", multicurrency_total_ht = ".((float) price2num($this->multicurrency_total_ht, 'MT', 1));
3582  $sql .= ", multicurrency_total_tva = ".((float) price2num($this->multicurrency_total_tva, 'MT', 1));
3583  $sql .= ", multicurrency_total_ttc = ".((float) price2num($this->multicurrency_total_ttc, 'MT', 1));
3584  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
3585 
3586  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_price", LOG_DEBUG);
3587  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3588 
3589  if (!$resql) {
3590  $error++;
3591  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
3592  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
3593  }
3594  }
3595 
3596  if (!$error) {
3597  return 1;
3598  } else {
3599  return -1;
3600  }
3601  } else {
3602  dol_print_error($this->db, 'Bad request in update_price');
3603  return -1;
3604  }
3605  }
3606 
3607  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3618  public function add_object_linked($origin = null, $origin_id = null, $f_user = null, $notrigger = 0)
3619  {
3620  // phpcs:enable
3621  global $user, $hookmanager, $action;
3622  $origin = (!empty($origin) ? $origin : $this->origin);
3623  $origin_id = (!empty($origin_id) ? $origin_id : $this->origin_id);
3624  $f_user = isset($f_user) ? $f_user : $user;
3625 
3626  // Special case
3627  if ($origin == 'order') {
3628  $origin = 'commande';
3629  }
3630  if ($origin == 'invoice') {
3631  $origin = 'facture';
3632  }
3633  if ($origin == 'invoice_template') {
3634  $origin = 'facturerec';
3635  }
3636  if ($origin == 'supplierorder') {
3637  $origin = 'order_supplier';
3638  }
3639 
3640  // Elements of the core modules which have `$module` property but may to which we don't want to prefix module part to the element name for finding the linked object in llx_element_element.
3641  // It's because an entry for this element may be exist in llx_element_element before this modification (version <=14.2) and ave named only with their element name in fk_source or fk_target.
3642  $coremodule = array('knowledgemanagement', 'partnership', 'workstation', 'ticket', 'recruitment', 'eventorganization');
3643  // Add module part to target type if object has $module property and isn't in core modules.
3644  $targettype = ((!empty($this->module) && ! in_array($this->module, $coremodule)) ? $this->module.'_' : '').$this->element;
3645 
3646  $parameters = array('targettype'=>$targettype);
3647  // Hook for explicitly set the targettype if it must be differtent than $this->element
3648  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('setLinkedObjectSourceTargetType', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
3649  if ($reshook > 0) {
3650  if (!empty($hookmanager->resArray['targettype'])) $targettype = $hookmanager->resArray['targettype'];
3651  }
3652 
3653  $this->db->begin();
3654  $error = 0;
3655 
3656  $sql = "INSERT INTO " . MAIN_DB_PREFIX . "element_element (";
3657  $sql .= "fk_source";
3658  $sql .= ", sourcetype";
3659  $sql .= ", fk_target";
3660  $sql .= ", targettype";
3661  $sql .= ") VALUES (";
3662  $sql .= ((int) $origin_id);
3663  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($origin) . "'";
3664  $sql .= ", " . ((int) $this->id);
3665  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($targettype) . "'";
3666  $sql .= ")";
3667 
3668  dol_syslog(get_class($this) . "::add_object_linked", LOG_DEBUG);
3669  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3670  if (!$notrigger) {
3671  // Call trigger
3672  $this->context['link_origin'] = $origin;
3673  $this->context['link_origin_id'] = $origin_id;
3674  $result = $this->call_trigger('OBJECT_LINK_INSERT', $f_user);
3675  if ($result < 0) {
3676  $error++;
3677  }
3678  // End call triggers
3679  }
3680  } else {
3681  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
3682  $error++;
3683  }
3684 
3685  if (!$error) {
3686  $this->db->commit();
3687  return 1;
3688  } else {
3689  $this->db->rollback();
3690  return 0;
3691  }
3692  }
3693 
3716  public function fetchObjectLinked($sourceid = null, $sourcetype = '', $targetid = null, $targettype = '', $clause = 'OR', $alsosametype = 1, $orderby = 'sourcetype', $loadalsoobjects = 1)
3717  {
3718  global $conf, $hookmanager, $action;
3719 
3720  $this->linkedObjectsIds = array();
3721  $this->linkedObjects = array();
3722 
3723  $justsource = false;
3724  $justtarget = false;
3725  $withtargettype = false;
3726  $withsourcetype = false;
3727 
3728  $parameters = array('sourcetype'=>$sourcetype, 'sourceid'=>$sourceid, 'targettype'=>$targettype, 'targetid'=>$targetid);
3729  // Hook for explicitly set the targettype if it must be differtent than $this->element
3730  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('setLinkedObjectSourceTargetType', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
3731  if ($reshook > 0) {
3732  if (!empty($hookmanager->resArray['sourcetype'])) $sourcetype = $hookmanager->resArray['sourcetype'];
3733  if (!empty($hookmanager->resArray['sourceid'])) $sourceid = $hookmanager->resArray['sourceid'];
3734  if (!empty($hookmanager->resArray['targettype'])) $targettype = $hookmanager->resArray['targettype'];
3735  if (!empty($hookmanager->resArray['targetid'])) $targetid = $hookmanager->resArray['targetid'];
3736  }
3737 
3738  if (!empty($sourceid) && !empty($sourcetype) && empty($targetid)) {
3739  $justsource = true; // the source (id and type) is a search criteria
3740  if (!empty($targettype)) {
3741  $withtargettype = true;
3742  }
3743  }
3744  if (!empty($targetid) && !empty($targettype) && empty($sourceid)) {
3745  $justtarget = true; // the target (id and type) is a search criteria
3746  if (!empty($sourcetype)) {
3747  $withsourcetype = true;
3748  }
3749  }
3750 
3751  $sourceid = (!empty($sourceid) ? $sourceid : $this->id);
3752  $targetid = (!empty($targetid) ? $targetid : $this->id);
3753  $sourcetype = (!empty($sourcetype) ? $sourcetype : $this->element);
3754  $targettype = (!empty($targettype) ? $targettype : $this->element);
3755 
3756  /*if (empty($sourceid) && empty($targetid))
3757  {
3758  dol_syslog('Bad usage of function. No source nor target id defined (nor as parameter nor as object id)', LOG_ERR);
3759  return -1;
3760  }*/
3761 
3762  // Links between objects are stored in table element_element
3763  $sql = 'SELECT rowid, fk_source, sourcetype, fk_target, targettype';
3764  $sql .= ' FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'element_element';
3765  $sql .= " WHERE ";
3766  if ($justsource || $justtarget) {
3767  if ($justsource) {
3768  $sql .= "fk_source = ".((int) $sourceid)." AND sourcetype = '".$this->db->escape($sourcetype)."'";
3769  if ($withtargettype) {
3770  $sql .= " AND targettype = '".$this->db->escape($targettype)."'";
3771  }
3772  } elseif ($justtarget) {
3773  $sql .= "fk_target = ".((int) $targetid)." AND targettype = '".$this->db->escape($targettype)."'";
3774  if ($withsourcetype) {
3775  $sql .= " AND sourcetype = '".$this->db->escape($sourcetype)."'";
3776  }
3777  }
3778  } else {
3779  $sql .= "(fk_source = ".((int) $sourceid)." AND sourcetype = '".$this->db->escape($sourcetype)."')";
3780  $sql .= " ".$clause." (fk_target = ".((int) $targetid)." AND targettype = '".$this->db->escape($targettype)."')";
3781  }
3782  $sql .= ' ORDER BY '.$orderby;
3783 
3784  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::fetchObjectLink", LOG_DEBUG);
3785  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3786  if ($resql) {
3787  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3788  $i = 0;
3789  while ($i < $num) {
3790  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3791  if ($justsource || $justtarget) {
3792  if ($justsource) {
3793  $this->linkedObjectsIds[$obj->targettype][$obj->rowid] = $obj->fk_target;
3794  } elseif ($justtarget) {
3795  $this->linkedObjectsIds[$obj->sourcetype][$obj->rowid] = $obj->fk_source;
3796  }
3797  } else {
3798  if ($obj->fk_source == $sourceid && $obj->sourcetype == $sourcetype) {
3799  $this->linkedObjectsIds[$obj->targettype][$obj->rowid] = $obj->fk_target;
3800  }
3801  if ($obj->fk_target == $targetid && $obj->targettype == $targettype) {
3802  $this->linkedObjectsIds[$obj->sourcetype][$obj->rowid] = $obj->fk_source;
3803  }
3804  }
3805  $i++;
3806  }
3807 
3808  if (!empty($this->linkedObjectsIds)) {
3809  $tmparray = $this->linkedObjectsIds;
3810  foreach ($tmparray as $objecttype => $objectids) { // $objecttype is a module name ('facture', 'mymodule', ...) or a module name with a suffix ('project_task', 'mymodule_myobj', ...)
3811  // Parse element/subelement (ex: project_task, cabinetmed_consultation, ...)
3812  $module = $element = $subelement = $objecttype;
3813  $regs = array();
3814  if ($objecttype != 'supplier_proposal' && $objecttype != 'order_supplier' && $objecttype != 'invoice_supplier'
3815  && preg_match('/^([^_]+)_([^_]+)/i', $objecttype, $regs)) {
3816  $module = $element = $regs[1];
3817  $subelement = $regs[2];
3818  }
3819 
3820  $classpath = $element.'/class';
3821  // To work with non standard classpath or module name
3822  if ($objecttype == 'facture') {
3823  $classpath = 'compta/facture/class';
3824  } elseif ($objecttype == 'facturerec') {
3825  $classpath = 'compta/facture/class';
3826  $module = 'facture';
3827  } elseif ($objecttype == 'propal') {
3828  $classpath = 'comm/propal/class';
3829  } elseif ($objecttype == 'supplier_proposal') {
3830  $classpath = 'supplier_proposal/class';
3831  } elseif ($objecttype == 'shipping') {
3832  $classpath = 'expedition/class';
3833  $subelement = 'expedition';
3834  $module = 'expedition_bon';
3835  } elseif ($objecttype == 'delivery') {
3836  $classpath = 'delivery/class';
3837  $subelement = 'delivery';
3838  $module = 'delivery_note';
3839  } elseif ($objecttype == 'invoice_supplier' || $objecttype == 'order_supplier') {
3840  $classpath = 'fourn/class';
3841  $module = 'fournisseur';
3842  } elseif ($objecttype == 'fichinter') {
3843  $classpath = 'fichinter/class';
3844  $subelement = 'fichinter';
3845  $module = 'ficheinter';
3846  } elseif ($objecttype == 'subscription') {
3847  $classpath = 'adherents/class';
3848  $module = 'adherent';
3849  } elseif ($objecttype == 'contact') {
3850  $module = 'societe';
3851  }
3852  // Set classfile
3853  $classfile = strtolower($subelement);
3854  $classname = ucfirst($subelement);
3855 
3856  if ($objecttype == 'order') {
3857  $classfile = 'commande';
3858  $classname = 'Commande';
3859  } elseif ($objecttype == 'invoice_supplier') {
3860  $classfile = 'fournisseur.facture';
3861  $classname = 'FactureFournisseur';
3862  } elseif ($objecttype == 'order_supplier') {
3863  $classfile = 'fournisseur.commande';
3864  $classname = 'CommandeFournisseur';
3865  } elseif ($objecttype == 'supplier_proposal') {
3866  $classfile = 'supplier_proposal';
3867  $classname = 'SupplierProposal';
3868  } elseif ($objecttype == 'facturerec') {
3869  $classfile = 'facture-rec';
3870  $classname = 'FactureRec';
3871  } elseif ($objecttype == 'subscription') {
3872  $classfile = 'subscription';
3873  $classname = 'Subscription';
3874  } elseif ($objecttype == 'project' || $objecttype == 'projet') {
3875  $classpath = 'projet/class';
3876  $classfile = 'project';
3877  $classname = 'Project';
3878  } elseif ($objecttype == 'conferenceorboothattendee') {
3879  $classpath = 'eventorganization/class';
3880  $classfile = 'conferenceorboothattendee';
3881  $classname = 'ConferenceOrBoothAttendee';
3882  $module = 'eventorganization';
3883  } elseif ($objecttype == 'conferenceorbooth') {
3884  $classpath = 'eventorganization/class';
3885  $classfile = 'conferenceorbooth';
3886  $classname = 'ConferenceOrBooth';
3887  $module = 'eventorganization';
3888  } elseif ($objecttype == 'mo') {
3889  $classpath = 'mrp/class';
3890  $classfile = 'mo';
3891  $classname = 'Mo';
3892  $module = 'mrp';
3893  }
3894 
3895 
3896  // Here $module, $classfile and $classname are set
3897  if ($conf->$module->enabled && (($element != $this->element) || $alsosametype)) {
3898  if ($loadalsoobjects) {
3899  dol_include_once('/'.$classpath.'/'.$classfile.'.class.php');
3900  //print '/'.$classpath.'/'.$classfile.'.class.php '.class_exists($classname);
3901  if (class_exists($classname)) {
3902  foreach ($objectids as $i => $objectid) { // $i is rowid into llx_element_element
3903  $object = new $classname($this->db);
3904  $ret = $object->fetch($objectid);
3905  if ($ret >= 0) {
3906  $this->linkedObjects[$objecttype][$i] = $object;
3907  }
3908  }
3909  }
3910  }
3911  } else {
3912  unset($this->linkedObjectsIds[$objecttype]);
3913  }
3914  }
3915  }
3916  return 1;
3917  } else {
3918  dol_print_error($this->db);
3919  return -1;
3920  }
3921  }
3922 
3935  public function updateObjectLinked($sourceid = null, $sourcetype = '', $targetid = null, $targettype = '', $f_user = null, $notrigger = 0)
3936  {
3937  global $user;
3938  $updatesource = false;
3939  $updatetarget = false;
3940  $f_user = isset($f_user) ? $f_user : $user;
3941 
3942  if (!empty($sourceid) && !empty($sourcetype) && empty($targetid) && empty($targettype)) {
3943  $updatesource = true;
3944  } elseif (empty($sourceid) && empty($sourcetype) && !empty($targetid) && !empty($targettype)) {
3945  $updatetarget = true;
3946  }
3947 
3948  $this->db->begin();
3949  $error = 0;
3950 
3951  $sql = "UPDATE " . MAIN_DB_PREFIX . "element_element SET ";
3952  if ($updatesource) {
3953  $sql .= "fk_source = " . ((int) $sourceid);
3954  $sql .= ", sourcetype = '" . $this->db->escape($sourcetype) . "'";
3955  $sql .= " WHERE fk_target = " . ((int) $this->id);
3956  $sql .= " AND targettype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "'";
3957  } elseif ($updatetarget) {
3958  $sql .= "fk_target = " . ((int) $targetid);
3959  $sql .= ", targettype = '" . $this->db->escape($targettype) . "'";
3960  $sql .= " WHERE fk_source = " . ((int) $this->id);
3961  $sql .= " AND sourcetype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "'";
3962  }
3963 
3964  dol_syslog(get_class($this) . "::updateObjectLinked", LOG_DEBUG);
3965  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3966  if (!$notrigger) {
3967  // Call trigger
3968  $this->context['link_source_id'] = $sourceid;
3969  $this->context['link_source_type'] = $sourcetype;
3970  $this->context['link_target_id'] = $targetid;
3971  $this->context['link_target_type'] = $targettype;
3972  $result = $this->call_trigger('OBJECT_LINK_UPDATE', $f_user);
3973  if ($result < 0) {
3974  $error++;
3975  }
3976  // End call triggers
3977  }
3978  } else {
3979  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
3980  $error++;
3981  }
3982 
3983  if (!$error) {
3984  $this->db->commit();
3985  return 1;
3986  } else {
3987  $this->db->rollback();
3988  return -1;
3989  }
3990  }
3991 
4005  public function deleteObjectLinked($sourceid = null, $sourcetype = '', $targetid = null, $targettype = '', $rowid = '', $f_user = null, $notrigger = 0)
4006  {
4007  global $user;
4008  $deletesource = false;
4009  $deletetarget = false;
4010  $f_user = isset($f_user) ? $f_user : $user;
4011 
4012  if (!empty($sourceid) && !empty($sourcetype) && empty($targetid) && empty($targettype)) {
4013  $deletesource = true;
4014  } elseif (empty($sourceid) && empty($sourcetype) && !empty($targetid) && !empty($targettype)) {
4015  $deletetarget = true;
4016  }
4017 
4018  $sourceid = (!empty($sourceid) ? $sourceid : $this->id);
4019  $sourcetype = (!empty($sourcetype) ? $sourcetype : $this->element);
4020  $targetid = (!empty($targetid) ? $targetid : $this->id);
4021  $targettype = (!empty($targettype) ? $targettype : $this->element);
4022  $this->db->begin();
4023  $error = 0;
4024 
4025  if (!$notrigger) {
4026  // Call trigger
4027  $this->context['link_id'] = $rowid;
4028  $this->context['link_source_id'] = $sourceid;
4029  $this->context['link_source_type'] = $sourcetype;
4030  $this->context['link_target_id'] = $targetid;
4031  $this->context['link_target_type'] = $targettype;
4032  $result = $this->call_trigger('OBJECT_LINK_DELETE', $f_user);
4033  if ($result < 0) {
4034  $error++;
4035  }
4036  // End call triggers
4037  }
4038 
4039  if (!$error) {
4040  $sql = "DELETE FROM " . MAIN_DB_PREFIX . "element_element";
4041  $sql .= " WHERE";
4042  if ($rowid > 0) {
4043  $sql .= " rowid = " . ((int) $rowid);
4044  } else {
4045  if ($deletesource) {
4046  $sql .= " fk_source = " . ((int) $sourceid) . " AND sourcetype = '" . $this->db->escape($sourcetype) . "'";
4047  $sql .= " AND fk_target = " . ((int) $this->id) . " AND targettype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "'";
4048  } elseif ($deletetarget) {
4049  $sql .= " fk_target = " . ((int) $targetid) . " AND targettype = '" . $this->db->escape($targettype) . "'";
4050  $sql .= " AND fk_source = " . ((int) $this->id) . " AND sourcetype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "'";
4051  } else {
4052  $sql .= " (fk_source = " . ((int) $this->id) . " AND sourcetype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "')";
4053  $sql .= " OR";
4054  $sql .= " (fk_target = " . ((int) $this->id) . " AND targettype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "')";
4055  }
4056  }
4057 
4058  dol_syslog(get_class($this) . "::deleteObjectLinked", LOG_DEBUG);
4059  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
4060  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
4061  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
4062  $error++;
4063  }
4064  }
4065 
4066  if (!$error) {
4067  $this->db->commit();
4068  return 1;
4069  } else {
4070  $this->db->rollback();
4071  return 0;
4072  }
4073  }
4074 
4084  public static function getAllItemsLinkedByObjectID($fk_object_where, $field_select, $field_where, $table_element)
4085  {
4086  if (empty($fk_object_where) || empty($field_where) || empty($table_element)) {
4087  return -1;
4088  }
4089 
4090  global $db;
4091 
4092  $sql = "SELECT ".$field_select." FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table_element." WHERE ".$field_where." = ".((int) $fk_object_where);
4093  $resql = $db->query($sql);
4094 
4095  $TRes = array();
4096  if (!empty($resql)) {
4097  while ($res = $db->fetch_object($resql)) {
4098  $TRes[] = $res->{$field_select};
4099  }
4100  }
4101 
4102  return $TRes;
4103  }
4104 
4113  public static function deleteAllItemsLinkedByObjectID($fk_object_where, $field_where, $table_element)
4114  {
4115  if (empty($fk_object_where) || empty($field_where) || empty($table_element)) {
4116  return -1;
4117  }
4118 
4119  global $db;
4120 
4121  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table_element." WHERE ".$field_where." = ".((int) $fk_object_where);
4122  $resql = $db->query($sql);
4123 
4124  if (empty($resql)) {
4125  return 0;
4126  }
4127 
4128  return 1;
4129  }
4130 
4140  public function setStatut($status, $elementId = null, $elementType = '', $trigkey = '')
4141  {
4142  global $user, $langs, $conf;
4143 
4144  $savElementId = $elementId; // To be used later to know if we were using the method using the id of this or not.
4145 
4146  $elementId = (!empty($elementId) ? $elementId : $this->id);
4147  $elementTable = (!empty($elementType) ? $elementType : $this->table_element);
4148 
4149  $this->db->begin();
4150 
4151  $fieldstatus = "fk_statut";
4152  if ($elementTable == 'facture_rec') {
4153  $fieldstatus = "suspended";
4154  }
4155  if ($elementTable == 'mailing') {
4156  $fieldstatus = "statut";
4157  }
4158  if ($elementTable == 'cronjob') {
4159  $fieldstatus = "status";
4160  }
4161  if ($elementTable == 'user') {
4162  $fieldstatus = "statut";
4163  }
4164  if ($elementTable == 'expensereport') {
4165  $fieldstatus = "fk_statut";
4166  }
4167  if ($elementTable == 'commande_fournisseur_dispatch') {
4168  $fieldstatus = "status";
4169  }
4170  if (is_array($this->fields) && array_key_exists('status', $this->fields)) {
4171  $fieldstatus = 'status';
4172  }
4173 
4174  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$elementTable;
4175  $sql .= " SET ".$fieldstatus." = ".((int) $status);
4176  // If status = 1 = validated, update also fk_user_valid
4177  if ($status == 1 && $elementTable == 'expensereport') {
4178  $sql .= ", fk_user_valid = ".((int) $user->id);
4179  }
4180  $sql .= " WHERE rowid=".((int) $elementId);
4181 
4182  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setStatut", LOG_DEBUG);
4183  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
4184  $error = 0;
4185 
4186  // Try autoset of trigkey
4187  if (empty($trigkey)) {
4188  if ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal' && $status == 2) {
4189  $trigkey = 'SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL_SIGN'; // 2 = SupplierProposal::STATUS_SIGNED. Can't use constant into this generic class
4190  }
4191  if ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal' && $status == 3) {
4192  $trigkey = 'SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL_REFUSE'; // 3 = SupplierProposal::STATUS_REFUSED. Can't use constant into this generic class
4193  }
4194  if ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal' && $status == 4) {
4195  $trigkey = 'SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL_CLOSE'; // 4 = SupplierProposal::STATUS_CLOSED. Can't use constant into this generic class
4196  }
4197  if ($this->element == 'fichinter' && $status == 3) {
4198  $trigkey = 'FICHINTER_CLASSIFY_DONE';
4199  }
4200  if ($this->element == 'fichinter' && $status == 2) {
4201  $trigkey = 'FICHINTER_CLASSIFY_BILLED';
4202  }
4203  if ($this->element == 'fichinter' && $status == 1) {
4204  $trigkey = 'FICHINTER_CLASSIFY_UNBILLED';
4205  }
4206  }
4207 
4208  if ($trigkey) {
4209  // Call trigger
4210  $result = $this->call_trigger($trigkey, $user);
4211  if ($result < 0) {
4212  $error++;
4213  }
4214  // End call triggers
4215  }
4216 
4217  if (!$error) {
4218  $this->db->commit();
4219 
4220  if (empty($savElementId)) { // If the element we update was $this (so $elementId is null)
4221  $this->statut = $status;
4222  $this->status = $status;
4223  }
4224 
4225  return 1;
4226  } else {
4227  $this->db->rollback();
4228  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setStatut ".$this->error, LOG_ERR);
4229  return -1;
4230  }
4231  } else {
4232  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
4233  $this->db->rollback();
4234  return -1;
4235  }
4236  }
4237 
4238 
4246  public function getCanvas($id = 0, $ref = '')
4247  {
4248  global $conf;
4249 
4250  if (empty($id) && empty($ref)) {
4251  return 0;
4252  }
4253  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_CANVAS)) {
4254  return 0; // To increase speed. Not enabled by default.
4255  }
4256 
4257  // Clean parameters
4258  $ref = trim($ref);
4259 
4260  $sql = "SELECT rowid, canvas";
4261  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element;
4262  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity($this->element).")";
4263  if (!empty($id)) {
4264  $sql .= " AND rowid = ".((int) $id);
4265  }
4266  if (!empty($ref)) {
4267  $sql .= " AND ref = '".$this->db->escape($ref)."'";
4268  }
4269 
4270  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4271  if ($resql) {
4272  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
4273  if ($obj) {
4274  $this->canvas = $obj->canvas;
4275  return 1;
4276  } else {
4277  return 0;
4278  }
4279  } else {
4280  dol_print_error($this->db);
4281  return -1;
4282  }
4283  }
4284 
4285 
4292  public function getSpecialCode($lineid)
4293  {
4294  $sql = "SELECT special_code FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
4295  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $lineid);
4296  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4297  if ($resql) {
4298  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
4299  return $row[0];
4300  }
4301  }
4302 
4310  public function isObjectUsed($id = 0)
4311  {
4312  global $langs;
4313 
4314  if (empty($id)) {
4315  $id = $this->id;
4316  }
4317 
4318  // Check parameters
4319  if (!isset($this->childtables) || !is_array($this->childtables) || count($this->childtables) == 0) {
4320  dol_print_error('Called isObjectUsed on a class with property this->childtables not defined');
4321  return -1;
4322  }
4323 
4324  $arraytoscan = $this->childtables;
4325  // For backward compatibility, we check if array is old format array('table1', 'table2', ...)
4326  $tmparray = array_keys($this->childtables);
4327  if (is_numeric($tmparray[0])) {
4328  $arraytoscan = array_flip($this->childtables);
4329  }
4330 
4331  // Test if child exists
4332  $haschild = 0;
4333  foreach ($arraytoscan as $table => $elementname) {
4334  //print $id.'-'.$table.'-'.$elementname.'<br>';
4335  // Check if third party can be deleted
4336  $sql = "SELECT COUNT(*) as nb from ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table;
4337  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $id);
4338  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4339  if ($resql) {
4340  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
4341  if ($obj->nb > 0) {
4342  $langs->load("errors");
4343  //print 'Found into table '.$table.', type '.$langs->transnoentitiesnoconv($elementname).', haschild='.$haschild;
4344  $haschild += $obj->nb;
4345  if (is_numeric($elementname)) { // old usage
4346  $this->errors[] = $langs->transnoentities("ErrorRecordHasAtLeastOneChildOfType", method_exists($this, 'getNomUrl') ? $this->getNomUrl() : $this->ref, $table);
4347  } else // new usage: $elementname=Translation key
4348  {
4349  $this->errors[] = $langs->transnoentities("ErrorRecordHasAtLeastOneChildOfType", method_exists($this, 'getNomUrl') ? $this->getNomUrl() : $this->ref, $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv($elementname));
4350  }
4351  break; // We found at least one, we stop here
4352  }
4353  } else {
4354  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
4355  return -1;
4356  }
4357  }
4358  if ($haschild > 0) {
4359  $this->errors[] = "ErrorRecordHasChildren";
4360  return $haschild;
4361  } else {
4362  return 0;
4363  }
4364  }
4365 
4372  public function hasProductsOrServices($predefined = -1)
4373  {
4374  $nb = 0;
4375 
4376  foreach ($this->lines as $key => $val) {
4377  $qualified = 0;
4378  if ($predefined == -1) {
4379  $qualified = 1;
4380  }
4381  if ($predefined == 1 && $val->fk_product > 0) {
4382  $qualified = 1;
4383  }
4384  if ($predefined == 0 && $val->fk_product <= 0) {
4385  $qualified = 1;
4386  }
4387  if ($predefined == 2 && $val->fk_product > 0 && $val->product_type == 0) {
4388  $qualified = 1;
4389  }
4390  if ($predefined == 3 && $val->fk_product > 0 && $val->product_type == 1) {
4391  $qualified = 1;
4392  }
4393  if ($qualified) {
4394  $nb++;
4395  }
4396  }
4397  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::hasProductsOrServices we found '.$nb.' qualified lines of products/servcies');
4398  return $nb;
4399  }
4400 
4406  public function getTotalDiscount()
4407  {
4408  if (!empty($this->table_element_line) ) {
4409  $total_discount = 0.00;
4410 
4411  $sql = "SELECT subprice as pu_ht, qty, remise_percent, total_ht";
4412  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
4413  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
4414 
4415  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::getTotalDiscount', LOG_DEBUG);
4416  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4417  if ($resql) {
4418  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
4419  $i = 0;
4420  while ($i < $num) {
4421  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
4422 
4423  $pu_ht = $obj->pu_ht;
4424  $qty = $obj->qty;
4425  $total_ht = $obj->total_ht;
4426 
4427  $total_discount_line = floatval(price2num(($pu_ht * $qty) - $total_ht, 'MT'));
4428  $total_discount += $total_discount_line;
4429 
4430  $i++;
4431  }
4432  }
4433 
4434  //print $total_discount; exit;
4435  return price2num($total_discount);
4436  }
4437 
4438  return null;
4439  }
4440 
4441 
4448  public function getTotalWeightVolume()
4449  {
4450  $totalWeight = 0;
4451  $totalVolume = 0;
4452  // defined for shipment only
4453  $totalOrdered = '';
4454  // defined for shipment only
4455  $totalToShip = '';
4456 
4457  foreach ($this->lines as $line) {
4458  if (isset($line->qty_asked)) {
4459  if (empty($totalOrdered)) {
4460  $totalOrdered = 0; // Avoid warning because $totalOrdered is ''
4461  }
4462  $totalOrdered += $line->qty_asked; // defined for shipment only
4463  }
4464  if (isset($line->qty_shipped)) {
4465  if (empty($totalToShip)) {
4466  $totalToShip = 0; // Avoid warning because $totalToShip is ''
4467  }
4468  $totalToShip += $line->qty_shipped; // defined for shipment only
4469  } elseif ($line->element == 'commandefournisseurdispatch' && isset($line->qty)) {
4470  if (empty($totalToShip)) {
4471  $totalToShip = 0;
4472  }
4473  $totalToShip += $line->qty; // defined for reception only
4474  }
4475 
4476  // Define qty, weight, volume, weight_units, volume_units
4477  if ($this->element == 'shipping') {
4478  // for shipments
4479  $qty = $line->qty_shipped ? $line->qty_shipped : 0;
4480  } else {
4481  $qty = $line->qty ? $line->qty : 0;
4482  }
4483 
4484  $weight = $line->weight ? $line->weight : 0;
4485  ($weight == 0 && !empty($line->product->weight)) ? $weight = $line->product->weight : 0;
4486  $volume = $line->volume ? $line->volume : 0;
4487  ($volume == 0 && !empty($line->product->volume)) ? $volume = $line->product->volume : 0;
4488 
4489  $weight_units = $line->weight_units;
4490  ($weight_units == 0 && !empty($line->product->weight_units)) ? $weight_units = $line->product->weight_units : 0;
4491  $volume_units = $line->volume_units;
4492  ($volume_units == 0 && !empty($line->product->volume_units)) ? $volume_units = $line->product->volume_units : 0;
4493 
4494  $weightUnit = 0;
4495  $volumeUnit = 0;
4496  if (!empty($weight_units)) {
4497  $weightUnit = $weight_units;
4498  }
4499  if (!empty($volume_units)) {
4500  $volumeUnit = $volume_units;
4501  }
4502 
4503  if (empty($totalWeight)) {
4504  $totalWeight = 0; // Avoid warning because $totalWeight is ''
4505  }
4506  if (empty($totalVolume)) {
4507  $totalVolume = 0; // Avoid warning because $totalVolume is ''
4508  }
4509 
4510  //var_dump($line->volume_units);
4511  if ($weight_units < 50) { // < 50 means a standard unit (power of 10 of official unit), > 50 means an exotic unit (like inch)
4512  $trueWeightUnit = pow(10, $weightUnit);
4513  $totalWeight += $weight * $qty * $trueWeightUnit;
4514  } else {
4515  if ($weight_units == 99) {
4516  // conversion 1 Pound = 0.45359237 KG
4517  $trueWeightUnit = 0.45359237;
4518  $totalWeight += $weight * $qty * $trueWeightUnit;
4519  } elseif ($weight_units == 98) {
4520  // conversion 1 Ounce = 0.0283495 KG
4521  $trueWeightUnit = 0.0283495;
4522  $totalWeight += $weight * $qty * $trueWeightUnit;
4523  } else {
4524  $totalWeight += $weight * $qty; // This may be wrong if we mix different units
4525  }
4526  }
4527  if ($volume_units < 50) { // >50 means a standard unit (power of 10 of official unit), > 50 means an exotic unit (like inch)
4528  //print $line->volume."x".$line->volume_units."x".($line->volume_units < 50)."x".$volumeUnit;
4529  $trueVolumeUnit = pow(10, $volumeUnit);
4530  //print $line->volume;
4531  $totalVolume += $volume * $qty * $trueVolumeUnit;
4532  } else {
4533  $totalVolume += $volume * $qty; // This may be wrong if we mix different units
4534  }
4535  }
4536 
4537  return array('weight'=>$totalWeight, 'volume'=>$totalVolume, 'ordered'=>$totalOrdered, 'toship'=>$totalToShip);
4538  }
4539 
4540 
4546  public function setExtraParameters()
4547  {
4548  $this->db->begin();
4549 
4550  $extraparams = (!empty($this->extraparams) ? json_encode($this->extraparams) : null);
4551 
4552  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element;
4553  $sql .= " SET extraparams = ".(!empty($extraparams) ? "'".$this->db->escape($extraparams)."'" : "null");
4554  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
4555 
4556  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setExtraParameters", LOG_DEBUG);
4557  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4558  if (!$resql) {
4559  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
4560  $this->db->rollback();
4561  return -1;
4562  } else {
4563  $this->db->commit();
4564  return 1;
4565  }
4566  }
4567
