4569  // --------------------
4570  // TODO: All functions here must be redesigned and moved as they are not business functions but output functions
4571  // --------------------
4572 
4573  /* This is to show add lines */
4574 
4584  public function formAddObjectLine($dateSelector, $seller, $buyer, $defaulttpldir = '/core/tpl')
4585  {
4586  global $conf, $user, $langs, $object, $hookmanager, $extrafields;
4587  global $form;
4588 
4589  // Line extrafield
4590  if (!is_object($extrafields)) {
4591  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extrafields.class.php';
4592  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($this->db);
4593  }
4594  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($this->table_element_line);
4595 
4596  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
4597  // Use global variables + $dateSelector + $seller and $buyer
4598  // Note: This is deprecated. If you need to overwrite the tpl file, use instead the hook 'formAddObjectLine'.
4599  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array($defaulttpldir));
4600  foreach ($dirtpls as $module => $reldir) {
4601  if (!empty($module)) {
4602  $tpl = dol_buildpath($reldir.'/objectline_create.tpl.php');
4603  } else {
4604  $tpl = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.$reldir.'/objectline_create.tpl.php';
4605  }
4606 
4607  if (empty($conf->file->strict_mode)) {
4608  $res = @include $tpl;
4609  } else {
4610  $res = include $tpl; // for debug
4611  }
4612  if ($res) {
4613  break;
4614  }
4615  }
4616  }
4617 
4618 
4619 
4620  /* This is to show array of line of details */
4621 
4622 
4637  public function printObjectLines($action, $seller, $buyer, $selected = 0, $dateSelector = 0, $defaulttpldir = '/core/tpl')
4638  {
4639  global $conf, $hookmanager, $langs, $user, $form, $extrafields, $object;
4640  // TODO We should not use global var for this
4641  global $inputalsopricewithtax, $usemargins, $disableedit, $disablemove, $disableremove, $outputalsopricetotalwithtax;
4642 
4643  // Define usemargins
4644  $usemargins = 0;
4645  if (!empty($conf->margin->enabled) && !empty($this->element) && in_array($this->element, array('facture', 'facturerec', 'propal', 'commande'))) {
4646  $usemargins = 1;
4647  }
4648 
4649  $num = count($this->lines);
4650 
4651  // Line extrafield
4652  if (!is_object($extrafields)) {
4653  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extrafields.class.php';
4654  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($this->db);
4655  }
4656  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($this->table_element_line);
4657 
4658  $parameters = array('num'=>$num, 'dateSelector'=>$dateSelector, 'seller'=>$seller, 'buyer'=>$buyer, 'selected'=>$selected, 'table_element_line'=>$this->table_element_line);
4659  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printObjectLineTitle', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
4660  if (empty($reshook)) {
4661  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
4662  // Use global variables + $dateSelector + $seller and $buyer
4663  // Note: This is deprecated. If you need to overwrite the tpl file, use instead the hook.
4664  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array($defaulttpldir));
4665  foreach ($dirtpls as $module => $reldir) {
4666  if (!empty($module)) {
4667  $tpl = dol_buildpath($reldir.'/objectline_title.tpl.php');
4668  } else {
4669  $tpl = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.$reldir.'/objectline_title.tpl.php';
4670  }
4671  if (empty($conf->file->strict_mode)) {
4672  $res = @include $tpl;
4673  } else {
4674  $res = include $tpl; // for debug
4675  }
4676  if ($res) {
4677  break;
4678  }
4679  }
4680  }
4681 
4682  $i = 0;
4683 
4684  print "<!-- begin printObjectLines() --><tbody>\n";
4685  foreach ($this->lines as $line) {
4686  //Line extrafield
4687  $line->fetch_optionals();
4688 
4689  //if (is_object($hookmanager) && (($line->product_type == 9 && ! empty($line->special_code)) || ! empty($line->fk_parent_line)))
4690  if (is_object($hookmanager)) { // Old code is commented on preceding line.
4691  if (empty($line->fk_parent_line)) {
4692  $parameters = array('line'=>$line, 'num'=>$num, 'i'=>$i, 'dateSelector'=>$dateSelector, 'seller'=>$seller, 'buyer'=>$buyer, 'selected'=>$selected, 'table_element_line'=>$line->table_element);
4693  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printObjectLine', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
4694  } else {
4695  $parameters = array('line'=>$line, 'num'=>$num, 'i'=>$i, 'dateSelector'=>$dateSelector, 'seller'=>$seller, 'buyer'=>$buyer, 'selected'=>$selected, 'table_element_line'=>$line->table_element, 'fk_parent_line'=>$line->fk_parent_line);
4696  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printObjectSubLine', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
4697  }
4698  }
4699  if (empty($reshook)) {
4700  $this->printObjectLine($action, $line, '', $num, $i, $dateSelector, $seller, $buyer, $selected, $extrafields, $defaulttpldir);
4701  }
4702 
4703  $i++;
4704  }
4705  print "</tbody><!-- end printObjectLines() -->\n";
4706  }
4707 
4725  public function printObjectLine($action, $line, $var, $num, $i, $dateSelector, $seller, $buyer, $selected = 0, $extrafields = null, $defaulttpldir = '/core/tpl')
4726  {
4727  global $conf, $langs, $user, $object, $hookmanager;
4728  global $form;
4729  global $object_rights, $disableedit, $disablemove, $disableremove; // TODO We should not use global var for this !
4730 
4731  $object_rights = $this->getRights();
4732 
4733  $element = $this->element;
4734 
4735  $text = '';
4736  $description = '';
4737 
4738  // Line in view mode
4739  if ($action != 'editline' || $selected != $line->id) {
4740  // Product
4741  if ($line->fk_product > 0) {
4742  $product_static = new Product($this->db);
4743  $product_static->fetch($line->fk_product);
4744 
4745  $product_static->ref = $line->ref; //can change ref in hook
4746  $product_static->label = $line->label; //can change label in hook
4747 
4748  $text = $product_static->getNomUrl(1);
4749 
4750  // Define output language and label
4751  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MULTILANGS)) {
4752  if (property_exists($this, 'socid') && !is_object($this->thirdparty)) {
4753  dol_print_error('', 'Error: Method printObjectLine was called on an object and object->fetch_thirdparty was not done before');
4754  return;
4755  }
4756 
4757  $prod = new Product($this->db);
4758  $prod->fetch($line->fk_product);
4759 
4760  $outputlangs = $langs;
4761  $newlang = '';
4762  if (empty($newlang) && GETPOST('lang_id', 'aZ09')) {
4763  $newlang = GETPOST('lang_id', 'aZ09');
4764  }
4765  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_TEXTS_IN_THIRDPARTY_LANGUAGE) && empty($newlang) && is_object($this->thirdparty)) {
4766  $newlang = $this->thirdparty->default_lang; // To use language of customer
4767  }
4768  if (!empty($newlang)) {
4769  $outputlangs = new Translate("", $conf);
4770  $outputlangs->setDefaultLang($newlang);
4771  }
4772 
4773  $label = (!empty($prod->multilangs[$outputlangs->defaultlang]["label"])) ? $prod->multilangs[$outputlangs->defaultlang]["label"] : $line->product_label;
4774  } else {
4775  $label = $line->product_label;
4776  }
4777 
4778  $text .= ' - '.(!empty($line->label) ? $line->label : $label);
4779  $description .= (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_DESC_IN_FORM) ? '' : dol_htmlentitiesbr($line->description)); // Description is what to show on popup. We shown nothing if already into desc.
4780  }
4781 
4782  $line->pu_ttc = price2num($line->subprice * (1 + ($line->tva_tx / 100)), 'MU');
4783 
4784  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
4785  // Use global variables + $dateSelector + $seller and $buyer
4786  // Note: This is deprecated. If you need to overwrite the tpl file, use instead the hook printObjectLine and printObjectSubLine.
4787  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array($defaulttpldir));
4788  foreach ($dirtpls as $module => $reldir) {
4789  if (!empty($module)) {
4790  $tpl = dol_buildpath($reldir.'/objectline_view.tpl.php');
4791  } else {
4792  $tpl = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.$reldir.'/objectline_view.tpl.php';
4793  }
4794 
4795  if (empty($conf->file->strict_mode)) {
4796  $res = @include $tpl;
4797  } else {
4798  $res = include $tpl; // for debug
4799  }
4800  if ($res) {
4801  break;
4802  }
4803  }
4804  }
4805 
4806  // Line in update mode
4807  if ($this->statut == 0 && $action == 'editline' && $selected == $line->id) {
4808  $label = (!empty($line->label) ? $line->label : (($line->fk_product > 0) ? $line->product_label : ''));
4809 
4810  $line->pu_ttc = price2num($line->subprice * (1 + ($line->tva_tx / 100)), 'MU');
4811 
4812  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
4813  // Use global variables + $dateSelector + $seller and $buyer
4814  // Note: This is deprecated. If you need to overwrite the tpl file, use instead the hook printObjectLine and printObjectSubLine.
4815  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array($defaulttpldir));
4816  foreach ($dirtpls as $module => $reldir) {
4817  if (!empty($module)) {
4818  $tpl = dol_buildpath($reldir.'/objectline_edit.tpl.php');
4819  } else {
4820  $tpl = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.$reldir.'/objectline_edit.tpl.php';
4821  }
4822 
4823  if (empty($conf->file->strict_mode)) {
4824  $res = @include $tpl;
4825  } else {
4826  $res = include $tpl; // for debug
4827  }
4828  if ($res) {
4829  break;
4830  }
4831  }
4832  }
4833  }
4834 
4835 
4836  /* This is to show array of line of details of source object */
4837 
4838 
4849  public function printOriginLinesList($restrictlist = '', $selectedLines = array())
4850  {
4851  global $langs, $hookmanager, $conf, $form;
4852 
4853  print '<tr class="liste_titre">';
4854  print '<td>'.$langs->trans('Ref').'</td>';
4855  print '<td>'.$langs->trans('Description').'</td>';
4856  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans('VATRate').'</td>';
4857  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans('PriceUHT').'</td>';
4858  if (!empty($conf->multicurrency->enabled)) {
4859  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans('PriceUHTCurrency').'</td>';
4860  }
4861  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans('Qty').'</td>';
4862  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
4863  print '<td class="left">'.$langs->trans('Unit').'</td>';
4864  }
4865  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans('ReductionShort').'</td>';
4866  print '<td class="center">'.$form->showCheckAddButtons('checkforselect', 1).'</td>';
4867  print '</tr>';
4868  $i = 0;
4869 
4870  if (!empty($this->lines)) {
4871  foreach ($this->lines as $line) {
4872  $reshook = 0;
4873  //if (is_object($hookmanager) && (($line->product_type == 9 && !empty($line->special_code)) || !empty($line->fk_parent_line))) {
4874  if (is_object($hookmanager)) { // Old code is commented on preceding line.
4875  if (empty($line->fk_parent_line)) {
4876  $parameters = array('line'=>$line, 'i'=>$i, 'restrictlist'=>$restrictlist, 'selectedLines'=> $selectedLines);
4877  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printOriginObjectLine', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
4878  } else {
4879  $parameters = array('line'=>$line, 'i'=>$i, 'restrictlist'=>$restrictlist, 'selectedLines'=> $selectedLines, 'fk_parent_line'=>$line->fk_parent_line);
4880  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printOriginObjectSubLine', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
4881  }
4882  }
4883  if (empty($reshook)) {
4884  $this->printOriginLine($line, '', $restrictlist, '/core/tpl', $selectedLines);
4885  }
4886 
4887  $i++;
4888  }
4889  }
4890  }
4891 
4905  public function printOriginLine($line, $var, $restrictlist = '', $defaulttpldir = '/core/tpl', $selectedLines = array())
4906  {
4907  global $langs, $conf;
4908 
4909  //var_dump($line);
4910  if (!empty($line->date_start)) {
4911  $date_start = $line->date_start;
4912  } else {
4913  $date_start = $line->date_debut_prevue;
4914  if ($line->date_debut_reel) {
4915  $date_start = $line->date_debut_reel;
4916  }
4917  }
4918  if (!empty($line->date_end)) {
4919  $date_end = $line->date_end;
4920  } else {
4921  $date_end = $line->date_fin_prevue;
4922  if ($line->date_fin_reel) {
4923  $date_end = $line->date_fin_reel;
4924  }
4925  }
4926 
4927  $this->tpl['id'] = $line->id;
4928 
4929  $this->tpl['label'] = '';
4930  if (!empty($line->fk_parent_line)) {
4931  $this->tpl['label'] .= img_picto('', 'rightarrow');
4932  }
4933 
4934  if (($line->info_bits & 2) == 2) { // TODO Not sure this is used for source object
4935  $discount = new DiscountAbsolute($this->db);
4936  $discount->fk_soc = $this->socid;
4937  $this->tpl['label'] .= $discount->getNomUrl(0, 'discount');
4938  } elseif (!empty($line->fk_product)) {
4939  $productstatic = new Product($this->db);
4940  $productstatic->id = $line->fk_product;
4941  $productstatic->ref = $line->ref;
4942  $productstatic->type = $line->fk_product_type;
4943  if (empty($productstatic->ref)) {
4944  $line->fetch_product();
4945  $productstatic = $line->product;
4946  }
4947 
4948  $this->tpl['label'] .= $productstatic->getNomUrl(1);
4949  $this->tpl['label'] .= ' - '.(!empty($line->label) ? $line->label : $line->product_label);
4950  // Dates
4951  if ($line->product_type == 1 && ($date_start || $date_end)) {
4952  $this->tpl['label'] .= get_date_range($date_start, $date_end);
4953  }
4954  } else {
4955  $this->tpl['label'] .= ($line->product_type == -1 ? '&nbsp;' : ($line->product_type == 1 ? img_object($langs->trans(''), 'service') : img_object($langs->trans(''), 'product')));
4956  if (!empty($line->desc)) {
4957  $this->tpl['label'] .= $line->desc;
4958  } else {
4959  $this->tpl['label'] .= ($line->label ? '&nbsp;'.$line->label : '');
4960  }
4961 
4962  // Dates
4963  if ($line->product_type == 1 && ($date_start || $date_end)) {
4964  $this->tpl['label'] .= get_date_range($date_start, $date_end);
4965  }
4966  }
4967 
4968  if (!empty($line->desc)) {
4969  if ($line->desc == '(CREDIT_NOTE)') { // TODO Not sure this is used for source object
4970  $discount = new DiscountAbsolute($this->db);
4971  $discount->fetch($line->fk_remise_except);
4972  $this->tpl['description'] = $langs->transnoentities("DiscountFromCreditNote", $discount->getNomUrl(0));
4973  } elseif ($line->desc == '(DEPOSIT)') { // TODO Not sure this is used for source object
4974  $discount = new DiscountAbsolute($this->db);
4975  $discount->fetch($line->fk_remise_except);
4976  $this->tpl['description'] = $langs->transnoentities("DiscountFromDeposit", $discount->getNomUrl(0));
4977  } elseif ($line->desc == '(EXCESS RECEIVED)') {
4978  $discount = new DiscountAbsolute($this->db);
4979  $discount->fetch($line->fk_remise_except);
4980  $this->tpl['description'] = $langs->transnoentities("DiscountFromExcessReceived", $discount->getNomUrl(0));
4981  } elseif ($line->desc == '(EXCESS PAID)') {
4982  $discount = new DiscountAbsolute($this->db);
4983  $discount->fetch($line->fk_remise_except);
4984  $this->tpl['description'] = $langs->transnoentities("DiscountFromExcessPaid", $discount->getNomUrl(0));
4985  } else {
4986  $this->tpl['description'] = dol_trunc($line->desc, 60);
4987  }
4988  } else {
4989  $this->tpl['description'] = '&nbsp;';
4990  }
4991 
4992  // VAT Rate
4993  $this->tpl['vat_rate'] = vatrate($line->tva_tx, true);
4994  $this->tpl['vat_rate'] .= (($line->info_bits & 1) == 1) ? '*' : '';
4995  if (!empty($line->vat_src_code) && !preg_match('/\(/', $this->tpl['vat_rate'])) {
4996  $this->tpl['vat_rate'] .= ' ('.$line->vat_src_code.')';
4997  }
4998 
4999  $this->tpl['price'] = price($line->subprice);
5000  $this->tpl['multicurrency_price'] = price($line->multicurrency_subprice);
5001  $this->tpl['qty'] = (($line->info_bits & 2) != 2) ? $line->qty : '&nbsp;';
5002  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
5003  $this->tpl['unit'] = $langs->transnoentities($line->getLabelOfUnit('long'));
5004  }
5005  $this->tpl['remise_percent'] = (($line->info_bits & 2) != 2) ? vatrate($line->remise_percent, true) : '&nbsp;';
5006 
5007  // Is the line strike or not
5008  $this->tpl['strike'] = 0;
5009  if ($restrictlist == 'services' && $line->product_type != Product::TYPE_SERVICE) {
5010  $this->tpl['strike'] = 1;
5011  }
5012 
5013  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
5014  // Use global variables + $dateSelector + $seller and $buyer
5015  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array($defaulttpldir));
5016  foreach ($dirtpls as $module => $reldir) {
5017  if (!empty($module)) {
5018  $tpl = dol_buildpath($reldir.'/originproductline.tpl.php');
5019  } else {
5020  $tpl = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.$reldir.'/originproductline.tpl.php';
5021  }
5022 
5023  if (empty($conf->file->strict_mode)) {
5024  $res = @include $tpl;
5025  } else {
5026  $res = include $tpl; // for debug
5027  }
5028  if ($res) {
5029  break;
5030  }
5031  }
5032  }
5033 
5034 
5035  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5046  public function add_element_resource($resource_id, $resource_type, $busy = 0, $mandatory = 0)
5047  {
5048  // phpcs:enable
5049  $this->db->begin();
5050 
5051  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."element_resources (";
5052  $sql .= "resource_id";
5053  $sql .= ", resource_type";
5054  $sql .= ", element_id";
5055  $sql .= ", element_type";
5056  $sql .= ", busy";
5057  $sql .= ", mandatory";
5058  $sql .= ") VALUES (";
5059  $sql .= $resource_id;
5060  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($resource_type)."'";
5061  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->id)."'";
5062  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->element)."'";
5063  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($busy)."'";
5064  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($mandatory)."'";
5065  $sql .= ")";
5066 
5067  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::add_element_resource", LOG_DEBUG);
5068  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
5069  $this->db->commit();
5070  return 1;
5071  } else {
5072  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
5073  $this->db->rollback();
5074  return 0;
5075  }
5076  }
5077 
5078  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5087  public function delete_resource($rowid, $element, $notrigger = 0)
5088  {
5089  // phpcs:enable
5090  global $user;
5091 
5092  $this->db->begin();
5093 
5094  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."element_resources";
5095  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $rowid);
5096 
5097  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::delete_resource", LOG_DEBUG);
5098 
5099  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5100  if (!$resql) {
5101  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
5102  $this->db->rollback();
5103  return -1;
5104  } else {
5105  if (!$notrigger) {
5106  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper($element).'_DELETE_RESOURCE', $user);
5107  if ($result < 0) {
5108  $this->db->rollback();
5109  return -1;
5110  }
5111  }
5112  $this->db->commit();
5113  return 1;
5114  }
5115  }
5116 
5117 
5123  public function __clone()
5124  {
5125  // Force a copy of this->lines, otherwise it will point to same object.
5126  if (isset($this->lines) && is_array($this->lines)) {
5127  $nboflines = count($this->lines);
5128  for ($i = 0; $i < $nboflines; $i++) {
5129  $this->lines[$i] = clone $this->lines[$i];
5130  }
5131  }
5132  }
5133 
5147  protected function commonGenerateDocument($modelspath, $modele, $outputlangs, $hidedetails, $hidedesc, $hideref, $moreparams = null)
5148  {
5149  global $conf, $langs, $user, $hookmanager, $action;
5150 
5151  $srctemplatepath = '';
5152 
5153  $parameters = array('modelspath'=>$modelspath, 'modele'=>$modele, 'outputlangs'=>$outputlangs, 'hidedetails'=>$hidedetails, 'hidedesc'=>$hidedesc, 'hideref'=>$hideref, 'moreparams'=>$moreparams);
5154  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('commonGenerateDocument', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
5155 
5156  if (empty($reshook)) {
5157  dol_syslog("commonGenerateDocument modele=".$modele." outputlangs->defaultlang=".(is_object($outputlangs) ? $outputlangs->defaultlang : 'null'));
5158 
5159  if (empty($modele)) {
5160  $this->error = 'BadValueForParameterModele';
5161  return -1;
5162  }
5163 
5164  // Increase limit for PDF build
5165  $err = error_reporting();
5166  error_reporting(0);
5167  @set_time_limit(120);
5168  error_reporting($err);
5169 
5170  // If selected model is a filename template (then $modele="modelname" or "modelname:filename")
5171  $tmp = explode(':', $modele, 2);
5172  if (!empty($tmp[1])) {
5173  $modele = $tmp[0];
5174  $srctemplatepath = $tmp[1];
5175  }
5176 
5177  // Search template files
5178  $file = '';
5179  $classname = '';
5180  $filefound = '';
5181  $dirmodels = array('/');
5182  if (is_array($conf->modules_parts['models'])) {
5183  $dirmodels = array_merge($dirmodels, $conf->modules_parts['models']);
5184  }
5185  foreach ($dirmodels as $reldir) {
5186  foreach (array('doc', 'pdf') as $prefix) {
5187  if (in_array(get_class($this), array('Adherent'))) {
5188  // Member module use prefix_modele.class.php
5189  $file = $prefix."_".$modele.".class.php";
5190  } else {
5191  // Other module use prefix_modele.modules.php
5192  $file = $prefix."_".$modele.".modules.php";
5193  }
5194 
5195  // On verifie l'emplacement du modele
5196  $file = dol_buildpath($reldir.$modelspath.$file, 0);
5197  if (file_exists($file)) {
5198  $filefound = $file;
5199  $classname = $prefix.'_'.$modele;
5200  break;
5201  }
5202  }
5203  if ($filefound) {
5204  break;
5205  }
5206  }
5207 
5208  // If generator was found
5209  if ($filefound) {
5210  global $db; // Required to solve a conception default making an include of code using $db instead of $this->db just after.
5211 
5212  require_once $file;
5213 
5214  $obj = new $classname($this->db);
5215 
5216  // If generator is ODT, we must have srctemplatepath defined, if not we set it.
5217  if ($obj->type == 'odt' && empty($srctemplatepath)) {
5218  $varfortemplatedir = $obj->scandir;
5219  if ($varfortemplatedir && !empty($conf->global->$varfortemplatedir)) {
5220  $dirtoscan = $conf->global->$varfortemplatedir;
5221 
5222  $listoffiles = array();
5223 
5224  // Now we add first model found in directories scanned
5225  $listofdir = explode(',', $dirtoscan);
5226  foreach ($listofdir as $key => $tmpdir) {
5227  $tmpdir = trim($tmpdir);
5228  $tmpdir = preg_replace('/DOL_DATA_ROOT/', DOL_DATA_ROOT, $tmpdir);
5229  if (!$tmpdir) {
5230  unset($listofdir[$key]);
5231  continue;
5232  }
5233  if (is_dir($tmpdir)) {
5234  $tmpfiles = dol_dir_list($tmpdir, 'files', 0, '\.od(s|t)$', '', 'name', SORT_ASC, 0);
5235  if (count($tmpfiles)) {
5236  $listoffiles = array_merge($listoffiles, $tmpfiles);
5237  }
5238  }
5239  }
5240 
5241  if (count($listoffiles)) {
5242  foreach ($listoffiles as $record) {
5243  $srctemplatepath = $record['fullname'];
5244  break;
5245  }
5246  }
5247  }
5248 
5249  if (empty($srctemplatepath)) {
5250  $this->error = 'ErrorGenerationAskedForOdtTemplateWithSrcFileNotDefined';
5251  return -1;
5252  }
5253  }
5254 
5255  if ($obj->type == 'odt' && !empty($srctemplatepath)) {
5256  if (!dol_is_file($srctemplatepath)) {
5257  dol_syslog("Failed to locate template file ".$srctemplatepath, LOG_WARNING);
5258  $this->error = 'ErrorGenerationAskedForOdtTemplateWithSrcFileNotFound';
5259  return -1;
5260  }
5261  }
5262 
5263  // We save charset_output to restore it because write_file can change it if needed for
5264  // output format that does not support UTF8.
5265  $sav_charset_output = $outputlangs->charset_output;
5266 
5267  if (in_array(get_class($this), array('Adherent'))) {
5268  $arrayofrecords = array(); // The write_file of templates of adherent class need this var
5269  $resultwritefile = $obj->write_file($this, $outputlangs, $srctemplatepath, 'member', 1, $moreparams);
5270  } else {
5271  $resultwritefile = $obj->write_file($this, $outputlangs, $srctemplatepath, $hidedetails, $hidedesc, $hideref, $moreparams);
5272  }
5273  // After call of write_file $obj->result['fullpath'] is set with generated file. It will be used to update the ECM database index.
5274 
5275  if ($resultwritefile > 0) {
5276  $outputlangs->charset_output = $sav_charset_output;
5277 
5278  // We delete old preview
5279  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
5280  dol_delete_preview($this);
5281 
5282  // Index file in database
5283  if (!empty($obj->result['fullpath'])) {
5284  $destfull = $obj->result['fullpath'];
5285  $upload_dir = dirname($destfull);
5286  $destfile = basename($destfull);
5287  $rel_dir = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(DOL_DATA_ROOT, '/').'/', '', $upload_dir);
5288 
5289  if (!preg_match('/[\\/]temp[\\/]|[\\/]thumbs|\.meta$/', $rel_dir)) { // If not a tmp dir
5290  $filename = basename($destfile);
5291  $rel_dir = preg_replace('/[\\/]$/', '', $rel_dir);
5292  $rel_dir = preg_replace('/^[\\/]/', '', $rel_dir);
5293 
5294  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/ecm/class/ecmfiles.class.php';
5295  $ecmfile = new EcmFiles($this->db);
5296  $result = $ecmfile->fetch(0, '', ($rel_dir ? $rel_dir.'/' : '').$filename);
5297 
5298  // Set the public "share" key
5299  $setsharekey = false;
5300  if ($this->element == 'propal') {
5301  $useonlinesignature = $conf->global->MAIN_FEATURES_LEVEL; // Replace this with 1 when feature to make online signature is ok
5302  if ($useonlinesignature) {
5303  $setsharekey = true;
5304  }
5305  if (!empty($conf->global->PROPOSAL_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5306  $setsharekey = true;
5307  }
5308  }
5309  if ($this->element == 'commande' && !empty($conf->global->ORDER_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5310  $setsharekey = true;
5311  }
5312  if ($this->element == 'facture' && !empty($conf->global->INVOICE_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5313  $setsharekey = true;
5314  }
5315  if ($this->element == 'bank_account' && !empty($conf->global->BANK_ACCOUNT_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5316  $setsharekey = true;
5317  }
5318  if ($this->element == 'contrat' && !empty($conf->global->CONTRACT_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5319  $setsharekey = true;
5320  }
5321  if ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal' && !empty($conf->global->SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5322  $setsharekey = true;
5323  }
5324 
5325  if ($setsharekey) {
5326  if (empty($ecmfile->share)) { // Because object not found or share not set yet
5327  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/security2.lib.php';
5328  $ecmfile->share = getRandomPassword(true);
5329  }
5330  }
5331 
5332  if ($result > 0) {
5333  $ecmfile->label = md5_file(dol_osencode($destfull)); // hash of file content
5334  $ecmfile->fullpath_orig = '';
5335  $ecmfile->gen_or_uploaded = 'generated';
5336  $ecmfile->description = ''; // indexed content
5337  $ecmfile->keywords = ''; // keyword content
5338  $result = $ecmfile->update($user);
5339  if ($result < 0) {
5340  setEventMessages($ecmfile->error, $ecmfile->errors, 'warnings');
5341  }
5342  } else {
5343  $ecmfile->entity = $conf->entity;
5344  $ecmfile->filepath = $rel_dir;
5345  $ecmfile->filename = $filename;
5346  $ecmfile->label = md5_file(dol_osencode($destfull)); // hash of file content
5347  $ecmfile->fullpath_orig = '';
5348  $ecmfile->gen_or_uploaded = 'generated';
5349  $ecmfile->description = ''; // indexed content
5350  $ecmfile->keywords = ''; // keyword content
5351  $ecmfile->src_object_type = $this->table_element; // $this->table_name is 'myobject' or 'mymodule_myobject'.
5352  $ecmfile->src_object_id = $this->id;
5353 
5354  $result = $ecmfile->create($user);
5355  if ($result < 0) {
5356  setEventMessages($ecmfile->error, $ecmfile->errors, 'warnings');
5357  }
5358  }
5359 
5360  /*$this->result['fullname']=$destfull;
5361  $this->result['filepath']=$ecmfile->filepath;
5362  $this->result['filename']=$ecmfile->filename;*/
5363  //var_dump($obj->update_main_doc_field);exit;
5364 
5365  // Update the last_main_doc field into main object (if document generator has property ->update_main_doc_field set)
5366  $update_main_doc_field = 0;
5367  if (!empty($obj->update_main_doc_field)) {
5368  $update_main_doc_field = 1;
5369  }
5370  if ($update_main_doc_field && !empty($this->table_element)) {
5371  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element." SET last_main_doc = '".$this->db->escape($ecmfile->filepath."/".$ecmfile->filename)."'";
5372  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
5373 
5374  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5375  if (!$resql) {
5376  dol_print_error($this->db);
5377  } else {
5378  $this->last_main_doc = $ecmfile->filepath.'/'.$ecmfile->filename;
5379  }
5380  }
5381  }
5382  } else {
5383  dol_syslog('Method ->write_file was called on object '.get_class($obj).' and return a success but the return array ->result["fullpath"] was not set.', LOG_WARNING);
5384  }
5385 
5386  // Success in building document. We build meta file.
5387  dol_meta_create($this);
5388 
5389  return 1;
5390  } else {
5391  $outputlangs->charset_output = $sav_charset_output;
5392  dol_print_error($this->db, "Error generating document for ".__CLASS__.". Error: ".$obj->error, $obj->errors);
5393  return -1;
5394  }
5395  } else {
5396  if (!$filefound) {
5397  $this->error = $langs->trans("Error").' Failed to load doc generator with modelpaths='.$modelspath.' - modele='.$modele;
5398  dol_print_error('', $this->error);
5399  } else {
5400  $this->error = $langs->trans("Error")." ".$langs->trans("ErrorFileDoesNotExists", $filefound);
5401  dol_print_error('', $this->error);
5402  }
5403  return -1;
5404  }
5405  } else {
5406  return $reshook;
5407  }
5408  }
5409 
5417  public function addThumbs($file)
5418  {
5419  global $maxwidthsmall, $maxheightsmall, $maxwidthmini, $maxheightmini, $quality;
5420 
5421  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/images.lib.php'; // This define also $maxwidthsmall, $quality, ...
5422 
5423  $file_osencoded = dol_osencode($file);
5424  if (file_exists($file_osencoded)) {
5425  // Create small thumbs for company (Ratio is near 16/9)
5426  // Used on logon for example
5427  vignette($file_osencoded, $maxwidthsmall, $maxheightsmall, '_small', $quality);
5428 
5429  // Create mini thumbs for company (Ratio is near 16/9)
5430  // Used on menu or for setup page for example
5431  vignette($file_osencoded, $maxwidthmini, $maxheightmini, '_mini', $quality);
5432  }
5433  }
5434

5436  /* Functions common to commonobject and commonobjectline */
5437 
5438  /* For default values */
5439 
5452  public function getDefaultCreateValueFor($fieldname, $alternatevalue = null)
5453  {
5454  global $conf, $_POST;
5455 
5456  // If param here has been posted, we use this value first.
5457  if (GETPOSTISSET($fieldname)) {
5458  return GETPOST($fieldname, 'alphanohtml', 3);
5459  }
5460 
5461  if (isset($alternatevalue)) {
5462  return $alternatevalue;
5463  }
5464 
5465  $newelement = $this->element;
5466  if ($newelement == 'facture') {
5467  $newelement = 'invoice';
5468  }
5469  if ($newelement == 'commande') {
5470  $newelement = 'order';
5471  }
5472  if (empty($newelement)) {
5473  dol_syslog("Ask a default value using common method getDefaultCreateValueForField on an object with no property ->element defined. Return empty string.", LOG_WARNING);
5474  return '';
5475  }
5476 
5477  $keyforfieldname = strtoupper($newelement.'_DEFAULT_'.$fieldname);
5478  //var_dump($keyforfieldname);
5479  if (isset($conf->global->$keyforfieldname)) {
5480  return $conf->global->$keyforfieldname;
5481  }
5482 
5483  // TODO Ad here a scan into table llx_overwrite_default with a filter on $this->element and $fieldname
5484  }
5485 
5486 
5487  /* For triggers */
5488 
5489 
5490  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5501  public function call_trigger($triggerName, $user)
5502  {
5503  // phpcs:enable
5504  global $langs, $conf;
5505 
5506  if (!is_object($langs)) { // If lang was not defined, we set it. It is required by run_triggers.
5507  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/translate.class.php';
5508  $langs = new Translate('', $conf);
5509  }
5510 
5511  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/interfaces.class.php';
5512  $interface = new Interfaces($this->db);
5513  $result = $interface->run_triggers($triggerName, $this, $user, $langs, $conf);
5514 
5515  if ($result < 0) {
5516  if (!empty($this->errors)) {
5517  $this->errors = array_unique(array_merge($this->errors, $interface->errors)); // We use array_unique because when a trigger call another trigger on same object, this->errors is added twice.
5518  } else {
5519  $this->errors = $interface->errors;
5520  }
5521  }
5522  return $result;
5523  }
5524 
5525 
5526  /* Functions for data in other language */
5527 
5528 
5536  public function fetchValuesForExtraLanguages()
5537  {
5538  // To avoid SQL errors. Probably not the better solution though
5539  if (!$this->element) {
5540  return 0;
5541  }
5542  if (!($this->id > 0)) {
5543  return 0;
5544  }
5545  if (is_array($this->array_languages)) {
5546  return 1;
5547  }
5548 
5549  $this->array_languages = array();
5550 
5551  $element = $this->element;
5552  if ($element == 'categorie') {
5553  $element = 'categories'; // For compatibility
5554  }
5555 
5556  // Request to get translation values for object
5557  $sql = "SELECT rowid, property, lang , value";
5558  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."object_lang";
5559  $sql .= " WHERE type_object = '".$this->db->escape($element)."'";
5560  $sql .= " AND fk_object = ".((int) $this->id);
5561 
5562  //dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::fetch_optionals get extrafields data for ".$this->table_element, LOG_DEBUG); // Too verbose
5563  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5564  if ($resql) {
5565  $numrows = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
5566  if ($numrows) {
5567  $i = 0;
5568  while ($i < $numrows) {
5569  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
5570  $key = $obj->property;
5571  $value = $obj->value;
5572  $codelang = $obj->lang;
5573  $type = $this->fields[$key]['type'];
5574 
5575  // we can add this attribute to object
5576  if (preg_match('/date/', $type)) {
5577  $this->array_languages[$key][$codelang] = $this->db->jdate($value);
5578  } else {
5579  $this->array_languages[$key][$codelang] = $value;
5580  }
5581 
5582  $i++;
5583  }
5584  }
5585 
5586  $this->db->free($resql);
5587 
5588  if ($numrows) {
5589  return $numrows;
5590  } else {
5591  return 0;
5592  }
5593  } else {
5594  dol_print_error($this->db);
5595  return -1;
5596  }
5597  }
5598 
5605  public function setValuesForExtraLanguages($onlykey = '')
5606  {
5607  global $_POST, $langs;
5608 
5609  // Get extra fields
5610  foreach ($_POST as $postfieldkey => $postfieldvalue) {
5611  $tmparray = explode('-', $postfieldkey);
5612  if ($tmparray[0] != 'field') {
5613  continue;
5614  }
5615 
5616  $element = $tmparray[1];
5617  $key = $tmparray[2];
5618  $codelang = $tmparray[3];
5619  //var_dump("postfieldkey=".$postfieldkey." element=".$element." key=".$key." codelang=".$codelang);
5620 
5621  if (!empty($onlykey) && $key != $onlykey) {
5622  continue;
5623  }
5624  if ($element != $this->element) {
5625  continue;
5626  }
5627 
5628  $key_type = $this->fields[$key]['type'];
5629 
5630  $enabled = 1;
5631  if (isset($this->fields[$key]['enabled'])) {
5632  $enabled = dol_eval($this->fields[$key]['enabled'], 1);
5633  }
5634  /*$perms = 1;
5635  if (isset($this->fields[$key]['perms']))
5636  {
5637  $perms = dol_eval($this->fields[$key]['perms'], 1);
5638  }*/
5639  if (empty($enabled)) {
5640  continue;
5641  }
5642  //if (empty($perms)) continue;
5643 
5644  if (in_array($key_type, array('date'))) {
5645  // Clean parameters
5646  // TODO GMT date in memory must be GMT so we should add gm=true in parameters
5647  $value_key = dol_mktime(0, 0, 0, $_POST[$postfieldkey."month"], $_POST[$postfieldkey."day"], $_POST[$postfieldkey."year"]);
5648  } elseif (in_array($key_type, array('datetime'))) {
5649  // Clean parameters
5650  // TODO GMT date in memory must be GMT so we should add gm=true in parameters
5651  $value_key = dol_mktime($_POST[$postfieldkey."hour"], $_POST[$postfieldkey."min"], 0, $_POST[$postfieldkey."month"], $_POST[$postfieldkey."day"], $_POST[$postfieldkey."year"]);
5652  } elseif (in_array($key_type, array('checkbox', 'chkbxlst'))) {
5653  $value_arr = GETPOST($postfieldkey, 'array'); // check if an array
5654  if (!empty($value_arr)) {
5655  $value_key = implode(',', $value_arr);
5656  } else {
5657  $value_key = '';
5658  }
5659  } elseif (in_array($key_type, array('price', 'double'))) {
5660  $value_arr = GETPOST($postfieldkey, 'alpha');
5661  $value_key = price2num($value_arr);
5662  } else {
5663  $value_key = GETPOST($postfieldkey);
5664  if (in_array($key_type, array('link')) && $value_key == '-1') {
5665  $value_key = '';
5666  }
5667  }
5668 
5669  $this->array_languages[$key][$codelang] = $value_key;
5670 
5671  /*if ($nofillrequired) {
5672  $langs->load('errors');
5673  setEventMessages($langs->trans('ErrorFieldsRequired').' : '.implode(', ', $error_field_required), null, 'errors');
5674  return -1;
5675  }*/
5676  }
5677 
5678  return 1;
5679  }
5680 
5681 
5682  /* Functions for extrafields */
5683 
5690  public function fetchNoCompute($id)
5691  {
5692  global $conf;
5693 
5694  $savDisableCompute = $conf->disable_compute;
5695  $conf->disable_compute = 1;
5696 
5697  $ret = $this->fetch($id);
5698 
5699  $conf->disable_compute = $savDisableCompute;
5700 
5701  return $ret;
5702  }
5703 
5704  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5714  public function fetch_optionals($rowid = null, $optionsArray = null)
5715  {
5716  // phpcs:enable
5717  global $conf, $extrafields;
5718 
5719  if (empty($rowid)) {
5720  $rowid = $this->id;
5721  }
5722  if (empty($rowid) && isset($this->rowid)) {
5723  $rowid = $this->rowid; // deprecated
5724  }
5725 
5726  // To avoid SQL errors. Probably not the better solution though
5727  if (!$this->table_element) {
5728  return 0;
5729  }
5730 
5731  $this->array_options = array();
5732 
5733  if (!is_array($optionsArray)) {
5734  // If $extrafields is not a known object, we initialize it. Best practice is to have $extrafields defined into card.php or list.php page.
5735  if (!isset($extrafields) || !is_object($extrafields)) {
5736  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extrafields.class.php';
5737  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($this->db);
5738  }
5739 
5740  // Load array of extrafields for elementype = $this->table_element
5741  if (empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['loaded'])) {
5742  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($this->table_element);
5743  }
5744  $optionsArray = (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label']) ? $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label'] : null);
5745  } else {
5746  global $extrafields;
5747  dol_syslog("Warning: fetch_optionals was called with param optionsArray defined when you should pass null now", LOG_WARNING);
5748  }
5749 
5750  $table_element = $this->table_element;
5751  if ($table_element == 'categorie') {
5752  $table_element = 'categories'; // For compatibility
5753  }
5754 
5755  // Request to get complementary values
5756  if (is_array($optionsArray) && count($optionsArray) > 0) {
5757  $sql = "SELECT rowid";
5758  foreach ($optionsArray as $name => $label) {
5759  if (empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$name]) || $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$name] != 'separate') {
5760  $sql .= ", ".$name;
5761  }
5762  }
5763  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table_element."_extrafields";
5764  $sql .= " WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $rowid);
5765 
5766  //dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::fetch_optionals get extrafields data for ".$this->table_element, LOG_DEBUG); // Too verbose
5767  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5768  if ($resql) {
5769  $numrows = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
5770  if ($numrows) {
5771  $tab = $this->db->fetch_array($resql);
5772 
5773  foreach ($tab as $key => $value) {
5774  // Test fetch_array ! is_int($key) because fetch_array result is a mix table with Key as alpha and Key as int (depend db engine)
5775  if ($key != 'rowid' && $key != 'tms' && $key != 'fk_member' && !is_int($key)) {
5776  // we can add this attribute to object
5777  if (!empty($extrafields) && in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('date', 'datetime'))) {
5778  //var_dump($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key]);
5779  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = $this->db->jdate($value);
5780  } else {
5781  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = $value;
5782  }
5783 
5784  //var_dump('key '.$key.' '.$value.' type='.$extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key].' '.$this->array_options["options_".$key]);
5785  }
5786  }
5787 
5788  // If field is a computed field, value must become result of compute
5789  foreach ($tab as $key => $value) {
5790  if (!empty($extrafields) && !empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['computed'][$key])) {
5791  //var_dump($conf->disable_compute);
5792  if (empty($conf->disable_compute)) {
5793  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = dol_eval($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['computed'][$key], 1, 0);
5794  }
5795  }
5796  }
5797  }
5798 
5799  $this->db->free($resql);
5800 
5801  if ($numrows) {
5802  return $numrows;
5803  } else {
5804  return 0;
5805  }
5806  } else {
5807  $this->errors[]=$this->db->lasterror;
5808  return -1;
5809  }
5810  }
5811  return 0;
5812  }
5813 
5820  public function deleteExtraFields()
5821  {
5822  global $conf;
5823 
5824  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_DISABLED)) {
5825  return 0;
5826  }
5827 
5828  $this->db->begin();
5829 
5830  $table_element = $this->table_element;
5831  if ($table_element == 'categorie') {
5832  $table_element = 'categories'; // For compatibility
5833  }
5834 
5835  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::deleteExtraFields delete", LOG_DEBUG);
5836 
5837  $sql_del = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table_element."_extrafields WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $this->id);
5838 
5839  $resql = $this->db->query($sql_del);
5840  if (!$resql) {
5841  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
5842  $this->db->rollback();
5843  return -1;
5844  } else {
5845  $this->db->commit();
5846  return 1;
5847  }
5848  }
5849 
5860  public function insertExtraFields($trigger = '', $userused = null)
5861  {
5862  global $conf, $langs, $user;
5863 
5864  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_DISABLED)) {
5865  return 0;
5866  }
5867 
5868  if (empty($userused)) {
5869  $userused = $user;
5870  }
5871 
5872  $error = 0;
5873 
5874  if (!empty($this->array_options)) {
5875  // Check parameters
5876  $langs->load('admin');
5877  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extrafields.class.php';
5878  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($this->db);
5879  $target_extrafields = $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($this->table_element);
5880 
5881  // Eliminate copied source object extra fields that do not exist in target object
5882  $new_array_options = array();
5883  foreach ($this->array_options as $key => $value) {
5884  if (in_array(substr($key, 8), array_keys($target_extrafields))) { // We remove the 'options_' from $key for test
5885  $new_array_options[$key] = $value;
5886  } elseif (in_array($key, array_keys($target_extrafields))) { // We test on $key that does not contains the 'options_' prefix
5887  $new_array_options['options_'.$key] = $value;
5888  }
5889  }
5890 
5891  foreach ($new_array_options as $key => $value) {
5892  $attributeKey = substr($key, 8); // Remove 'options_' prefix
5893  $attributeType = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$attributeKey];
5894  $attributeLabel = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label'][$attributeKey];
5895  $attributeParam = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['param'][$attributeKey];
5896  $attributeRequired = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['required'][$attributeKey];
5897  $attrfieldcomputed = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['computed'][$attributeKey];
5898 
5899  // Similar code than into insertExtraFields
5900  if ($attributeRequired) {
5901  $mandatorypb = false;
5902  if ($attributeType == 'link' && $this->array_options[$key] == '-1') {
5903  $mandatorypb = true;
5904  }
5905  if ($this->array_options[$key] === '') {
5906  $mandatorypb = true;
5907  }
5908  if ($attributeType == 'sellist' && $this->array_options[$key] == '0') {
5909  $mandatorypb = true;
5910  }
5911  if ($mandatorypb) {
5912  $langs->load("errors");
5913  dol_syslog("Mandatory field '".$key."' is empty during create and set to required into definition of extrafields");
5914  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans('ErrorFieldRequired', $attributeLabel);
5915  return -1;
5916  }
5917  }
5918 
5919  //dol_syslog("attributeLabel=".$attributeLabel, LOG_DEBUG);
5920  //dol_syslog("attributeType=".$attributeType, LOG_DEBUG);
5921 
5922  if (!empty($attrfieldcomputed)) {
5923  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_STORE_COMPUTED_EXTRAFIELDS)) {
5924  $value = dol_eval($attrfieldcomputed, 1, 0);
5925  dol_syslog($langs->trans("Extrafieldcomputed")." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value.")", LOG_DEBUG);
5926  $new_array_options[$key] = $value;
5927  } else {
5928  $new_array_options[$key] = null;
5929  }
5930  }
5931 
5932  switch ($attributeType) {
5933  case 'int':
5934  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
5935  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
5936  return -1;
5937  } elseif ($value == '') {
5938  $new_array_options[$key] = null;
5939  }
5940  break;
5941  case 'price':
5942  case 'double':
5943  $value = price2num($value);
5944  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
5945  dol_syslog($langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue")." for ".$attributeLabel."(".$value."is not '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
5946  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
5947  return -1;
5948  } elseif ($value == '') {
5949  $new_array_options[$key] = null;
5950  }
5951  //dol_syslog("double value"." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value." is '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
5952  $new_array_options[$key] = $value;
5953  break;
5954  /*case 'select': // Not required, we chosed value='0' for undefined values
5955  if ($value=='-1')
5956  {
5957  $this->array_options[$key] = null;
5958  }
5959  break;*/
5960  case 'password':
5961  $algo = '';
5962  if ($this->array_options[$key] != '' && is_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['param'][$attributeKey]['options'])) {
5963  // If there is an encryption choice, we use it to crypt data before insert
5964  $tmparrays = array_keys($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['param'][$attributeKey]['options']);
5965  $algo = reset($tmparrays);
5966  if ($algo != '') {
5967  //global $action; // $action may be 'create', 'update', 'update_extras'...
5968  //var_dump($action);
5969  //var_dump($this->oldcopy);exit;
5970  if (is_object($this->oldcopy)) { // If this->oldcopy is not defined, we can't know if we change attribute or not, so we must keep value
5971  //var_dump($this->oldcopy->array_options[$key]); var_dump($this->array_options[$key]);
5972  if ($this->array_options[$key] == $this->oldcopy->array_options[$key]) { // If old value crypted in database is same than submited new value, it means we don't change it, so we don't update.
5973  $new_array_options[$key] = $this->array_options[$key]; // Value is kept
5974  } else {
5975  // var_dump($algo);
5976  $newvalue = dol_hash($this->array_options[$key], $algo);
5977  $new_array_options[$key] = $newvalue;
5978  }
5979  } else {
5980  $new_array_options[$key] = $this->array_options[$key]; // Value is kept
5981  }
5982  }
5983  } else // Common usage
5984  {
5985  $new_array_options[$key] = $this->array_options[$key];
5986  }
5987  break;
5988  case 'date':
5989  case 'datetime':
5990  // If data is a string instead of a timestamp, we convert it
5991  if (!is_int($this->array_options[$key])) {
5992  $this->array_options[$key] = strtotime($this->array_options[$key]);
5993  }
5994  $new_array_options[$key] = $this->db->idate($this->array_options[$key]);
5995  break;
5996  case 'link':
5997  $param_list = array_keys($attributeParam['options']);
5998  // 0 : ObjectName
5999  // 1 : classPath
6000  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
6001  dol_include_once($InfoFieldList[1]);
6002  if ($InfoFieldList[0] && class_exists($InfoFieldList[0])) {
6003  if ($value == '-1') { // -1 is key for no defined in combo list of objects
6004  $new_array_options[$key] = '';
6005  } elseif ($value) {
6006  $object = new $InfoFieldList[0]($this->db);
6007  if (is_numeric($value)) {
6008  $res = $object->fetch($value); // Common case
6009  } else {
6010  $res = $object->fetch('', $value); // For compatibility
6011  }
6012 
6013  if ($res > 0) {
6014  $new_array_options[$key] = $object->id;
6015  } else {
6016  $this->error = "Id/Ref '".$value."' for object '".$object->element."' not found";
6017  $this->db->rollback();
6018  return -1;
6019  }
6020  }
6021  } else {
6022  dol_syslog('Error bad setup of extrafield', LOG_WARNING);
6023  }
6024  break;
6025  }
6026  }
6027 
6028  $this->db->begin();
6029 
6030  $table_element = $this->table_element;
6031  if ($table_element == 'categorie') {
6032  $table_element = 'categories'; // For compatibility
6033  }
6034 
6035  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::insertExtraFields delete then insert", LOG_DEBUG);
6036 
6037  $sql_del = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table_element."_extrafields WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $this->id);
6038  $this->db->query($sql_del);
6039 
6040  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table_element."_extrafields (fk_object";
6041  foreach ($new_array_options as $key => $value) {
6042  $attributeKey = substr($key, 8); // Remove 'options_' prefix
6043  // Add field of attribut
6044  if ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$attributeKey] != 'separate') { // Only for other type than separator
6045  $sql .= ",".$attributeKey;
6046  }
6047  }
6048  // We must insert a default value for fields for other entities that are mandatory to avoid not null error
6049  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities']) && is_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities'])) {
6050  foreach ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities'] as $tmpkey => $tmpval) {
6051  if (!isset($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$tmpkey])) { // If field not already added previously
6052  $sql .= ",".$tmpkey;
6053  }
6054  }
6055  }
6056  $sql .= ") VALUES (".$this->id;
6057 
6058  foreach ($new_array_options as $key => $value) {
6059  $attributeKey = substr($key, 8); // Remove 'options_' prefix
6060  // Add field of attribute
6061  if ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$attributeKey] != 'separate') { // Only for other type than separator)
6062  if ($new_array_options[$key] != '' || $new_array_options[$key] == '0') {
6063  $sql .= ",'".$this->db->escape($new_array_options[$key])."'";
6064  } else {
6065  $sql .= ",null";
6066  }
6067  }
6068  }
6069  // We must insert a default value for fields for other entities that are mandatory to avoid not null error
6070  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities']) && is_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities'])) {
6071  foreach ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities'] as $tmpkey => $tmpval) {
6072  if (!isset($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$tmpkey])) { // If field not already added previously
6073  if (in_array($tmpval, array('int', 'double', 'price'))) {
6074  $sql .= ", 0";
6075  } else {
6076  $sql .= ", ''";
6077  }
6078  }
6079  }
6080  }
6081 
6082  $sql .= ")";
6083 
6084  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6085  if (!$resql) {
6086  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
6087  $error++;
6088  }
6089 
6090  if (!$error && $trigger) {
6091  // Call trigger
6092  $this->context = array('extrafieldaddupdate'=>1);
6093  $result = $this->call_trigger($trigger, $userused);
6094  if ($result < 0) {
6095  $error++;
6096  }
6097  // End call trigger
6098  }
6099 
6100  if ($error) {
6101  $this->db->rollback();
6102  return -1;
6103  } else {
6104  $this->db->commit();
6105  return 1;
6106  }
6107  } else {
6108  return 0;
6109  }
6110  }
6111 
6122  public function insertExtraLanguages($trigger = '', $userused = null)
6123  {
6124  global $conf, $langs, $user;
6125 
6126  if (empty($userused)) {
6127  $userused = $user;
6128  }
6129 
6130  $error = 0;
6131 
6132  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRALANGUAGES_DISABLED)) {
6133  return 0; // For avoid conflicts if trigger used
6134  }
6135 
6136  if (is_array($this->array_languages)) {
6137  $new_array_languages = $this->array_languages;
6138 
6139  foreach ($new_array_languages as $key => $value) {
6140  $attributeKey = $key;
6141  $attributeType = $this->fields[$attributeKey]['type'];
6142  $attributeLabel = $this->fields[$attributeKey]['label'];
6143 
6144  //dol_syslog("attributeLabel=".$attributeLabel, LOG_DEBUG);
6145  //dol_syslog("attributeType=".$attributeType, LOG_DEBUG);
6146 
6147  switch ($attributeType) {
6148  case 'int':
6149  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
6150  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraLanguageHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
6151  return -1;
6152  } elseif ($value == '') {
6153  $new_array_languages[$key] = null;
6154  }
6155  break;
6156  case 'double':
6157  $value = price2num($value);
6158  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
6159  dol_syslog($langs->trans("ExtraLanguageHasWrongValue")." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value."is not '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
6160  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraLanguageHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
6161  return -1;
6162  } elseif ($value == '') {
6163  $new_array_languages[$key] = null;
6164  }
6165  //dol_syslog("double value"." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value." is '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
6166  $new_array_languages[$key] = $value;
6167  break;
6168  /*case 'select': // Not required, we chosed value='0' for undefined values
6169  if ($value=='-1')
6170  {
6171  $this->array_options[$key] = null;
6172  }
6173  break;*/
6174  }
6175  }
6176 
6177  $this->db->begin();
6178 
6179  $table_element = $this->table_element;
6180  if ($table_element == 'categorie') {
6181  $table_element = 'categories'; // For compatibility
6182  }
6183 
6184  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::insertExtraLanguages delete then insert", LOG_DEBUG);
6185 
6186  foreach ($new_array_languages as $key => $langcodearray) { // $key = 'name', 'town', ...
6187  foreach ($langcodearray as $langcode => $value) {
6188  $sql_del = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."object_lang";
6189  $sql_del .= " WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $this->id)." AND property = '".$this->db->escape($key)."' AND type_object = '".$this->db->escape($table_element)."'";
6190  $sql_del .= " AND lang = '".$this->db->escape($langcode)."'";
6191  $this->db->query($sql_del);
6192 
6193  if ($value !== '') {
6194  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."object_lang (fk_object, property, type_object, lang, value";
6195  $sql .= ") VALUES (".$this->id.", '".$this->db->escape($key)."', '".$this->db->escape($table_element)."', '".$this->db->escape($langcode)."', '".$this->db->escape($value)."'";
6196  $sql .= ")";
6197 
6198  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6199  if (!$resql) {
6200  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
6201  $error++;
6202  break;
6203  }
6204  }
6205  }
6206  }
6207 
6208  if (!$error && $trigger) {
6209  // Call trigger
6210  $this->context = array('extralanguagesaddupdate'=>1);
6211  $result = $this->call_trigger($trigger, $userused);
6212  if ($result < 0) {
6213  $error++;
6214  }
6215  // End call trigger
6216  }
6217 
6218  if ($error) {
6219  $this->db->rollback();
6220  return -1;
6221  } else {
6222  $this->db->commit();
6223  return 1;
6224  }
6225  } else {
6226  return 0;
6227  }
6228  }
6229 
6240  public function updateExtraField($key, $trigger = null, $userused = null)
6241  {
6242  global $conf, $langs, $user;
6243 
6244  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_DISABLED)) {
6245  return 0;
6246  }
6247 
6248  if (empty($userused)) {
6249  $userused = $user;
6250  }
6251 
6252  $error = 0;
6253 
6254  if (!empty($this->array_options) && isset($this->array_options["options_".$key])) {
6255  // Check parameters
6256  $langs->load('admin');
6257  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extrafields.class.php';
6258  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($this->db);
6259  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($this->table_element);
6260 
6261  $value = $this->array_options["options_".$key];
6262 
6263  $attributeType = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key];
6264  $attributeLabel = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label'][$key];
6265  $attributeParam = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['param'][$key];
6266  $attributeRequired = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['required'][$key];
6267  $attrfieldcomputed = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['computed'][$key];
6268 
6269  // Similar code than into insertExtraFields
6270  if ($attributeRequired) {
6271  $mandatorypb = false;
6272  if ($attributeType == 'link' && $this->array_options["options_".$key] == '-1') {
6273  $mandatorypb = true;
6274  }
6275  if ($this->array_options["options_".$key] === '') {
6276  $mandatorypb = true;
6277  }
6278  if ($mandatorypb) {
6279  $langs->load("errors");
6280  dol_syslog("Mandatory field 'options_".$key."' is empty during update and set to required into definition of extrafields");
6281  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans('ErrorFieldRequired', $attributeLabel);
6282  return -1;
6283  }
6284  }
6285 
6286  //dol_syslog("attributeLabel=".$attributeLabel, LOG_DEBUG);
6287  //dol_syslog("attributeType=".$attributeType, LOG_DEBUG);
6288 
6289  if (!empty($attrfieldcomputed)) {
6290  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_STORE_COMPUTED_EXTRAFIELDS)) {
6291  $value = dol_eval($attrfieldcomputed, 1, 0);
6292  dol_syslog($langs->trans("Extrafieldcomputed")." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value.")", LOG_DEBUG);
6293  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = $value;
6294  } else {
6295  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = null;
6296  }
6297  }
6298 
6299  switch ($attributeType) {
6300  case 'int':
6301  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
6302  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
6303  return -1;
6304  } elseif ($value === '') {
6305  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = null;
6306  }
6307  break;
6308  case 'double':
6309  $value = price2num($value);
6310  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
6311  dol_syslog($langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue")." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value."is not '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
6312  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
6313  return -1;
6314  } elseif ($value === '') {
6315  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = null;
6316  }
6317  //dol_syslog("double value"." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value." is '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
6318  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = $value;
6319  break;
6320  /*case 'select': // Not required, we chosed value='0' for undefined values
6321  if ($value=='-1')
6322  {
6323  $this->array_options[$key] = null;
6324  }
6325  break;*/
6326  case 'price':
6327  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = price2num($this->array_options["options_".$key]);
6328  break;
6329  case 'date':
6330  case 'datetime':
6331  if (empty($this->array_options["options_".$key])) {
6332  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = null;
6333  } else {
6334  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = $this->db->idate($this->array_options["options_".$key]);
6335  }
6336  break;
6337  /*
6338  case 'link':
6339  $param_list = array_keys($attributeParam['options']);
6340  // 0 : ObjectName
6341  // 1 : classPath
6342  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
6343  dol_include_once($InfoFieldList[1]);
6344  if ($InfoFieldList[0] && class_exists($InfoFieldList[0]))
6345  {
6346  if ($value == '-1') // -1 is key for no defined in combo list of objects
6347  {
6348  $new_array_options[$key] = '';
6349  } elseif ($value) {
6350  $object = new $InfoFieldList[0]($this->db);
6351  if (is_numeric($value)) $res = $object->fetch($value); // Common case
6352  else $res = $object->fetch('', $value); // For compatibility
6353 
6354  if ($res > 0) $new_array_options[$key] = $object->id;
6355  else {
6356  $this->error = "Id/Ref '".$value."' for object '".$object->element."' not found";
6357  $this->db->rollback();
6358  return -1;
6359  }
6360  }
6361  } else {
6362  dol_syslog('Error bad setup of extrafield', LOG_WARNING);
6363  }
6364  break;
6365  */
6366  }
6367 
6368  $this->db->begin();
6369 
6370  $linealreadyfound = 0;
6371 
6372  // Check if there is already a line for this object (in most cases, it is, but sometimes it is not, for example when extra field has been created after), so we must keep this overload)
6373  $sql = "SELECT COUNT(rowid) as nb FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element."_extrafields WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $this->id);
6374  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6375  if ($resql) {
6376  $tmpobj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
6377  if ($tmpobj) {
6378  $linealreadyfound = $tmpobj->nb;
6379  }
6380  }
6381 
6382  if ($linealreadyfound) {
6383  if ($this->array_options["options_".$key] === null) {
6384  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element."_extrafields SET ".$key." = null";
6385  } else {
6386  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element."_extrafields SET ".$key." = '".$this->db->escape($this->array_options["options_".$key])."'";
6387  }
6388  $sql .= " WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $this->id);
6389  } else {
6390  $result = $this->insertExtraFields('', $user);
6391  if ($result < 0) {
6392  $error++;
6393  }
6394  }
6395 
6396  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6397  if (!$resql) {
6398  $error++;
6399  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
6400  }
6401  if (!$error && $trigger) {
6402  // Call trigger
6403  $this->context = array('extrafieldupdate'=>1);
6404  $result = $this->call_trigger($trigger, $userused);
6405  if ($result < 0) {
6406  $error++;
6407  }
6408  // End call trigger
6409  }
6410 
6411  if ($error) {
6412  dol_syslog(__METHOD__.$this->error, LOG_ERR);
6413  $this->db->rollback();
6414  return -1;
6415  } else {
6416  $this->db->commit();
6417  return 1;
6418  }
6419  } else {
6420  return 0;
6421  }
6422  }
6423 
6434  public function updateExtraLanguages($key, $trigger = null, $userused = null)
6435  {
6436  global $conf, $langs, $user;
6437 
6438  if (empty($userused)) {
6439  $userused = $user;
6440  }
6441 
6442  $error = 0;
6443 
6444  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRALANGUAGES_DISABLED)) {
6445  return 0; // For avoid conflicts if trigger used
6446  }
6447 
6448  return 0;
6449  }
6450 
6451 
6466  public function showInputField($val, $key, $value, $moreparam = '', $keysuffix = '', $keyprefix = '', $morecss = 0, $nonewbutton = 0)
6467  {
6468  global $conf, $langs, $form;
6469 
6470  if (!is_object($form)) {
6471  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/html.form.class.php';
6472  $form = new Form($this->db);
6473  }
6474 
6475  if (!empty($this->fields)) {
6476  $val = $this->fields[$key];
6477  }
6478 
6479  // Validation tests and output
6480  $fieldValidationErrorMsg = '';
6481  $validationClass = '';
6482  $fieldValidationErrorMsg = $this->getFieldError($key);
6483  if (!empty($fieldValidationErrorMsg)) {
6484  $validationClass = ' --error'; // the -- is use as class state in css : .--error can't be be defined alone it must be define with another class like .my-class.--error or input.--error
6485  } else {
6486  $validationClass = ' --success'; // the -- is use as class state in css : .--success can't be be defined alone it must be define with another class like .my-class.--success or input.--success
6487  }
6488 
6489  $out = '';
6490  $type = '';
6491  $isDependList=0;
6492  $param = array();
6493  $param['options'] = array();
6494  $reg = array();
6495  $size = !empty($this->fields[$key]['size']) ? $this->fields[$key]['size'] : 0;
6496  // Because we work on extrafields
6497  if (preg_match('/^(integer|link):(.*):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6498  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4].':'.$reg[5] => 'N');
6499  $type = 'link';
6500  } elseif (preg_match('/^(integer|link):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6501  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4] => 'N');
6502  $type = 'link';
6503  } elseif (preg_match('/^(integer|link):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6504  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3] => 'N');
6505  $type = 'link';
6506  } elseif (preg_match('/^(sellist):(.*):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6507  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4].':'.$reg[5] => 'N');
6508  $type = 'sellist';
6509  } elseif (preg_match('/^(sellist):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6510  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4] => 'N');
6511  $type = 'sellist';
6512  } elseif (preg_match('/^(sellist):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6513  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3] => 'N');
6514  $type = 'sellist';
6515  } elseif (preg_match('/varchar\((\d+)\)/', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6516  $param['options'] = array();
6517  $type = 'varchar';
6518  $size = $reg[1];
6519  } elseif (preg_match('/varchar/', $val['type'])) {
6520  $param['options'] = array();
6521  $type = 'varchar';
6522  } else {
6523  $param['options'] = array();
6524  $type = $this->fields[$key]['type'];
6525  }
6526 
6527  // Special case that force options and type ($type can be integer, varchar, ...)
6528  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['arrayofkeyval']) && is_array($this->fields[$key]['arrayofkeyval'])) {
6529  $param['options'] = $this->fields[$key]['arrayofkeyval'];
6530  $type = 'select';
6531  }
6532 
6533  $label = $this->fields[$key]['label'];
6534  //$elementtype=$this->fields[$key]['elementtype']; // Seems not used
6535  $default = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['default']) ? $this->fields[$key]['default'] : '');
6536  $computed = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['computed']) ? $this->fields[$key]['computed'] : '');
6537  $unique = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['unique']) ? $this->fields[$key]['unique'] : 0);
6538  $required = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['required']) ? $this->fields[$key]['required'] : 0);
6539  $autofocusoncreate = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['autofocusoncreate']) ? $this->fields[$key]['autofocusoncreate'] : 0);
6540 
6541  $langfile = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['langfile']) ? $this->fields[$key]['langfile'] : '');
6542  $list = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['list']) ? $this->fields[$key]['list'] : 0);
6543  $hidden = (in_array(abs($this->fields[$key]['visible']), array(0, 2)) ? 1 : 0);
6544 
6545  $objectid = $this->id;
6546 
6547  if ($computed) {
6548  if (!preg_match('/^search_/', $keyprefix)) {
6549  return '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("AutomaticallyCalculated").'</span>';
6550  } else {
6551  return '';
6552  }
6553  }
6554 
6555  // Set value of $morecss. For this, we use in priority showsize from parameters, then $val['css'] then autodefine
6556  if (empty($morecss) && !empty($val['css'])) {
6557  $morecss = $val['css'];
6558  } elseif (empty($morecss)) {
6559  if ($type == 'date') {
6560  $morecss = 'minwidth100imp';
6561  } elseif ($type == 'datetime' || $type == 'link') { // link means an foreign key to another primary id
6562  $morecss = 'minwidth200imp';
6563  } elseif (in_array($type, array('int', 'integer', 'price')) || preg_match('/^double(\([0-9],[0-9]\)){0,1}/', $type)) {
6564  $morecss = 'maxwidth75';
6565  } elseif ($type == 'url') {
6566  $morecss = 'minwidth400';
6567  } elseif ($type == 'boolean') {
6568  $morecss = '';
6569  } else {
6570  if (round($size) < 12) {
6571  $morecss = 'minwidth100';
6572  } elseif (round($size) <= 48) {
6573  $morecss = 'minwidth200';
6574  } else {
6575  $morecss = 'minwidth400';
6576  }
6577  }
6578  }
6579 
6580  // Add validation state class
6581  if (!empty($validationClass)) {
6582  $morecss.= ' '.$validationClass;
6583  }
6584 
6585  if (in_array($type, array('date'))) {
6586  $tmp = explode(',', $size);
6587  $newsize = $tmp[0];
6588  $showtime = 0;
6589 
6590  // Do not show current date when field not required (see selectDate() method)
6591  if (!$required && $value == '') {
6592  $value = '-1';
6593  }
6594 
6595  // TODO Must also support $moreparam
6596  $out = $form->selectDate($value, $keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $showtime, $showtime, $required, '', 1, (($keyprefix != 'search_' && $keyprefix != 'search_options_') ? 1 : 0), 0, 1);
6597  } elseif (in_array($type, array('datetime'))) {
6598  $tmp = explode(',', $size);
6599  $newsize = $tmp[0];
6600  $showtime = 1;
6601 
6602  // Do not show current date when field not required (see selectDate() method)
6603  if (!$required && $value == '') $value = '-1';
6604 
6605  // TODO Must also support $moreparam
6606  $out = $form->selectDate($value, $keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $showtime, $showtime, $required, '', 1, (($keyprefix != 'search_' && $keyprefix != 'search_options_') ? 1 : 0), 0, 1, '', '', '', 1, '', '', 'tzuserrel');
6607  } elseif (in_array($type, array('duration'))) {
6608  $out = $form->select_duration($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $value, 0, 'text', 0, 1);
6609  } elseif (in_array($type, array('int', 'integer'))) {
6610  $tmp = explode(',', $size);
6611  $newsize = $tmp[0];
6612  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'"'.($newsize > 0 ? ' maxlength="'.$newsize.'"' : '').' value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'"'.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').($autofocusoncreate ? ' autofocus' : '').'>';
6613  } elseif (in_array($type, array('real'))) {
6614  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'"'.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').($autofocusoncreate ? ' autofocus' : '').'>';
6615  } elseif (preg_match('/varchar/', $type)) {
6616  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'"'.($size > 0 ? ' maxlength="'.$size.'"' : '').' value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'"'.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').($autofocusoncreate ? ' autofocus' : '').'>';
6617  } elseif (in_array($type, array('mail', 'phone', 'url'))) {
6618  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').($autofocusoncreate ? ' autofocus' : '').'>';
6619  } elseif (preg_match('/^text/', $type)) {
6620  if (!preg_match('/search_/', $keyprefix)) { // If keyprefix is search_ or search_options_, we must just use a simple text field
6621  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/doleditor.class.php';
6622  $doleditor = new DolEditor($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $value, '', 200, 'dolibarr_notes', 'In', false, false, false, ROWS_5, '90%');
6623  $out = $doleditor->Create(1);
6624  } else {
6625  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
6626  }
6627  } elseif (preg_match('/^html/', $type)) {
6628  if (!preg_match('/search_/', $keyprefix)) { // If keyprefix is search_ or search_options_, we must just use a simple text field
6629  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/doleditor.class.php';
6630  $doleditor = new DolEditor($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $value, '', 200, 'dolibarr_notes', 'In', false, false, !empty($conf->fckeditor->enabled) && $conf->global->FCKEDITOR_ENABLE_SOCIETE, ROWS_5, '90%');
6631  $out = $doleditor->Create(1);
6632  } else {
6633  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
6634  }
6635  } elseif ($type == 'boolean') {
6636  $checked = '';
6637  if (!empty($value)) {
6638  $checked = ' checked value="1" ';
6639  } else {
6640  $checked = ' value="1" ';
6641  }
6642  $out = '<input type="checkbox" class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" '.$checked.' '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
6643  } elseif ($type == 'price') {
6644  if (!empty($value)) { // $value in memory is a php numeric, we format it into user number format.
6645  $value = price($value);
6646  }
6647  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.$value.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'> '.$langs->getCurrencySymbol($conf->currency);
6648  } elseif (preg_match('/^double(\([0-9],[0-9]\)){0,1}/', $type)) {
6649  if (!empty($value)) { // $value in memory is a php numeric, we format it into user number format.
6650  $value = price($value);
6651  }
6652  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.$value.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'> ';
6653  } elseif ($type == 'select') {
6654  $out = '';
6655  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_DISABLE_SELECT2)) {
6656  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
6657  $out .= ajax_combobox($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, array(), 0);
6658  }
6659 
6660  $out .= '<select class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
6661  if ((!isset($this->fields[$key]['default'])) || ($this->fields[$key]['notnull'] != 1)) {
6662  $out .= '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
6663  }
6664  foreach ($param['options'] as $key => $val) {
6665  if ((string) $key == '') {
6666  continue;
6667  }
6668  list($val, $parent) = explode('|', $val);
6669  $out .= '<option value="'.$key.'"';
6670  $out .= (((string) $value == (string) $key) ? ' selected' : '');
6671  $out .= (!empty($parent) ? ' parent="'.$parent.'"' : '');
6672  $out .= '>'.$val.'</option>';
6673  }
6674  $out .= '</select>';
6675  } elseif ($type == 'sellist') {
6676  $out = '';
6677  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_DISABLE_SELECT2)) {
6678  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
6679  $out .= ajax_combobox($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, array(), 0);
6680  }
6681 
6682  $out .= '<select class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
6683  if (is_array($param['options'])) {
6684  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']);
6685  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
6686  $parentName = '';
6687  $parentField = '';
6688  // 0 : tableName
6689  // 1 : label field name
6690  // 2 : key fields name (if differ of rowid)
6691  // 3 : key field parent (for dependent lists)
6692  // 4 : where clause filter on column or table extrafield, syntax field='value' or extra.field=value
6693  $keyList = (empty($InfoFieldList[2]) ? 'rowid' : $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid');
6694 
6695  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 4 && !empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
6696  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra.') !== false) {
6697  $keyList = 'main.'.$InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
6698  } else {
6699  $keyList = $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
6700  }
6701  }
6702  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 3 && !empty($InfoFieldList[3])) {
6703  list($parentName, $parentField) = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[3]);
6704  $keyList .= ', '.$parentField;
6705  }
6706 
6707  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
6708  if (is_array($fields_label)) {
6709  $keyList .= ', ';
6710  $keyList .= implode(', ', $fields_label);
6711  }
6712 
6713  $sqlwhere = '';
6714  $sql = "SELECT ".$keyList;
6715  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$InfoFieldList[0];
6716  if (!empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
6717  // can use SELECT request
6718  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], '$SEL$') !== false) {
6719  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$SEL$', 'SELECT', $InfoFieldList[4]);
6720  }
6721 
6722  // current object id can be use into filter
6723  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], '$ID$') !== false && !empty($objectid)) {
6724  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$ID$', $objectid, $InfoFieldList[4]);
6725  } else {
6726  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$ID$', '0', $InfoFieldList[4]);
6727  }
6728 
6729  //We have to join on extrafield table
6730  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra') !== false) {
6731  $sql .= " as main, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$InfoFieldList[0]."_extrafields as extra";
6732  $sqlwhere .= " WHERE extra.fk_object=main.".$InfoFieldList[2]." AND ".$InfoFieldList[4];
6733  } else {
6734  $sqlwhere .= " WHERE ".$InfoFieldList[4];
6735  }
6736  } else {
6737  $sqlwhere .= ' WHERE 1=1';
6738  }
6739  // Some tables may have field, some other not. For the moment we disable it.
6740  if (in_array($InfoFieldList[0], array('tablewithentity'))) {
6741  $sqlwhere .= " AND entity = ".((int) $conf->entity);
6742  }
6743  $sql .= $sqlwhere;
6744  //print $sql;
6745 
6746  $sql .= ' ORDER BY '.implode(', ', $fields_label);
6747 
6748  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::showInputField type=sellist', LOG_DEBUG);
6749  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6750  if ($resql) {
6751  $out .= '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
6752  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
6753  $i = 0;
6754  while ($i < $num) {
6755  $labeltoshow = '';
6756  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
6757 
6758  // Several field into label (eq table:code|libelle:rowid)
6759  $notrans = false;
6760  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
6761  if (count($fields_label) > 1) {
6762  $notrans = true;
6763  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
6764  $labeltoshow .= $obj->$field_toshow.' ';
6765  }
6766  } else {
6767  $labeltoshow = $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]};
6768  }
6769  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($labeltoshow, 45);
6770 
6771  if ($value == $obj->rowid) {
6772  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
6773  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->$field_toshow);
6774  if ($translabel != $obj->$field_toshow) {
6775  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($translabel).' ';
6776  } else {
6777  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($obj->$field_toshow).' ';
6778  }
6779  }
6780  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>'.$labeltoshow.'</option>';
6781  } else {
6782  if (!$notrans) {
6783  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]});
6784  if ($translabel != $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}) {
6785  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($translabel, 18);
6786  } else {
6787  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]});
6788  }
6789  }
6790  if (empty($labeltoshow)) {
6791  $labeltoshow = '(not defined)';
6792  }
6793  if ($value == $obj->rowid) {
6794  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>'.$labeltoshow.'</option>';
6795  }
6796 
6797  if (!empty($InfoFieldList[3]) && $parentField) {
6798  $parent = $parentName.':'.$obj->{$parentField};
6799  $isDependList=1;
6800  }
6801
