6802  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'"';
6803  $out .= ($value == $obj->rowid ? ' selected' : '');
6804  $out .= (!empty($parent) ? ' parent="'.$parent.'"' : '');
6805  $out .= '>'.$labeltoshow.'</option>';
6806  }
6807 
6808  $i++;
6809  }
6810  $this->db->free($resql);
6811  } else {
6812  print 'Error in request '.$sql.' '.$this->db->lasterror().'. Check setup of extra parameters.<br>';
6813  }
6814  }
6815  $out .= '</select>';
6816  } elseif ($type == 'checkbox') {
6817  $value_arr = explode(',', $value);
6818  $out = $form->multiselectarray($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, (empty($param['options']) ?null:$param['options']), $value_arr, '', 0, '', 0, '100%');
6819  } elseif ($type == 'radio') {
6820  $out = '';
6821  foreach ($param['options'] as $keyopt => $val) {
6822  $out .= '<input class="flat '.$morecss.'" type="radio" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '');
6823  $out .= ' value="'.$keyopt.'"';
6824  $out .= ' id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'_'.$keyopt.'"';
6825  $out .= ($value == $keyopt ? 'checked' : '');
6826  $out .= '/><label for="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'_'.$keyopt.'">'.$val.'</label><br>';
6827  }
6828  } elseif ($type == 'chkbxlst') {
6829  if (is_array($value)) {
6830  $value_arr = $value;
6831  } else {
6832  $value_arr = explode(',', $value);
6833  }
6834 
6835  if (is_array($param['options'])) {
6836  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']);
6837  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
6838  $parentName = '';
6839  $parentField = '';
6840  // 0 : tableName
6841  // 1 : label field name
6842  // 2 : key fields name (if differ of rowid)
6843  // 3 : key field parent (for dependent lists)
6844  // 4 : where clause filter on column or table extrafield, syntax field='value' or extra.field=value
6845  $keyList = (empty($InfoFieldList[2]) ? 'rowid' : $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid');
6846 
6847  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 3 && !empty($InfoFieldList[3])) {
6848  list ($parentName, $parentField) = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[3]);
6849  $keyList .= ', '.$parentField;
6850  }
6851  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 4 && !empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
6852  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra.') !== false) {
6853  $keyList = 'main.'.$InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
6854  } else {
6855  $keyList = $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
6856  }
6857  }
6858 
6859  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
6860  if (is_array($fields_label)) {
6861  $keyList .= ', ';
6862  $keyList .= implode(', ', $fields_label);
6863  }
6864 
6865  $sqlwhere = '';
6866  $sql = "SELECT ".$keyList;
6867  $sql .= ' FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$InfoFieldList[0];
6868  if (!empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
6869  // can use SELECT request
6870  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], '$SEL$') !== false) {
6871  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$SEL$', 'SELECT', $InfoFieldList[4]);
6872  }
6873 
6874  // current object id can be use into filter
6875  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], '$ID$') !== false && !empty($objectid)) {
6876  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$ID$', $objectid, $InfoFieldList[4]);
6877  } else {
6878  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$ID$', '0', $InfoFieldList[4]);
6879  }
6880 
6881  // We have to join on extrafield table
6882  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra') !== false) {
6883  $sql .= ' as main, '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$InfoFieldList[0].'_extrafields as extra';
6884  $sqlwhere .= " WHERE extra.fk_object=main.".$InfoFieldList[2]." AND ".$InfoFieldList[4];
6885  } else {
6886  $sqlwhere .= " WHERE ".$InfoFieldList[4];
6887  }
6888  } else {
6889  $sqlwhere .= ' WHERE 1=1';
6890  }
6891  // Some tables may have field, some other not. For the moment we disable it.
6892  if (in_array($InfoFieldList[0], array('tablewithentity'))) {
6893  $sqlwhere .= " AND entity = ".((int) $conf->entity);
6894  }
6895  // $sql.=preg_replace('/^ AND /','',$sqlwhere);
6896  // print $sql;
6897 
6898  $sql .= $sqlwhere;
6899  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::showInputField type=chkbxlst', LOG_DEBUG);
6900  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6901  if ($resql) {
6902  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
6903  $i = 0;
6904 
6905  $data = array();
6906 
6907  while ($i < $num) {
6908  $labeltoshow = '';
6909  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
6910 
6911  $notrans = false;
6912  // Several field into label (eq table:code|libelle:rowid)
6913  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
6914  if (count($fields_label) > 1) {
6915  $notrans = true;
6916  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
6917  $labeltoshow .= $obj->$field_toshow.' ';
6918  }
6919  } else {
6920  $labeltoshow = $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]};
6921  }
6922  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($labeltoshow, 45);
6923 
6924  if (is_array($value_arr) && in_array($obj->rowid, $value_arr)) {
6925  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
6926  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->$field_toshow);
6927  if ($translabel != $obj->$field_toshow) {
6928  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($translabel, 18).' ';
6929  } else {
6930  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($obj->$field_toshow, 18).' ';
6931  }
6932  }
6933 
6934  $data[$obj->rowid] = $labeltoshow;
6935  } else {
6936  if (!$notrans) {
6937  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]});
6938  if ($translabel != $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}) {
6939  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($translabel, 18);
6940  } else {
6941  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}, 18);
6942  }
6943  }
6944  if (empty($labeltoshow)) {
6945  $labeltoshow = '(not defined)';
6946  }
6947 
6948  if (is_array($value_arr) && in_array($obj->rowid, $value_arr)) {
6949  $data[$obj->rowid] = $labeltoshow;
6950  }
6951 
6952  if (!empty($InfoFieldList[3]) && $parentField) {
6953  $parent = $parentName.':'.$obj->{$parentField};
6954  $isDependList=1;
6955  }
6956 
6957  $data[$obj->rowid] = $labeltoshow;
6958  }
6959 
6960  $i++;
6961  }
6962  $this->db->free($resql);
6963 
6964  $out = $form->multiselectarray($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $data, $value_arr, '', 0, '', 0, '100%');
6965  } else {
6966  print 'Error in request '.$sql.' '.$this->db->lasterror().'. Check setup of extra parameters.<br>';
6967  }
6968  }
6969  } elseif ($type == 'link') {
6970  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']); // $param_list='ObjectName:classPath[:AddCreateButtonOrNot[:Filter[:Sortfield]]]'
6971  $param_list_array = explode(':', $param_list[0]);
6972  $showempty = (($required && $default != '') ? 0 : 1);
6973 
6974  if (!preg_match('/search_/', $keyprefix)) {
6975  if (!empty($param_list_array[2])) { // If the entry into $fields is set to add a create button
6976  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['picto'])) {
6977  $morecss .= ' widthcentpercentminusxx';
6978  } else {
6979  $morecss .= ' widthcentpercentminusx';
6980  }
6981  } else {
6982  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['picto'])) {
6983  $morecss .= ' widthcentpercentminusx';
6984  }
6985  }
6986  }
6987 
6988  $out = $form->selectForForms($param_list[0], $keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $value, $showempty, '', '', $morecss, $moreparam, 0, empty($val['disabled']) ? 0 : 1);
6989 
6990  if (!empty($param_list_array[2])) { // If the entry into $fields is set to add a create button
6991  if (!GETPOSTISSET('backtopage') && empty($val['disabled']) && empty($nonewbutton)) { // To avoid to open several times the 'Create Object' button and to avoid to have button if field is protected by a "disabled".
6992  list($class, $classfile) = explode(':', $param_list[0]);
6993  if (file_exists(dol_buildpath(dirname(dirname($classfile)).'/card.php'))) {
6994  $url_path = dol_buildpath(dirname(dirname($classfile)).'/card.php', 1);
6995  } else {
6996  $url_path = dol_buildpath(dirname(dirname($classfile)).'/'.strtolower($class).'_card.php', 1);
6997  }
6998  $paramforthenewlink = '';
6999  $paramforthenewlink .= (GETPOSTISSET('action') ? '&action='.GETPOST('action', 'aZ09') : '');
7000  $paramforthenewlink .= (GETPOSTISSET('id') ? '&id='.GETPOST('id', 'int') : '');
7001  $paramforthenewlink .= '&fk_'.strtolower($class).'=--IDFORBACKTOPAGE--';
7002  // TODO Add Javascript code to add input fields already filled into $paramforthenewlink so we won't loose them when going back to main page
7003  $out .= '<a class="butActionNew" title="'.$langs->trans("New").'" href="'.$url_path.'?action=create&backtopage='.urlencode($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].($paramforthenewlink ? '?'.$paramforthenewlink : '')).'"><span class="fa fa-plus-circle valignmiddle"></span></a>';
7004  }
7005  }
7006  } elseif ($type == 'password') {
7007  // If prefix is 'search_', field is used as a filter, we use a common text field.
7008  $out = '<input type="'.($keyprefix == 'search_' ? 'text' : 'password').'" class="flat '.$morecss.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.$value.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
7009  } elseif ($type == 'array') {
7010  $newval = $val;
7011  $newval['type'] = 'varchar(256)';
7012 
7013  $out = '';
7014  if (!empty($value)) {
7015  foreach ($value as $option) {
7016  $out .= '<span><a class="'.dol_escape_htmltag($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix).'_del" href="javascript:;"><span class="fa fa-minus-circle valignmiddle"></span></a> ';
7017  $out .= $this->showInputField($newval, $keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'[]', $option, $moreparam, '', '', $morecss).'<br></span>';
7018  }
7019  }
7020  $out .= '<a id="'.dol_escape_htmltag($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix).'_add" href="javascript:;"><span class="fa fa-plus-circle valignmiddle"></span></a>';
7021 
7022  $newInput = '<span><a class="'.dol_escape_htmltag($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix).'_del" href="javascript:;"><span class="fa fa-minus-circle valignmiddle"></span></a> ';
7023  $newInput .= $this->showInputField($newval, $keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'[]', '', $moreparam, '', '', $morecss).'<br></span>';
7024 
7025  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
7026  $out .= '
7027  <script>
7028  $(document).ready(function() {
7029  $("a#'.dol_escape_js($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix).'_add").click(function() {
7030  $("'.dol_escape_js($newInput).'").insertBefore(this);
7031  });
7032 
7033  $(document).on("click", "a.'.dol_escape_js($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix).'_del", function() {
7034  $(this).parent().remove();
7035  });
7036  });
7037  </script>';
7038  }
7039  }
7040  if (!empty($hidden)) {
7041  $out = '<input type="hidden" value="'.$value.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'"/>';
7042  }
7043 
7044  if ($isDependList==1) {
7045  $out .= $this->getJSListDependancies('_common');
7046  }
7047  /* Add comments
7048  if ($type == 'date') $out.=' (YYYY-MM-DD)';
7049  elseif ($type == 'datetime') $out.=' (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)';
7050  */
7051 
7052  // Display error message for field
7053  if (!empty($fieldValidationErrorMsg) && function_exists('getFieldErrorIcon')) {
7054  $out .= ' '.getFieldErrorIcon($fieldValidationErrorMsg);
7055  }
7056 
7057  return $out;
7058  }
7059 
7073  public function showOutputField($val, $key, $value, $moreparam = '', $keysuffix = '', $keyprefix = '', $morecss = '')
7074  {
7075  global $conf, $langs, $form;
7076 
7077  if (!is_object($form)) {
7078  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/html.form.class.php';
7079  $form = new Form($this->db);
7080  }
7081 
7082  $objectid = $this->id; // Not used ???
7083 
7084  $label = empty($val['label']) ? '' : $val['label'];
7085  $type = empty($val['type']) ? '' : $val['type'];
7086  $size = empty($val['css']) ? '' : $val['css'];
7087  $reg = array();
7088 
7089  // Convert var to be able to share same code than showOutputField of extrafields
7090  if (preg_match('/varchar\((\d+)\)/', $type, $reg)) {
7091  $type = 'varchar'; // convert varchar(xx) int varchar
7092  $size = $reg[1];
7093  } elseif (preg_match('/varchar/', $type)) {
7094  $type = 'varchar'; // convert varchar(xx) int varchar
7095  }
7096  if (!empty($val['arrayofkeyval']) && is_array($val['arrayofkeyval'])) {
7097  $type = 'select';
7098  }
7099  if (preg_match('/^integer:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7100  $type = 'link';
7101  }
7102 
7103  $default = empty($val['default']) ? '' : $val['default'];
7104  $computed = empty($val['computed']) ? '' : $val['computed'];
7105  $unique = empty($val['unique']) ? '' : $val['unique'];
7106  $required = empty($val['required']) ? '' : $val['required'];
7107  $param = array();
7108  $param['options'] = array();
7109 
7110  if (!empty($val['arrayofkeyval']) && is_array($val['arrayofkeyval'])) {
7111  $param['options'] = $val['arrayofkeyval'];
7112  }
7113  if (preg_match('/^integer:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7114  $type = 'link';
7115  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2]=>$reg[1].':'.$reg[2]);
7116  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7117  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4] => 'N');
7118  $type = 'sellist';
7119  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7120  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2].':'.$reg[3] => 'N');
7121  $type = 'sellist';
7122  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7123  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2] => 'N');
7124  $type = 'sellist';
7125  }
7126 
7127  $langfile = empty($val['langfile']) ? '' : $val['langfile'];
7128  $list = (empty($val['list']) ? '' : $val['list']);
7129  $help = (empty($val['help']) ? '' : $val['help']);
7130  $hidden = (($val['visible'] == 0) ? 1 : 0); // If zero, we are sure it is hidden, otherwise we show. If it depends on mode (view/create/edit form or list, this must be filtered by caller)
7131 
7132  if ($hidden) {
7133  return '';
7134  }
7135 
7136  // If field is a computed field, value must become result of compute
7137  if ($computed) {
7138  // Make the eval of compute string
7139  //var_dump($computed);
7140  $value = dol_eval($computed, 1, 0);
7141  }
7142 
7143  if (empty($morecss)) {
7144  if ($type == 'date') {
7145  $morecss = 'minwidth100imp';
7146  } elseif ($type == 'datetime' || $type == 'timestamp') {
7147  $morecss = 'minwidth200imp';
7148  } elseif (in_array($type, array('int', 'double', 'price'))) {
7149  $morecss = 'maxwidth75';
7150  } elseif ($type == 'url') {
7151  $morecss = 'minwidth400';
7152  } elseif ($type == 'boolean') {
7153  $morecss = '';
7154  } else {
7155  if (is_numeric($size) && round($size) < 12) {
7156  $morecss = 'minwidth100';
7157  } elseif (is_numeric($size) && round($size) <= 48) {
7158  $morecss = 'minwidth200';
7159  } else {
7160  $morecss = 'minwidth400';
7161  }
7162  }
7163  }
7164 
7165  // Format output value differently according to properties of field
7166  if ($key == 'ref' && method_exists($this, 'getNomUrl')) {
7167  $value = $this->getNomUrl(1, '', 0, '', 1);
7168  } elseif ($key == 'status' && method_exists($this, 'getLibStatut')) {
7169  $value = $this->getLibStatut(3);
7170  } elseif ($type == 'date') {
7171  if (!empty($value)) {
7172  $value = dol_print_date($value, 'day'); // We suppose dates without time are always gmt (storage of course + output)
7173  } else {
7174  $value = '';
7175  }
7176  } elseif ($type == 'datetime' || $type == 'timestamp') {
7177  if (!empty($value)) {
7178  $value = dol_print_date($value, 'dayhour', 'tzuserrel');
7179  } else {
7180  $value = '';
7181  }
7182  } elseif ($type == 'duration') {
7183  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
7184  if (!is_null($value) && $value !== '') {
7185  $value = convertSecondToTime($value, 'allhourmin');
7186  }
7187  } elseif ($type == 'double' || $type == 'real') {
7188  if (!is_null($value) && $value !== '') {
7189  $value = price($value);
7190  }
7191  } elseif ($type == 'boolean') {
7192  $checked = '';
7193  if (!empty($value)) {
7194  $checked = ' checked ';
7195  }
7196  $value = '<input type="checkbox" '.$checked.' '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').' readonly disabled>';
7197  } elseif ($type == 'mail') {
7198  $value = dol_print_email($value, 0, 0, 0, 64, 1, 1);
7199  } elseif ($type == 'url') {
7200  $value = dol_print_url($value, '_blank', 32, 1);
7201  } elseif ($type == 'phone') {
7202  $value = dol_print_phone($value, '', 0, 0, '', '&nbsp;', 1);
7203  } elseif ($type == 'price') {
7204  if (!is_null($value) && $value !== '') {
7205  $value = price($value, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency);
7206  }
7207  } elseif ($type == 'select') {
7208  $value = $param['options'][$value];
7209  } elseif ($type == 'sellist') {
7210  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']);
7211  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
7212 
7213  $selectkey = "rowid";
7214  $keyList = 'rowid';
7215 
7216  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 4 && !empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
7217  $selectkey = $InfoFieldList[2];
7218  $keyList = $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
7219  }
7220 
7221  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7222  if (is_array($fields_label)) {
7223  $keyList .= ', ';
7224  $keyList .= implode(', ', $fields_label);
7225  }
7226 
7227  $sql = "SELECT ".$keyList;
7228  $sql .= ' FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$InfoFieldList[0];
7229  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra') !== false) {
7230  $sql .= ' as main';
7231  }
7232  if ($selectkey == 'rowid' && empty($value)) {
7233  $sql .= " WHERE ".$selectkey." = 0";
7234  } elseif ($selectkey == 'rowid') {
7235  $sql .= " WHERE ".$selectkey." = ".((int) $value);
7236  } else {
7237  $sql .= " WHERE ".$selectkey." = '".$this->db->escape($value)."'";
7238  }
7239 
7240  //$sql.= ' AND entity = '.$conf->entity;
7241 
7242  dol_syslog(get_class($this).':showOutputField:$type=sellist', LOG_DEBUG);
7243  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
7244  if ($resql) {
7245  $value = ''; // value was used, so now we reste it to use it to build final output
7246 
7247  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
7248 
7249  // Several field into label (eq table:code|libelle:rowid)
7250  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7251 
7252  if (is_array($fields_label) && count($fields_label) > 1) {
7253  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
7254  $translabel = '';
7255  if (!empty($obj->$field_toshow)) {
7256  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->$field_toshow);
7257  }
7258  if ($translabel != $field_toshow) {
7259  $value .= dol_trunc($translabel, 18).' ';
7260  } else {
7261  $value .= $obj->$field_toshow.' ';
7262  }
7263  }
7264  } else {
7265  $translabel = '';
7266  if (!empty($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]})) {
7267  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]});
7268  }
7269  if ($translabel != $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}) {
7270  $value = dol_trunc($translabel, 18);
7271  } else {
7272  $value = $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]};
7273  }
7274  }
7275  } else {
7276  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::showOutputField error '.$this->db->lasterror(), LOG_WARNING);
7277  }
7278  } elseif ($type == 'radio') {
7279  $value = $param['options'][$value];
7280  } elseif ($type == 'checkbox') {
7281  $value_arr = explode(',', $value);
7282  $value = '';
7283  if (is_array($value_arr) && count($value_arr) > 0) {
7284  $toprint = array();
7285  foreach ($value_arr as $keyval => $valueval) {
7286  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories" style="background: #bbb">'.$param['options'][$valueval].'</li>';
7287  }
7288  $value = '<div class="select2-container-multi-dolibarr" style="width: 90%;"><ul class="select2-choices-dolibarr">'.implode(' ', $toprint).'</ul></div>';
7289  }
7290  } elseif ($type == 'chkbxlst') {
7291  $value_arr = explode(',', $value);
7292 
7293  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']);
7294  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
7295 
7296  $selectkey = "rowid";
7297  $keyList = 'rowid';
7298 
7299  if (count($InfoFieldList) >= 3) {
7300  $selectkey = $InfoFieldList[2];
7301  $keyList = $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
7302  }
7303 
7304  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7305  if (is_array($fields_label)) {
7306  $keyList .= ', ';
7307  $keyList .= implode(', ', $fields_label);
7308  }
7309 
7310  $sql = "SELECT ".$keyList;
7311  $sql .= ' FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$InfoFieldList[0];
7312  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra') !== false) {
7313  $sql .= ' as main';
7314  }
7315  // $sql.= " WHERE ".$selectkey."='".$this->db->escape($value)."'";
7316  // $sql.= ' AND entity = '.$conf->entity;
7317 
7318  dol_syslog(get_class($this).':showOutputField:$type=chkbxlst', LOG_DEBUG);
7319  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
7320  if ($resql) {
7321  $value = ''; // value was used, so now we reste it to use it to build final output
7322  $toprint = array();
7323  while ($obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql)) {
7324  // Several field into label (eq table:code|libelle:rowid)
7325  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7326  if (is_array($value_arr) && in_array($obj->rowid, $value_arr)) {
7327  if (is_array($fields_label) && count($fields_label) > 1) {
7328  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
7329  $translabel = '';
7330  if (!empty($obj->$field_toshow)) {
7331  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->$field_toshow);
7332  }
7333  if ($translabel != $field_toshow) {
7334  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories" style="background: #bbb">'.dol_trunc($translabel, 18).'</li>';
7335  } else {
7336  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories" style="background: #bbb">'.$obj->$field_toshow.'</li>';
7337  }
7338  }
7339  } else {
7340  $translabel = '';
7341  if (!empty($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]})) {
7342  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]});
7343  }
7344  if ($translabel != $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}) {
7345  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories" style="background: #bbb">'.dol_trunc($translabel, 18).'</li>';
7346  } else {
7347  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories" style="background: #bbb">'.$obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}.'</li>';
7348  }
7349  }
7350  }
7351  }
7352  $value = '<div class="select2-container-multi-dolibarr" style="width: 90%;"><ul class="select2-choices-dolibarr">'.implode(' ', $toprint).'</ul></div>';
7353  } else {
7354  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::showOutputField error '.$this->db->lasterror(), LOG_WARNING);
7355  }
7356  } elseif ($type == 'link') {
7357  $out = '';
7358 
7359  // only if something to display (perf)
7360  if ($value) {
7361  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']); // $param_list='ObjectName:classPath'
7362 
7363  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
7364  $classname = $InfoFieldList[0];
7365  $classpath = $InfoFieldList[1];
7366  $getnomurlparam = (empty($InfoFieldList[2]) ? 3 : $InfoFieldList[2]);
7367  $getnomurlparam2 = (empty($InfoFieldList[4]) ? '' : $InfoFieldList[4]);
7368  if (!empty($classpath)) {
7369  dol_include_once($InfoFieldList[1]);
7370  if ($classname && class_exists($classname)) {
7371  $object = new $classname($this->db);
7372  if ($object->element === 'product') { // Special cas for product because default valut of fetch are wrong
7373  $object->fetch($value, '', '', '', 0, 1, 1);
7374  } else {
7375  $object->fetch($value);
7376  }
7377  $value = $object->getNomUrl($getnomurlparam, $getnomurlparam2);
7378  }
7379  } else {
7380  dol_syslog('Error bad setup of extrafield', LOG_WARNING);
7381  return 'Error bad setup of extrafield';
7382  }
7383  } else {
7384  $value = '';
7385  }
7386  } elseif (preg_match('/^(text|html)/', $type)) {
7387  $value = dol_htmlentitiesbr($value);
7388  } elseif ($type == 'password') {
7389  $value = preg_replace('/./i', '*', $value);
7390  } elseif ($type == 'array') {
7391  $value = implode('<br>', $value);
7392  }
7393 
7394  //print $type.'-'.$size.'-'.$value;
7395  $out = $value;
7396 
7397  return $out;
7398  }
7399 
7406  public function clearFieldError($fieldKey)
7407  {
7408  $this->error = '';
7409  unset($this->validateFieldsErrors[$fieldKey]);
7410  }
7411 
7419  public function setFieldError($fieldKey, $msg = '')
7420  {
7421  global $langs;
7422  if (empty($msg)) { $msg = $langs->trans("UnknowError"); }
7423 
7424  $this->error = $this->validateFieldsErrors[$fieldKey] = $msg;
7425  }
7426 
7433  public function getFieldError($fieldKey)
7434  {
7435  if (!empty($this->validateFieldsErrors[$fieldKey])) {
7436  return $this->validateFieldsErrors[$fieldKey];
7437  }
7438  return '';
7439  }
7440 
7449  public function validateField($val, $fieldKey, $fieldValue)
7450  {
7451  global $langs;
7452 
7453  if (!class_exists('Validate')) { require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT . '/core/class/validate.class.php'; }
7454 
7455  $this->clearFieldError($fieldKey);
7456 
7457  if (!isset($val[$fieldKey])) {
7458  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $langs->trans('FieldNotFoundInObject'));
7459  return false;
7460  }
7461 
7462  $param = array();
7463  $param['options'] = array();
7464  $type = $val[$fieldKey]['type'];
7465 
7466  $required = false;
7467  if (isset($val[$fieldKey]['notnull']) && $val[$fieldKey]['notnull'] === 1) {
7468  // 'notnull' is set to 1 if not null in database. Set to -1 if we must set data to null if empty ('' or 0).
7469  $required = true;
7470  }
7471 
7472  $maxSize = 0;
7473  $minSize = 0;
7474 
7475  //
7476  // PREPARE Elements
7477  //
7478 
7479  // Convert var to be able to share same code than showOutputField of extrafields
7480  if (preg_match('/varchar\((\d+)\)/', $type, $reg)) {
7481  $type = 'varchar'; // convert varchar(xx) int varchar
7482  $maxSize = $reg[1];
7483  } elseif (preg_match('/varchar/', $type)) {
7484  $type = 'varchar'; // convert varchar(xx) int varchar
7485  }
7486 
7487  if (!empty($val['arrayofkeyval']) && is_array($val['arrayofkeyval'])) {
7488  $type = 'select';
7489  }
7490 
7491  if (preg_match('/^integer:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7492  $type = 'link';
7493  }
7494 
7495  if (!empty($val['arrayofkeyval']) && is_array($val['arrayofkeyval'])) {
7496  $param['options'] = $val['arrayofkeyval'];
7497  }
7498 
7499  if (preg_match('/^integer:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7500  $type = 'link';
7501  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2]=>$reg[1].':'.$reg[2]);
7502  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7503  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4] => 'N');
7504  $type = 'sellist';
7505  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7506  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2].':'.$reg[3] => 'N');
7507  $type = 'sellist';
7508  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7509  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2] => 'N');
7510  $type = 'sellist';
7511  }
7512 
7513  //
7514  // TEST Value
7515  //
7516 
7517  // Use Validate class to allow external Modules to use data validation part instead of concentrate all test here (factoring) or just for reuse
7518  $validate = new Validate($this->db, $langs);
7519 
7520 
7521  // little trick : to perform tests with good performances sort tests by quick to low
7522 
7523  //
7524  // COMMON TESTS
7525  //
7526 
7527  // Required test and empty value
7528  if ($required && !$validate->isNotEmptyString($fieldValue)) {
7529  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7530  return false;
7531  } elseif (!$required && !$validate->isNotEmptyString($fieldValue)) {
7532  // if no value sent and the field is not mandatory, no need to perform tests
7533  return true;
7534  }
7535 
7536  // MAX Size test
7537  if (!empty($maxSize) && !$validate->isMaxLength($fieldValue, $maxSize)) {
7538  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7539  return false;
7540  }
7541 
7542  // MIN Size test
7543  if (!empty($minSize) && !$validate->isMinLength($fieldValue, $minSize)) {
7544  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7545  return false;
7546  }
7547 
7548  //
7549  // TESTS for TYPE
7550  //
7551 
7552  if (in_array($type, array('date', 'datetime', 'timestamp'))) {
7553  if (!$validate->isTimestamp($fieldValue)) {
7554  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7555  return false;
7556  } else { return true; }
7557  } elseif ($type == 'duration') {
7558  if (!$validate->isDuration($fieldValue)) {
7559  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7560  return false;
7561  } else { return true; }
7562  } elseif (in_array($type, array('double', 'real', 'price'))) {
7563  // is numeric
7564  if (!$validate->isDuration($fieldValue)) {
7565  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7566  return false;
7567  } else { return true; }
7568  } elseif ($type == 'boolean') {
7569  if (!$validate->isBool($fieldValue)) {
7570  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7571  return false;
7572  } else { return true; }
7573  } elseif ($type == 'mail') {
7574  if (!$validate->isEmail($fieldValue)) {
7575  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7576  return false;
7577  }
7578  } elseif ($type == 'url') {
7579  if (!$validate->isUrl($fieldValue)) {
7580  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7581  return false;
7582  } else { return true; }
7583  } elseif ($type == 'phone') {
7584  if (!$validate->isPhone($fieldValue)) {
7585  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7586  return false;
7587  } else { return true; }
7588  } elseif ($type == 'select' || $type == 'radio') {
7589  if (!isset($param['options'][$fieldValue])) {
7590  $this->error = $langs->trans('RequireValidValue');
7591  return false;
7592  } else { return true; }
7593  } elseif ($type == 'sellist' || $type == 'chkbxlst') {
7594  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']);
7595  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
7596  $value_arr = explode(',', $fieldValue);
7597  $value_arr = array_map(array($this->db, 'escape'), $value_arr);
7598 
7599  $selectkey = "rowid";
7600  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 4 && !empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
7601  $selectkey = $InfoFieldList[2];
7602  }
7603 
7604  if (!isInDb($value_arr, $InfoFieldList[0], $selectkey)) {
7605  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7606  return false;
7607  } else { return true; }
7608  } elseif ($type == 'link') {
7609  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']); // $param_list='ObjectName:classPath'
7610  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
7611  $classname = $InfoFieldList[0];
7612  $classpath = $InfoFieldList[1];
7613  if (!$validate->isFetchable($fieldValue, $classname, $classpath)) {
7614  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7615  return false;
7616  } else { return true; }
7617  }
7618 
7619  // if no test failled all is ok
7620  return true;
7621  }
7622 
7636  public function showOptionals($extrafields, $mode = 'view', $params = null, $keysuffix = '', $keyprefix = '', $onetrtd = 0, $display_type = 'card')
7637  {
7638  global $db, $conf, $langs, $action, $form, $hookmanager;
7639 
7640  if (!is_object($form)) {
7641  $form = new Form($db);
7642  }
7643 
7644  $out = '';
7645 
7646  $parameters = array();
7647  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('showOptionals', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
7648  if (empty($reshook)) {
7649  if (key_exists('label', $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]) && is_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label']) && count($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label']) > 0) {
7650  $out .= "\n";
7651  $out .= '<!-- showOptionals --> ';
7652  $out .= "\n";
7653 
7654  $extrafields_collapse_num = '';
7655  $e = 0;
7656  foreach ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label'] as $key => $label) {
7657  // Show only the key field in params
7658  if (is_array($params) && array_key_exists('onlykey', $params) && $key != $params['onlykey']) {
7659  continue;
7660  }
7661 
7662  // Test on 'enabled' ('enabled' is different than 'list' = 'visibility')
7663  $enabled = 1;
7664  if ($enabled && isset($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['enabled'][$key])) {
7665  $enabled = dol_eval($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['enabled'][$key], 1);
7666  }
7667  if (empty($enabled)) {
7668  continue;
7669  }
7670 
7671  $visibility = 1;
7672  if ($visibility && isset($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['list'][$key])) {
7673  $visibility = dol_eval($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['list'][$key], 1);
7674  }
7675 
7676  $perms = 1;
7677  if ($perms && isset($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['perms'][$key])) {
7678  $perms = dol_eval($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['perms'][$key], 1);
7679  }
7680 
7681  if (($mode == 'create') && abs($visibility) != 1 && abs($visibility) != 3) {
7682  continue; // <> -1 and <> 1 and <> 3 = not visible on forms, only on list
7683  } elseif (($mode == 'edit') && abs($visibility) != 1 && abs($visibility) != 3 && abs($visibility) != 4) {
7684  continue; // <> -1 and <> 1 and <> 3 = not visible on forms, only on list and <> 4 = not visible at the creation
7685  } elseif ($mode == 'view' && empty($visibility)) {
7686  continue;
7687  }
7688  if (empty($perms)) {
7689  continue;
7690  }
7691  // Load language if required
7692  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['langfile'][$key])) {
7693  $langs->load($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['langfile'][$key]);
7694  }
7695 
7696  $colspan = '';
7697  if (is_array($params) && count($params) > 0 && $display_type=='card') {
7698  if (array_key_exists('cols', $params)) {
7699  $colspan = $params['cols'];
7700  } elseif (array_key_exists('colspan', $params)) { // For backward compatibility. Use cols instead now.
7701  $reg = array();
7702  if (preg_match('/colspan="(\d+)"/', $params['colspan'], $reg)) {
7703  $colspan = $reg[1];
7704  } else {
7705  $colspan = $params['colspan'];
7706  }
7707  }
7708  }
7709 
7710  switch ($mode) {
7711  case "view":
7712  $value = $this->array_options["options_".$key.$keysuffix]; // Value may be clean or formated later
7713  break;
7714  case "create":
7715  case "edit":
7716  // We get the value of property found with GETPOST so it takes into account:
7717  // default values overwrite, restore back to list link, ... (but not 'default value in database' of field)
7718  $check = 'alphanohtml';
7719  if (in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('html', 'text'))) {
7720  $check = 'restricthtml';
7721  }
7722  $getposttemp = GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix, $check, 3); // GETPOST can get value from GET, POST or setup of default values overwrite.
7723  // GETPOST("options_" . $key) can be 'abc' or array(0=>'abc')
7724  if (is_array($getposttemp) || $getposttemp != '' || GETPOSTISSET($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix)) {
7725  if (is_array($getposttemp)) {
7726  // $getposttemp is an array but following code expects a comma separated string
7727  $value = implode(",", $getposttemp);
7728  } else {
7729  $value = $getposttemp;
7730  }
7731  } else {
7732  $value = (!empty($this->array_options["options_".$key]) ? $this->array_options["options_".$key] : ''); // No GET, no POST, no default value, so we take value of object.
7733  }
7734  //var_dump($keyprefix.' - '.$key.' - '.$keysuffix.' - '.$keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix.' - '.$this->array_options["options_".$key.$keysuffix].' - '.$getposttemp.' - '.$value);
7735  break;
7736  }
7737 
7738  // Output value of the current field
7739  if ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key] == 'separate') {
7740  $extrafields_collapse_num = '';
7741  $extrafield_param = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['param'][$key];
7742  if (!empty($extrafield_param) && is_array($extrafield_param)) {
7743  $extrafield_param_list = array_keys($extrafield_param['options']);
7744 
7745  if (count($extrafield_param_list) > 0) {
7746  $extrafield_collapse_display_value = intval($extrafield_param_list[0]);
7747 
7748  if ($extrafield_collapse_display_value == 1 || $extrafield_collapse_display_value == 2) {
7749  $extrafields_collapse_num = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['pos'][$key];
7750  }
7751  }
7752  }
7753 
7754  $out .= $extrafields->showSeparator($key, $this, ($colspan + 1), $display_type);
7755  } else {
7756  $class = (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['hidden'][$key]) ? 'hideobject ' : '');
7757  $csstyle = '';
7758  if (is_array($params) && count($params) > 0) {
7759  if (array_key_exists('class', $params)) {
7760  $class .= $params['class'].' ';
7761  }
7762  if (array_key_exists('style', $params)) {
7763  $csstyle = $params['style'];
7764  }
7765  }
7766 
7767  // add html5 elements
7768  $domData = ' data-element="extrafield"';
7769  $domData .= ' data-targetelement="'.$this->element.'"';
7770  $domData .= ' data-targetid="'.$this->id.'"';
7771 
7772  $html_id = (empty($this->id) ? '' : 'extrarow-'.$this->element.'_'.$key.'_'.$this->id);
7773  if ($display_type=='card') {
7774  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_USE_TWO_COLUMS) && ($e % 2) == 0) {
7775  $colspan = '0';
7776  }
7777 
7778  if ($action == 'selectlines') {
7779  $colspan++;
7780  }
7781  }
7782 
7783  // Convert date into timestamp format (value in memory must be a timestamp)
7784  if (in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('date'))) {
7785  $datenotinstring = $this->array_options['options_'.$key];
7786  if (!is_numeric($this->array_options['options_'.$key])) { // For backward compatibility
7787  $datenotinstring = $this->db->jdate($datenotinstring);
7788  }
7789  $value = (GETPOSTISSET($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix)) ? dol_mktime(12, 0, 0, GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix."month", 'int', 3), GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix."day", 'int', 3), GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix."year", 'int', 3)) : $datenotinstring;
7790  }
7791  if (in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('datetime'))) {
7792  $datenotinstring = $this->array_options['options_'.$key];
7793  if (!is_numeric($this->array_options['options_'.$key])) { // For backward compatibility
7794  $datenotinstring = $this->db->jdate($datenotinstring);
7795  }
7796  $value = (GETPOSTISSET($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix)) ? dol_mktime(GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix."hour", 'int', 3), GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix."min", 'int', 3), GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix."sec", 'int', 3), GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix."month", 'int', 3), GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix."day", 'int', 3), GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix."year", 'int', 3), 'tzuserrel') : $datenotinstring;
7797  }
7798  // Convert float submited string into real php numeric (value in memory must be a php numeric)
7799  if (in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('price', 'double'))) {
7800  $value = (GETPOSTISSET($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix) || $value) ? price2num($value) : $this->array_options['options_'.$key];
7801  }
7802 
7803  // HTML, text, select, integer and varchar: take into account default value in database if in create mode
7804  if (in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('html', 'text', 'varchar', 'select', 'int'))) {
7805  if ($action == 'create') {
7806  $value = (GETPOSTISSET($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix) || $value) ? $value : $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['default'][$key];
7807  }
7808  }
7809 
7810  $labeltoshow = $langs->trans($label);
7811  $helptoshow = $langs->trans($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['help'][$key]);
7812 
7813  if ($display_type == 'card') {
7814  $out .= '<tr '.($html_id ? 'id="'.$html_id.'" ' : '').$csstyle.' class="valuefieldcreate '.$class.$this->element.'_extras_'.$key.' trextrafields_collapse'.$extrafields_collapse_num.(!empty($this->id)?'_'.$this->id:'').'" '.$domData.' >';
7815  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_VIEW_LINE_NUMBER) && ($action == 'view' || $action == 'editline')) {
7816  $out .= '<td></td>';
7817  }
7818  $out .= '<td class="wordbreak';
7819  } elseif ($display_type == 'line') {
7820  $out .= '<div '.($html_id ? 'id="'.$html_id.'" ' : '').$csstyle.' class="valuefieldlinecreate '.$class.$this->element.'_extras_'.$key.' trextrafields_collapse'.$extrafields_collapse_num.(!empty($this->id)?'_'.$this->id:'').'" '.$domData.' >';
7821  $out .= '<div style="display: inline-block; padding-right:4px" class="wordbreak';
7822  }
7823  //$out .= "titlefield";
7824  //if (GETPOST('action', 'restricthtml') == 'create') $out.='create';
7825  // BUG #11554 : For public page, use red dot for required fields, instead of bold label
7826  $tpl_context = isset($params["tpl_context"]) ? $params["tpl_context"] : "none";
7827  if ($tpl_context == "public") { // Public page : red dot instead of fieldrequired characters
7828  $out .= '">';
7829  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['help'][$key])) {
7830  $out .= $form->textwithpicto($labeltoshow, $helptoshow);
7831  } else {
7832  $out .= $labeltoshow;
7833  }
7834  if ($mode != 'view' && !empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['required'][$key])) {
7835  $out .= '&nbsp;<span style="color: red">*</span>';
7836  }
7837  } else {
7838  if ($mode != 'view' && !empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['required'][$key])) {
7839  $out .= ' fieldrequired';
7840  }
7841  $out .= '">';
7842  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['help'][$key])) {
7843  $out .= $form->textwithpicto($labeltoshow, $helptoshow);
7844  } else {
7845  $out .= $labeltoshow;
7846  }
7847  }
7848 
7849  $out .= ($display_type == 'card' ? '</td>' : '</div>');
7850 
7851  $html_id = !empty($this->id) ? $this->element.'_extras_'.$key.'_'.$this->id : '';
7852  if ($display_type == 'card') {
7853  $out .= '<td '.($html_id ? 'id="'.$html_id.'" ' : '').' class="'.$this->element.'_extras_'.$key.'" '.($colspan ? ' colspan="'.$colspan.'"' : '').'>';
7854  } elseif ($display_type == 'line') {
7855  $out .= '<div '.($html_id ? 'id="'.$html_id.'" ' : '').' style="display: inline-block" class="'.$this->element.'_extras_'.$key.'">';
7856  }
7857 
7858  switch ($mode) {
7859  case "view":
7860  $out .= $extrafields->showOutputField($key, $value);
7861  break;
7862  case "create":
7863  $out .= $extrafields->showInputField($key, $value, '', $keysuffix, '', 0, $this->id, $this->table_element);
7864  break;
7865  case "edit":
7866  $out .= $extrafields->showInputField($key, $value, '', $keysuffix, '', 0, $this->id, $this->table_element);
7867  break;
7868  }
7869 
7870  $out .= ($display_type=='card' ? '</td>' : '</div>');
7871 
7872  /*for($ii = 0; $ii < ($colspan - 1); $ii++)
7873  {
7874  $out .='<td class="'.$this->element.'_extras_'.$key.'"></td>';
7875  }*/
7876 
7877  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_USE_TWO_COLUMS) && (($e % 2) == 1)) {
7878  $out .= ($display_type=='card' ? '</tr>' : '</div>');
7879  } else {
7880  $out .= ($display_type=='card' ? '</tr>' : '</div>');
7881  }
7882  $e++;
7883  }
7884  }
7885  $out .= "\n";
7886  // Add code to manage list depending on others
7887  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
7888  $out .= $this->getJSListDependancies();
7889  }
7890 
7891  $out .= '<!-- /showOptionals --> '."\n";
7892  }
7893  }
7894 
7895  $out .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
7896 
7897  return $out;
7898  }
7899 
7904  public function getJSListDependancies($type = '_extra')
7905  {
7906  $out = '
7907  <script>
7908  jQuery(document).ready(function() {
7909  function showOptions'.$type.'(child_list, parent_list, orig_select)
7910  {
7911  var val = $("select[name=\""+parent_list+"\"]").val();
7912  var parentVal = parent_list + ":" + val;
7913  if(typeof val == "string"){
7914  if(val != "") {
7915  var options = orig_select.find("option[parent=\""+parentVal+"\"]").clone();
7916  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"] option[parent]").remove();
7917  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"]").append(options);
7918  } else {
7919  var options = orig_select.find("option[parent]").clone();
7920  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"] option[parent]").remove();
7921  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"]").append(options);
7922  }
7923  } else if(val > 0) {
7924  var options = orig_select.find("option[parent=\""+parentVal+"\"]").clone();
7925  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"] option[parent]").remove();
7926  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"]").append(options);
7927  } else {
7928  var options = orig_select.find("option[parent]").clone();
7929  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"] option[parent]").remove();
7930  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"]").append(options);
7931  }
7932  }
7933  function setListDependencies'.$type.'() {
7934  jQuery("select option[parent]").parent().each(function() {
7935  var orig_select = {};
7936  var child_list = $(this).attr("name");
7937  orig_select[child_list] = $(this).clone();
7938  var parent = $(this).find("option[parent]:first").attr("parent");
7939  var infos = parent.split(":");
7940  var parent_list = infos[0];
7941 
7942  //Hide daughters lists
7943  if ($("#"+child_list).val() == 0 && $("#"+parent_list).val() == 0){
7944  $("#"+child_list).hide();
7945  //Show mother lists
7946  } else if ($("#"+parent_list).val() != 0){
7947  $("#"+parent_list).show();
7948  }
7949  //Show the child list if the parent list value is selected
7950  $("select[name=\""+parent_list+"\"]").click(function() {
7951  if ($(this).val() != 0){
7952  $("#"+child_list).show()
7953  }
7954  });
7955 
7956  //When we change parent list
7957  $("select[name=\""+parent_list+"\"]").change(function() {
7958  showOptions'.$type.'(child_list, parent_list, orig_select[child_list]);
7959  //Select the value 0 on child list after a change on the parent list
7960  $("#"+child_list).val(0).trigger("change");
7961  //Hide child lists if the parent value is set to 0
7962  if ($(this).val() == 0){
7963  $("#"+child_list).hide();
7964  }
7965  });
7966  });
7967  }
7968 
7969  setListDependencies'.$type.'();
7970  });
7971  </script>'."\n";
7972  return $out;
7973  }
7974 
7979  public function getRights()
7980  {
7981  global $user;
7982 
7983  $element = $this->element;
7984  if ($element == 'facturerec') {
7985  $element = 'facture';
7986  }
7987 
7988  return $user->rights->{$element};
7989  }
7990 
8003  public static function commonReplaceThirdparty(DoliDB $db, $origin_id, $dest_id, array $tables, $ignoreerrors = 0)
8004  {
8005  foreach ($tables as $table) {
8006  $sql = 'UPDATE '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table.' SET fk_soc = '.((int) $dest_id).' WHERE fk_soc = '.((int) $origin_id);
8007 
8008  if (!$db->query($sql)) {
8009  if ($ignoreerrors) {
8010  return true; // TODO Not enough. If there is A-B on kept thirdarty and B-C on old one, we must get A-B-C after merge. Not A-B.
8011  }
8012  //$this->errors = $db->lasterror();
8013  return false;
8014  }
8015  }
8016 
8017  return true;
8018  }
8019 
8032  public function defineBuyPrice($unitPrice = 0.0, $discountPercent = 0.0, $fk_product = 0)
8033  {
8034  global $conf;
8035 
8036  $buyPrice = 0;
8037 
8038  if (($unitPrice > 0) && (isset($conf->global->ForceBuyingPriceIfNull) && $conf->global->ForceBuyingPriceIfNull > 0)) {
8039  // When ForceBuyingPriceIfNull is set
8040  $buyPrice = $unitPrice * (1 - $discountPercent / 100);
8041  } else {
8042  // Get cost price for margin calculation
8043  if (!empty($fk_product) && $fk_product > 0) {
8044  if (isset($conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE) && $conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE == 'costprice') {
8045  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
8046  $product = new Product($this->db);
8047  $result = $product->fetch($fk_product);
8048  if ($result <= 0) {
8049  $this->errors[] = 'ErrorProductIdDoesNotExists';
8050  return -1;
8051  }
8052  if ($product->cost_price > 0) {
8053  $buyPrice = $product->cost_price;
8054  } elseif ($product->pmp > 0) {
8055  $buyPrice = $product->pmp;
8056  }
8057  } elseif (isset($conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE) && $conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE == 'pmp') {
8058  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
8059  $product = new Product($this->db);
8060  $result = $product->fetch($fk_product);
8061  if ($result <= 0) {
8062  $this->errors[] = 'ErrorProductIdDoesNotExists';
8063  return -1;
8064  }
8065  if ($product->pmp > 0) {
8066  $buyPrice = $product->pmp;
8067  }
8068  }
8069 
8070  if (empty($buyPrice) && isset($conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE) && in_array($conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE, array('1', 'pmp', 'costprice'))) {
8071  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/fourn/class/fournisseur.product.class.php';
8072  $productFournisseur = new ProductFournisseur($this->db);
8073  if (($result = $productFournisseur->find_min_price_product_fournisseur($fk_product)) > 0) {
8074  $buyPrice = $productFournisseur->fourn_unitprice;
8075  } elseif ($result < 0) {
8076  $this->errors[] = $productFournisseur->error;
8077  return -2;
8078  }
8079  }
8080  }
8081  }
8082  return $buyPrice;
8083  }
8084 
8085  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
8103  public function show_photos($modulepart, $sdir, $size = 0, $nbmax = 0, $nbbyrow = 5, $showfilename = 0, $showaction = 0, $maxHeight = 120, $maxWidth = 160, $nolink = 0, $notitle = 0, $usesharelink = 0)
8104  {
8105  // phpcs:enable
8106  global $conf, $user, $langs;
8107 
8108  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
8109  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/images.lib.php';
8110 
8111  $sortfield = 'position_name';
8112  $sortorder = 'asc';
8113 
8114  $dir = $sdir.'/';
8115  $pdir = '/';
8116 
8117  $dir .= get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $this, $modulepart);
8118  $pdir .= get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $this, $modulepart);
8119 
8120  // For backward compatibility
8121  if ($modulepart == 'product') {
8122  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_OLD_PATH_FOR_PHOTO)) {
8123  $dir = $sdir.'/'.get_exdir($this->id, 2, 0, 0, $this, $modulepart).$this->id."/photos/";
8124  $pdir = '/'.get_exdir($this->id, 2, 0, 0, $this, $modulepart).$this->id."/photos/";
8125  }
8126  }
8127 
8128  // Defined relative dir to DOL_DATA_ROOT
8129  $relativedir = '';
8130  if ($dir) {
8131  $relativedir = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(DOL_DATA_ROOT, '/').'/', '', $dir);
8132  $relativedir = preg_replace('/^[\\/]/', '', $relativedir);
8133  $relativedir = preg_replace('/[\\/]$/', '', $relativedir);
8134  }
8135 
8136  $dirthumb = $dir.'thumbs/';
8137  $pdirthumb = $pdir.'thumbs/';
8138 
8139  $return = '<!-- Photo -->'."\n";
8140  $nbphoto = 0;
8141 
8142  $filearray = dol_dir_list($dir, "files", 0, '', '(\.meta|_preview.*\.png)$', $sortfield, (strtolower($sortorder) == 'desc' ?SORT_DESC:SORT_ASC), 1);
8143 
8144  /*if (! empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_OLD_PATH_FOR_PHOTO)) // For backward compatiblity, we scan also old dirs
8145  {
8146  $filearrayold=dol_dir_list($dirold,"files",0,'','(\.meta|_preview.*\.png)$',$sortfield,(strtolower($sortorder)=='desc'?SORT_DESC:SORT_ASC),1);
8147  $filearray=array_merge($filearray, $filearrayold);
8148  }*/
8149 
8150  completeFileArrayWithDatabaseInfo($filearray, $relativedir);
8151 
8152  if (count($filearray)) {
8153  if ($sortfield && $sortorder) {
8154  $filearray = dol_sort_array($filearray, $sortfield, $sortorder);
8155  }
8156 
8157  foreach ($filearray as $key => $val) {
8158  $photo = '';
8159  $file = $val['name'];
8160 
8161  //if (! utf8_check($file)) $file=utf8_encode($file); // To be sure file is stored in UTF8 in memory
8162 
8163  //if (dol_is_file($dir.$file) && image_format_supported($file) >= 0)
8164  if (image_format_supported($file) >= 0) {
8165  $nbphoto++;
8166  $photo = $file;
8167  $viewfilename = $file;
8168 
8169  if ($size == 1 || $size == 'small') { // Format vignette
8170  // Find name of thumb file
8171  $photo_vignette = basename(getImageFileNameForSize($dir.$file, '_small'));
8172  if (!dol_is_file($dirthumb.$photo_vignette)) {
8173  $photo_vignette = '';
8174  }
8175 
8176  // Get filesize of original file
8177  $imgarray = dol_getImageSize($dir.$photo);
8178 
8179  if ($nbbyrow > 0) {
8180  if ($nbphoto == 1) {
8181  $return .= '<table class="valigntop center centpercent" style="border: 0; padding: 2px; border-spacing: 2px; border-collapse: separate;">';
8182  }
8183 
8184  if ($nbphoto % $nbbyrow == 1) {
8185  $return .= '<tr class="center valignmiddle" style="border: 1px">';
8186  }
8187  $return .= '<td style="width: '.ceil(100 / $nbbyrow).'%" class="photo">';
8188  } elseif ($nbbyrow < 0) {
8189  $return .= '<div class="inline-block">';
8190  }
8191 
8192  $return .= "\n";
8193 
8194  $relativefile = preg_replace('/^\//', '', $pdir.$photo);
8195  if (empty($nolink)) {
8196  $urladvanced = getAdvancedPreviewUrl($modulepart, $relativefile, 0, 'entity='.$this->entity);
8197  if ($urladvanced) {
8198  $return .= '<a href="'.$urladvanced.'">';
8199  } else {
8200  $return .= '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$this->entity.'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$photo).'" class="aphoto" target="_blank">';
8201  }
8202  }
8203 
8204  // Show image (width height=$maxHeight)
8205  // Si fichier vignette disponible et image source trop grande, on utilise la vignette, sinon on utilise photo origine
8206  $alt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('File').': '.$relativefile;
8207  $alt .= ' - '.$langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('Size').': '.$imgarray['width'].'x'.$imgarray['height'];
8208  if ($notitle) {
8209  $alt = '';
8210  }
8211 
8212  if ($usesharelink) {
8213  if ($val['share']) {
8214  if (empty($maxHeight) || $photo_vignette && $imgarray['height'] > $maxHeight) {
8215  $return .= '<!-- Show original file (thumb not yet available with shared links) -->';
8216  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin" height="'.$maxHeight.'" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?hashp='.urlencode($val['share']).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'">';
8217  } else {
8218  $return .= '<!-- Show original file -->';
8219  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin" height="'.$maxHeight.'" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?hashp='.urlencode($val['share']).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'">';
8220  }
8221  } else {
8222  $return .= '<!-- Show nophoto file (because file is not shared) -->';
8223  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin" height="'.$maxHeight.'" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/public/theme/common/nophoto.png" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'">';
8224  }
8225  } else {
8226  if (empty($maxHeight) || $photo_vignette && $imgarray['height'] > $maxHeight) {
8227  $return .= '<!-- Show thumb -->';
8228  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin maxwidth150onsmartphone maxwidth200" height="'.$maxHeight.'" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$this->entity.'&file='.urlencode($pdirthumb.$photo_vignette).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'">';
8229  } else {
8230  $return .= '<!-- Show original file -->';
8231  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin" height="'.$maxHeight.'" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$this->entity.'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$photo).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'">';
8232  }
8233  }
8234 
8235  if (empty($nolink)) {
8236  $return .= '</a>';
8237  }
8238  $return .= "\n";
8239 
8240  if ($showfilename) {
8241  $return .= '<br>'.$viewfilename;
8242  }
8243  if ($showaction) {
8244  $return .= '<br>';
8245  // On propose la generation de la vignette si elle n'existe pas et si la taille est superieure aux limites
8246  if ($photo_vignette && (image_format_supported($photo) > 0) && ($this->imgWidth > $maxWidth || $this->imgHeight > $maxHeight)) {
8247  $return .= '<a href="'.$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"].'?id='.$this->id.'&action=addthumb&token='.newToken().'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$viewfilename).'">'.img_picto($langs->trans('GenerateThumb'), 'refresh').'&nbsp;&nbsp;</a>';
8248  }
8249  // Special cas for product
8250  if ($modulepart == 'product' && ($user->rights->produit->creer || $user->rights->service->creer)) {
8251  // Link to resize
8252  $return .= '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/core/photos_resize.php?modulepart='.urlencode('produit|service').'&id='.$this->id.'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$viewfilename).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("Resize")).'">'.img_picto($langs->trans("Resize"), 'resize', '').'</a> &nbsp; ';
8253 
8254  // Link to delete
8255  $return .= '<a href="'.$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"].'?id='.$this->id.'&action=delete&token='.newToken().'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$viewfilename).'">';
8256  $return .= img_delete().'</a>';
8257  }
8258  }
8259  $return .= "\n";
8260 
8261  if ($nbbyrow > 0) {
8262  $return .= '</td>';
8263  if (($nbphoto % $nbbyrow) == 0) {
8264  $return .= '</tr>';
8265  }
8266  } elseif ($nbbyrow < 0) {
8267  $return .= '</div>';
8268  }
8269  }
8270 
8271  if (empty($size)) { // Format origine
8272  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$this->entity.'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$photo).'">';
8273 
8274  if ($showfilename) {
8275  $return .= '<br>'.$viewfilename;
8276  }
8277  if ($showaction) {
8278  // Special case for product
8279  if ($modulepart == 'product' && ($user->rights->produit->creer || $user->rights->service->creer)) {
8280  // Link to resize
8281  $return .= '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/core/photos_resize.php?modulepart='.urlencode('produit|service').'&id='.$this->id.'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$viewfilename).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("Resize")).'">'.img_picto($langs->trans("Resize"), 'resize', '').'</a> &nbsp; ';
8282 
8283  // Link to delete
8284  $return .= '<a href="'.$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"].'?id='.$this->id.'&action=delete&token='.newToken().'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$viewfilename).'">';
8285  $return .= img_delete().'</a>';
8286  }
8287  }
8288  }
8289 
8290  // On continue ou on arrete de boucler ?
8291  if ($nbmax && $nbphoto >= $nbmax) {
8292  break;
8293  }
8294  }
8295  }
8296 
8297  if ($size == 1 || $size == 'small') {
8298  if ($nbbyrow > 0) {
8299  // Ferme tableau
8300  while ($nbphoto % $nbbyrow) {
8301  $return .= '<td style="width: '.ceil(100 / $nbbyrow).'%">&nbsp;</td>';
8302  $nbphoto++;
8303  }
8304 
8305  if ($nbphoto) {
8306  $return .= '</table>';
8307  }
8308  }
8309  }
8310  }
8311 
8312  $this->nbphoto = $nbphoto;
8313 
8314  return $return;
8315  }
8316 
8317 
8324  protected function isArray($info)
8325  {
8326  if (is_array($info)) {
8327  if (isset($info['type']) && $info['type'] == 'array') {
8328  return true;
8329  } else {
8330  return false;
8331  }
8332  }
8333  return false;
8334  }
8335 
8342  public function isDate($info)
8343  {
8344  if (isset($info['type']) && ($info['type'] == 'date' || $info['type'] == 'datetime' || $info['type'] == 'timestamp')) {
8345  return true;
8346  }
8347  return false;
8348  }
8349 
8356  public function isDuration($info)
8357  {
8358  if (is_array($info)) {
8359  if (isset($info['type']) && ($info['type'] == 'duration')) {
8360  return true;
8361  } else {
8362  return false;
8363  }
8364  } else {
8365  return false;
8366  }
8367  }
8368 
8375  public function isInt($info)
8376  {
8377  if (is_array($info)) {
8378  if (isset($info['type']) && ($info['type'] == 'int' || preg_match('/^integer/i', $info['type']))) {
8379  return true;
8380  } else {
8381  return false;
8382  }
8383  } else {
8384  return false;
8385  }
8386  }
8387 
8394  public function isFloat($info)
8395  {
8396  if (is_array($info)) {
8397  if (isset($info['type']) && (preg_match('/^(double|real|price)/i', $info['type']))) {
8398  return true;
8399  } else {
8400  return false;
8401  }
8402  }
8403  return false;
8404  }
8405 
8412  public function isText($info)
8413  {
8414  if (is_array($info)) {
8415  if (isset($info['type']) && $info['type'] == 'text') {
8416  return true;
8417  } else {
8418  return false;
8419  }
8420  }
8421  return false;
8422  }
8423 
8430  protected function canBeNull($info)
8431  {
8432  if (is_array($info)) {
8433  if (isset($info['notnull']) && $info['notnull'] != '1') {
8434  return true;
8435  } else {
8436  return false;
8437  }
8438  }
8439  return true;
8440  }
8441 
8448  protected function isForcedToNullIfZero($info)
8449  {
8450  if (is_array($info)) {
8451  if (isset($info['notnull']) && $info['notnull'] == '-1') {
8452  return true;
8453  } else {
8454  return false;
8455  }
8456  }
8457  return false;
8458  }
8459 
8466  protected function isIndex($info)
8467  {
8468  if (is_array($info)) {
8469  if (isset($info['index']) && $info['index'] == true) {
8470  return true;
8471  } else {
8472  return false;
8473  }
8474  }
8475  return false;
8476  }
8477 
8478 
8486  protected function setSaveQuery()
8487  {
8488  global $conf;
8489 
8490  $queryarray = array();
8491  foreach ($this->fields as $field => $info) { // Loop on definition of fields
8492  // Depending on field type ('datetime', ...)
8493  if ($this->isDate($info)) {
8494  if (empty($this->{$field})) {
8495  $queryarray[$field] = null;
8496  } else {
8497  $queryarray[$field] = $this->db->idate($this->{$field});
8498  }
8499  } elseif ($this->isDuration($info)) {
8500  // $this->{$field} may be null, '', 0, '0', 123, '123'
8501  if ((isset($this->{$field}) && $this->{$field} != '') || !empty($info['notnull'])) {
8502  if (!isset($this->{$field})) {
8503  $queryarray[$field] = 0;
8504  } else {
8505  $queryarray[$field] = (int) $this->{$field}; // If '0', it may be set to null later if $info['notnull'] == -1
8506  }
8507  } else {
8508  $queryarray[$field] = null;
8509  }
8510  } elseif ($this->isInt($info) || $this->isFloat($info)) {
8511  if ($field == 'entity' && is_null($this->{$field})) {
8512  $queryarray[$field] = $conf->entity;
8513  } else {
8514  // $this->{$field} may be null, '', 0, '0', 123, '123'
8515  if ((isset($this->{$field}) && $this->{$field} != '') || !empty($info['notnull'])) {
8516  if (!isset($this->{$field})) {
8517  $queryarray[$field] = 0;
8518  } elseif ($this->isInt($info)) {
8519  $queryarray[$field] = (int) $this->{$field}; // If '0', it may be set to null later if $info['notnull'] == -1
8520  } elseif ($this->isFloat($info)) {
8521  $queryarray[$field] = (double) $this->{$field}; // If '0', it may be set to null later if $info['notnull'] == -1
8522  }
8523  } else {
8524  $queryarray[$field] = null;
8525  }
8526  }
8527  } else {
8528  $queryarray[$field] = $this->{$field};
8529  }
8530 
8531  if ($info['type'] == 'timestamp' && empty($queryarray[$field])) {
8532  unset($queryarray[$field]);
8533  }
8534  if (!empty($info['notnull']) && $info['notnull'] == -1 && empty($queryarray[$field])) {
8535  $queryarray[$field] = null; // May force 0 to null
8536  }
8537  }
8538 
8539  return $queryarray;
8540  }
8541 
8548  public function setVarsFromFetchObj(&$obj)
8549  {
8550  global $db;
8551 
8552  foreach ($this->fields as $field => $info) {
8553  if ($this->isDate($info)) {
8554  if (is_null($obj->{$field}) || $obj->{$field} === '' || $obj->{$field} === '0000-00-00 00:00:00' || $obj->{$field} === '1000-01-01 00:00:00') {
8555  $this->{$field} = '';
8556  } else {
8557  $this->{$field} = $db->jdate($obj->{$field});
8558  }
8559  } elseif ($this->isInt($info)) {
8560  if ($field == 'rowid') {
8561  $this->id = (int) $obj->{$field};
8562  } else {
8563  if ($this->isForcedToNullIfZero($info)) {
8564  if (empty($obj->{$field})) {
8565  $this->{$field} = null;
8566  } else {
8567  $this->{$field} = (double) $obj->{$field};
8568  }
8569  } else {
8570  if (!is_null($obj->{$field}) || (isset($info['notnull']) && $info['notnull'] == 1)) {
8571  $this->{$field} = (int) $obj->{$field};
8572  } else {
8573  $this->{$field} = null;
8574  }
8575  }
8576  }
8577  } elseif ($this->isFloat($info)) {
8578  if ($this->isForcedToNullIfZero($info)) {
8579  if (empty($obj->{$field})) {
8580  $this->{$field} = null;
8581  } else {
8582  $this->{$field} = (double) $obj->{$field};
8583  }
8584  } else {
8585  if (!is_null($obj->{$field}) || (isset($info['notnull']) && $info['notnull'] == 1)) {
8586  $this->{$field} = (double) $obj->{$field};
8587  } else {
8588  $this->{$field} = null;
8589  }
8590  }
8591  } else {
8592  $this->{$field} = $obj->{$field};
8593  }
8594  }
8595 
8596  // If there is no 'ref' field, we force property ->ref to ->id for a better compatibility with common functions.
8597  if (!isset($this->fields['ref']) && isset($this->id)) {
8598  $this->ref = $this->id;
8599  }
8600  }
8601 
8608  public function getFieldList($alias = '')
8609  {
8610  $keys = array_keys($this->fields);
8611  if (!empty($alias)) {
8612  $keys_with_alias = array();
8613  foreach ($keys as $fieldname) {
8614  $keys_with_alias[] = $alias . '.' . $fieldname;
8615  }
8616  return implode(',', $keys_with_alias);
8617  } else {
8618  return implode(',', $keys);
8619  }
8620  }
8621 
8629  protected function quote($value, $fieldsentry)
8630  {
8631  if (is_null($value)) {
8632  return 'NULL';
8633  } elseif (preg_match('/^(int|double|real|price)/i', $fieldsentry['type'])) {
8634  return price2num("$value");
8635  } elseif ($fieldsentry['type'] == 'boolean') {
8636  if ($value) {
8637  return 'true';
8638  } else {
8639  return 'false';
8640  }
8641  } else {
8642  return "'".$this->db->escape($value)."'";
8643  }
8644  }
8645 
8646 
8654  public function createCommon(User $user, $notrigger = false)
8655  {
8656  global $langs;
8657  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::createCommon create", LOG_DEBUG);
8658 
8659  $error = 0;
8660 
8661  $now = dol_now();
8662 
8663  $fieldvalues = $this->setSaveQuery();
8664 
8665  if (array_key_exists('date_creation', $fieldvalues) && empty($fieldvalues['date_creation'])) {
8666  $fieldvalues['date_creation'] = $this->db->idate($now);
8667  }
8668  if (array_key_exists('fk_user_creat', $fieldvalues) && !($fieldvalues['fk_user_creat'] > 0)) {
8669  $fieldvalues['fk_user_creat'] = $user->id;
8670  }
8671  unset($fieldvalues['rowid']); // The field 'rowid' is reserved field name for autoincrement field so we don't need it into insert.
8672  if (array_key_exists('ref', $fieldvalues)) {
8673  $fieldvalues['ref'] = dol_string_nospecial($fieldvalues['ref']); // If field is a ref, we sanitize data
8674  }
8675 
8676  $keys = array();
8677  $values = array(); // Array to store string forged for SQL syntax
8678  foreach ($fieldvalues as $k => $v) {
8679  $keys[$k] = $k;
8680  $value = $this->fields[$k];
8681  $values[$k] = $this->quote($v, $value); // May return string 'NULL' if $value is null
8682  }
8683 
8684  // Clean and check mandatory
8685  foreach ($keys as $key) {
8686  // If field is an implicit foreign key field
8687  if (preg_match('/^integer:/i', $this->fields[$key]['type']) && $values[$key] == '-1') {
8688  $values[$key] = '';
8689  }
8690  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['foreignkey']) && $values[$key] == '-1') {
8691  $values[$key] = '';
8692  }
8693 
8694  if (isset($this->fields[$key]['notnull']) && $this->fields[$key]['notnull'] == 1 && (!isset($values[$key]) || $values[$key] === 'NULL') && is_null($this->fields[$key]['default'])) {
8695  $error++;
8696  $langs->load("errors");
8697  dol_syslog("Mandatory field '".$key."' is empty and required into ->fields definition of class");
8698  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ErrorFieldRequired", $this->fields[$key]['label']);
8699  }
8700 
8701  // If value is null and there is a default value for field
8702  if (isset($this->fields[$key]['notnull']) && $this->fields[$key]['notnull'] == 1 && (!isset($values[$key]) || $values[$key] === 'NULL') && !is_null($this->fields[$key]['default'])) {
8703  $values[$key] = $this->quote($this->fields[$key]['default'], $this->fields[$key]);
8704  }
8705 
8706  // If field is an implicit foreign key field
8707  if (preg_match('/^integer:/i', $this->fields[$key]['type']) && empty($values[$key])) {
8708  if (isset($this->fields[$key]['default'])) {
8709  $values[$key] = ((int) $this->fields[$key]['default']);
8710  } else {
8711  $values[$key] = 'null';
8712  }
8713  }
8714  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['foreignkey']) && empty($values[$key])) {
8715  $values[$key] = 'null';
8716  }
8717  }
8718 
8719  if ($error) {
8720  return -1;
8721  }
8722 
8723  $this->db->begin();
8724 
8725  if (!$error) {
8726  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element;
8727  $sql .= " (".implode(", ", $keys).')';
8728  $sql .= " VALUES (".implode(", ", $values).")"; // $values can contains 'abc' or 123
8729 
8730  $res = $this->db->query($sql);
8731  if ($res === false) {
8732  $error++;
8733  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
8734  }
8735  }
8736 
8737  if (!$error) {
8738  $this->id = $this->db->last_insert_id(MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element);
8739  }
8740 
8741  // If we have a field ref with a default value of (PROV)
8742  if (!$error) {
8743  if (key_exists('ref', $this->fields) && $this->fields['ref']['notnull'] > 0 && key_exists('default', $this->fields['ref']) && $this->fields['ref']['default'] == '(PROV)') {
8744  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element." SET ref = '(PROV".((int) $this->id).")' WHERE (ref = '(PROV)' OR ref = '') AND rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
8745  $resqlupdate = $this->db->query($sql);
8746 
8747  if ($resqlupdate === false) {
8748  $error++;
8749  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
8750  } else {
8751  $this->ref = '(PROV'.$this->id.')';
8752  }
8753  }
8754  }
8755 
8756  // Create extrafields
8757  if (!$error) {
8758  $result = $this->insertExtraFields();
8759  if ($result < 0) {
8760  $error++;
8761  }
8762  }
8763 
8764  // Create lines
8765  if (!empty($this->table_element_line) && !empty($this->fk_element)) {
8766  $num = (is_array($this->lines) ? count($this->lines) : 0);
8767  for ($i = 0; $i < $num; $i++) {
8768  $line = $this->lines[$i];
8769 
8770  $keyforparent = $this->fk_element;
8771  $line->$keyforparent = $this->id;
8772 
8773  // Test and convert into object this->lines[$i]. When coming from REST API, we may still have an array
8774  //if (! is_object($line)) $line=json_decode(json_encode($line), false); // convert recursively array into object.
8775  if (!is_object($line)) {
8776  $line = (object) $line;
8777  }
8778 
8779  $result = $line->create($user, 1);
8780  if ($result < 0) {
8781  $this->error = $line->error;
8782  $this->db->rollback();
8783  return -1;
8784  }
8785  }
8786  }
8787 
8788  // Triggers
8789  if (!$error && !$notrigger) {
8790  // Call triggers
8791  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper(get_class($this)).'_CREATE', $user);
8792  if ($result < 0) {
8793  $error++;
8794  }
8795  // End call triggers
8796  }
8797 
8798  // Commit or rollback
8799  if ($error) {
8800  $this->db->rollback();
8801  return -1;
8802  } else {
8803  $this->db->commit();
8804  return $this->id;
8805  }
8806  }
8807 
8808 
8817  public function fetchCommon($id, $ref = null, $morewhere = '')
8818  {
8819  if (empty($id) && empty($ref) && empty($morewhere)) {
8820  return -1;
8821  }
8822 
8823  $fieldlist = $this->getFieldList('t');
8824  if (empty($fieldlist)) {
8825  return 0;
8826  }
8827 
8828  $sql = "SELECT ".$fieldlist;
8829  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element.' as t';
8830 
8831  if (!empty($id)) {
8832  $sql .= ' WHERE t.rowid = '.((int) $id);
8833  } elseif (!empty($ref)) {
8834  $sql .= " WHERE t.ref = '".$this->db->escape($ref)."'";
8835  } else {
8836  $sql .= ' WHERE 1 = 1'; // usage with empty id and empty ref is very rare
8837  }
8838  if (empty($id) && isset($this->ismultientitymanaged) && $this->ismultientitymanaged == 1) {
8839  $sql .= ' AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity($this->table_element).')';
8840  }
8841  if ($morewhere) {
8842  $sql .= $morewhere;
8843  }
8844  $sql .= ' LIMIT 1'; // This is a fetch, to be sure to get only one record
8845 
8846  $res = $this->db->query($sql);
8847  if ($res) {
8848  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($res);
8849  if ($obj) {
8850  $this->setVarsFromFetchObj($obj);
8851 
8852  // Retrieve all extrafield
8853  // fetch optionals attributes and labels
8854  $this->fetch_optionals();
8855 
8856  return $this->id;
8857  } else {
8858  return 0;
8859  }
8860  } else {
8861  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
8862  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
8863  return -1;
8864  }
8865  }
8866 
8873  public function fetchLinesCommon($morewhere = '')
8874  {
8875  $objectlineclassname = get_class($this).'Line';
8876  if (!class_exists($objectlineclassname)) {
8877  $this->error = 'Error, class '.$objectlineclassname.' not found during call of fetchLinesCommon';
8878  return -1;
8879  }
8880 
8881  $objectline = new $objectlineclassname($this->db);
8882 
8883  $sql = "SELECT ".$objectline->getFieldList('l');
8884  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$objectline->table_element." as l";
8885  $sql .= " WHERE l.fk_".$this->element." = ".((int) $this->id);
8886  if ($morewhere) {
8887  $sql .= $morewhere;
8888  }
8889  if (isset($objectline->fields['position'])) {
8890  $sql .= $this->db->order('position', 'ASC');
8891  }
8892 
8893  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
8894  if ($resql) {
8895  $num_rows = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
8896  $i = 0;
8897  while ($i < $num_rows) {
8898  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
8899  if ($obj) {
8900  $newline = new $objectlineclassname($this->db);
8901  $newline->setVarsFromFetchObj($obj);
8902 
8903  $this->lines[] = $newline;
8904  }
8905  $i++;
8906  }
8907 
8908  return 1;
8909  } else {
8910  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
8911  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
8912  return -1;
8913  }
8914  }
8915 
8923  public function updateCommon(User $user, $notrigger = false)
8924  {
8925  global $conf, $langs;
8926  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::updateCommon update", LOG_DEBUG);
8927 
8928  $error = 0;
8929 
8930  $now = dol_now();
8931 
8932  $fieldvalues = $this->setSaveQuery();
8933 
8934  if (array_key_exists('date_modification', $fieldvalues) && empty($fieldvalues['date_modification'])) {
8935  $fieldvalues['date_modification'] = $this->db->idate($now);
8936  }
8937  if (array_key_exists('fk_user_modif', $fieldvalues) && !($fieldvalues['fk_user_modif'] > 0)) {
8938  $fieldvalues['fk_user_modif'] = $user->id;
8939  }
8940  unset($fieldvalues['rowid']); // The field 'rowid' is reserved field name for autoincrement field so we don't need it into update.
8941  if (array_key_exists('ref', $fieldvalues)) {
8942  $fieldvalues['ref'] = dol_string_nospecial($fieldvalues['ref']); // If field is a ref, we sanitize data
8943  }
8944 
8945  // Add quotes and escape on fields with type string
8946  $keys = array();
8947  $values = array();
8948  $tmp = array();
8949  foreach ($fieldvalues as $k => $v) {
8950  $keys[$k] = $k;
8951  $value = $this->fields[$k];
8952  $values[$k] = $this->quote($v, $value);
8953  $tmp[] = $k.'='.$this->quote($v, $this->fields[$k]);
8954  }
8955 
8956  // Clean and check mandatory fields
8957  foreach ($keys as $key) {
8958  if (preg_match('/^integer:/i', $this->fields[$key]['type']) && $values[$key] == '-1') {
8959  $values[$key] = ''; // This is an implicit foreign key field
8960  }
8961  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['foreignkey']) && $values[$key] == '-1') {
8962  $values[$key] = ''; // This is an explicit foreign key field
8963  }
8964 
8965  //var_dump($key.'-'.$values[$key].'-'.($this->fields[$key]['notnull'] == 1));
8966  /*
8967  if ($this->fields[$key]['notnull'] == 1 && empty($values[$key]))
8968  {
8969  $error++;
8970  $this->errors[]=$langs->trans("ErrorFieldRequired", $this->fields[$key]['label']);
8971  }*/
8972  }
8973 
8974  $sql = 'UPDATE '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element.' SET '.implode(', ', $tmp).' WHERE rowid='.((int) $this->id);
8975 
8976  $this->db->begin();
8977  if (!$error) {
8978  $res = $this->db->query($sql);
8979  if ($res === false) {
8980  $error++;
8981  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
8982  }
8983  }
8984 
8985  // Update extrafield
8986  if (!$error) {
8987  $result = $this->insertExtraFields();
8988  if ($result < 0) {
8989  $error++;
8990  }
8991  }
8992 
8993  // Triggers
8994  if (!$error && !$notrigger) {
8995  // Call triggers
8996  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper(get_class($this)).'_MODIFY', $user);
8997  if ($result < 0) {
8998  $error++;
8999  } //Do also here what you must do to rollback action if trigger fail
9000  // End call triggers
9001  }
9002 
9003  // Commit or rollback
9004  if ($error) {
9005  $this->db->rollback();
9006  return -1;
9007  } else {
9008  $this->db->commit();
9009  return $this->id;
9010  }
9011  }
9012 
9021  public function deleteCommon(User $user, $notrigger = false, $forcechilddeletion = 0)
9022  {
9023  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::deleteCommon delete", LOG_DEBUG);
9024 
9025  $error = 0;
9026 
9027  $this->db->begin();
9028 
9029  if ($forcechilddeletion) { // Force also delete of childtables that should lock deletion in standard case when option force is off
9030  foreach ($this->childtables as $table) {
9031  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table." WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
9032  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9033  if (!$resql) {
9034  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9035  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9036  $this->db->rollback();
9037  return -1;
9038  }
9039  }
9040  } elseif (!empty($this->fk_element) && !empty($this->childtables)) { // If object has childs linked with a foreign key field, we check all child tables.
9041  $objectisused = $this->isObjectUsed($this->id);
9042  if (!empty($objectisused)) {
9043  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::deleteCommon Can't delete record as it has some child", LOG_WARNING);
9044  $this->error = 'ErrorRecordHasChildren';
9045  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9046  $this->db->rollback();
9047  return 0;
9048  }
9049  }
9050 
9051  // Delete cascade first
9052  if (is_array($this->childtablesoncascade) && !empty($this->childtablesoncascade)) {
9053  foreach ($this->childtablesoncascade as $table) {
9054  $deleteFromObject = explode(':', $table);
9055  if (count($deleteFromObject) >= 2) {
9056  $className = str_replace('@', '', $deleteFromObject[0]);
9057  $filePath = $deleteFromObject[1];
9058  $columnName = $deleteFromObject[2];
9059  $TMoreSQL = array();
9060  $more_sql = $deleteFromObject[3];
9061  if (!empty($more_sql)) {
9062  $TMoreSQL['customsql'] = $more_sql;
9063  }
9064  if (dol_include_once($filePath)) {
9065  $childObject = new $className($this->db);
9066  if (method_exists($childObject, 'deleteByParentField')) {
9067  $result = $childObject->deleteByParentField($this->id, $columnName, $TMoreSQL);
9068  if ($result < 0) {
9069  $error++;
9070  $this->errors[] = $childObject->error;
9071  break;
9072  }
9073  } else {
9074  $error++;
9075  $this->errors[] = "You defined a cascade delete on an object $childObject but there is no method deleteByParentField for it";
9076  break;
9077  }
9078  } else {
9079  $error++;
9080  $this->errors[] = 'Cannot include child class file '.$filePath;
9081  break;
9082  }
9083  } else {
9084  // Delete record in child table
9085  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table." WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
9086 
9087  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9088  if (!$resql) {
9089  $error++;
9090  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9091  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9092  break;
9093  }
9094  }
9095  }
9096  }
9097 
9098  if (!$error) {
9099  if (!$notrigger) {
9100  // Call triggers
9101  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper(get_class($this)).'_DELETE', $user);
9102  if ($result < 0) {
9103  $error++;
9104  } // Do also here what you must do to rollback action if trigger fail
9105  // End call triggers
9106  }
9107  }
9108 
9109  // Delete llx_ecm_files
9110  if (!$error) {
9111  $res = $this->deleteEcmFiles(1); // Deleting files physically is done later with the dol_delete_dir_recursive
9112  if (!$res) {
9113  $error++;
9114  }
9115  }
9116 
9117  if (!$error && !empty($this->isextrafieldmanaged)) {
9118  $result = $this->deleteExtraFields();
9119  if ($result < 0) {
9120  $error++;
9121  }
9122  }
9123 
9124  if (!$error) {
