9125  $sql = 'DELETE FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element.' WHERE rowid='.((int) $this->id);
9126 
9127  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9128  if (!$resql) {
9129  $error++;
9130  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
9131  }
9132  }
9133 
9134  // Commit or rollback
9135  if ($error) {
9136  $this->db->rollback();
9137  return -1;
9138  } else {
9139  $this->db->commit();
9140  return 1;
9141  }
9142  }
9143 
9154  public function deleteByParentField($parentId = 0, $parentField = '', $filter = array(), $filtermode = "AND")
9155  {
9156  global $user;
9157 
9158  $error = 0;
9159  $deleted = 0;
9160 
9161  if (!empty($parentId) && !empty($parentField)) {
9162  $this->db->begin();
9163 
9164  $sql = "SELECT rowid FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element;
9165  $sql .= " WHERE ".$parentField." = ".(int) $parentId;
9166 
9167  // Manage filters
9168  $sqlwhere = array();
9169  if (count($filter) > 0) {
9170  foreach ($filter as $key => $value) {
9171  if ($key == 'customsql') {
9172  $sqlwhere[] = $value;
9173  } elseif (strpos($value, '%') === false) {
9174  $sqlwhere[] = $key." IN (".$this->db->sanitize($this->db->escape($value)).")";
9175  } else {
9176  $sqlwhere[] = $key." LIKE '%".$this->db->escape($value)."%'";
9177  }
9178  }
9179  }
9180  if (count($sqlwhere) > 0) {
9181  $sql .= " AND (".implode(" ".$filtermode." ", $sqlwhere).")";
9182  }
9183 
9184  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9185  if (!$resql) {
9186  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
9187  $error++;
9188  } else {
9189  while ($obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql)) {
9190  $result = $this->fetch($obj->rowid);
9191  if ($result < 0) {
9192  $error++;
9193  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9194  } else {
9195  if (get_class($this) == 'Contact') { // TODO special code because delete() for contact has not been standardized like other delete.
9196  $result = $this->delete();
9197  } else {
9198  $result = $this->delete($user);
9199  }
9200  if ($result < 0) {
9201  $error++;
9202  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9203  } else {
9204  $deleted++;
9205  }
9206  }
9207  }
9208  }
9209 
9210  if (empty($error)) {
9211  $this->db->commit();
9212  return $deleted;
9213  } else {
9214  $this->error = implode(', ', $this->errors);
9215  $this->db->rollback();
9216  return $error * -1;
9217  }
9218  }
9219 
9220  return $deleted;
9221  }
9222 
9231  public function deleteLineCommon(User $user, $idline, $notrigger = false)
9232  {
9233  global $conf;
9234 
9235  $error = 0;
9236 
9237  $tmpforobjectclass = get_class($this);
9238  $tmpforobjectlineclass = ucfirst($tmpforobjectclass).'Line';
9239 
9240  // Call trigger
9241  $result = $this->call_trigger('LINE'.strtoupper($tmpforobjectclass).'_DELETE', $user);
9242  if ($result < 0) {
9243  return -1;
9244  }
9245  // End call triggers
9246 
9247  $this->db->begin();
9248 
9249  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element_line;
9250  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $idline);
9251 
9252  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::deleteLineCommon", LOG_DEBUG);
9253  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9254  if (!$resql) {
9255  $this->error = "Error ".$this->db->lasterror();
9256  $error++;
9257  }
9258 
9259  if (empty($error)) {
9260  // Remove extrafields
9261  $tmpobjectline = new $tmpforobjectlineclass($this->db);
9262  if (!isset($tmpobjectline->isextrafieldmanaged) || !empty($tmpobjectline->isextrafieldmanaged)) {
9263  $tmpobjectline->id = $idline;
9264  $result = $tmpobjectline->deleteExtraFields();
9265  if ($result < 0) {
9266  $error++;
9267  $this->error = "Error ".get_class($this)."::deleteLineCommon deleteExtraFields error -4 ".$tmpobjectline->error;
9268  }
9269  }
9270  }
9271 
9272  if (empty($error)) {
9273  $this->db->commit();
9274  return 1;
9275  } else {
9276  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::deleteLineCommon ERROR:".$this->error, LOG_ERR);
9277  $this->db->rollback();
9278  return -1;
9279  }
9280  }
9281 
9282 
9292  public function setStatusCommon($user, $status, $notrigger = 0, $triggercode = '')
9293  {
9294  $error = 0;
9295 
9296  $this->db->begin();
9297 
9298  $statusfield = 'status';
9299  if ($this->element == 'don' || $this->element == 'donation') {
9300  $statusfield = 'fk_statut';
9301  }
9302 
9303  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element;
9304  $sql .= " SET ".$statusfield." = ".((int) $status);
9305  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
9306 
9307  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
9308  if (!$error) {
9309  $this->oldcopy = clone $this;
9310  }
9311 
9312  if (!$error && !$notrigger) {
9313  // Call trigger
9314  $result = $this->call_trigger($triggercode, $user);
9315  if ($result < 0) {
9316  $error++;
9317  }
9318  }
9319 
9320  if (!$error) {
9321  $this->status = $status;
9322  $this->db->commit();
9323  return 1;
9324  } else {
9325  $this->db->rollback();
9326  return -1;
9327  }
9328  } else {
9329  $this->error = $this->db->error();
9330  $this->db->rollback();
9331  return -1;
9332  }
9333  }
9334 
9335 
9342  public function initAsSpecimenCommon()
9343  {
9344  global $user;
9345 
9346  $this->id = 0;
9347  $this->specimen = 1;
9348  $fields = array(
9349  'label' => 'This is label',
9350  'ref' => 'ABCD1234',
9351  'description' => 'This is a description',
9352  'qty' => 123.12,
9353  'note_public' => 'Public note',
9354  'note_private' => 'Private note',
9355  'date_creation' => (dol_now() - 3600 * 48),
9356  'date_modification' => (dol_now() - 3600 * 24),
9357  'fk_user_creat' => $user->id,
9358  'fk_user_modif' => $user->id,
9359  'date' => dol_now(),
9360  );
9361  foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
9362  if (array_key_exists($key, $this->fields)) {
9363  $this->{$key} = $value;
9364  }
9365  }
9366  return 1;
9367  }
9368 
9369 
9370  /* Part for comments */
9371 
9376  public function fetchComments()
9377  {
9378  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/comment.class.php';
9379 
9380  $comment = new Comment($this->db);
9381  $result = $comment->fetchAllFor($this->element, $this->id);
9382  if ($result < 0) {
9383  $this->errors = array_merge($this->errors, $comment->errors);
9384  return -1;
9385  } else {
9386  $this->comments = $comment->comments;
9387  }
9388  return count($this->comments);
9389  }
9390 
9396  public function getNbComments()
9397  {
9398  return count($this->comments);
9399  }
9400 
9407  public function trimParameters($parameters)
9408  {
9409  if (!is_array($parameters)) {
9410  return;
9411  }
9412  foreach ($parameters as $parameter) {
9413  if (isset($this->$parameter)) {
9414  $this->$parameter = trim($this->$parameter);
9415  }
9416  }
9417  }
9418 
9419  /* Part for categories/tags */
9420 
9431  public function getCategoriesCommon($type_categ)
9432  {
9433  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
9434 
9435  // Get current categories
9436  $c = new Categorie($this->db);
9437  $existing = $c->containing($this->id, $type_categ, 'id');
9438 
9439  return $existing;
9440  }
9441 
9454  public function setCategoriesCommon($categories, $type_categ = '', $remove_existing = true)
9455  {
9456  // Handle single category
9457  if (!is_array($categories)) {
9458  $categories = array($categories);
9459  }
9460 
9461  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setCategoriesCommon Oject Id:".$this->id.' type_categ:'.$type_categ.' nb tag add:'.count($categories), LOG_DEBUG);
9462 
9463  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
9464 
9465  if (empty($type_categ)) {
9466  dol_syslog(__METHOD__.': Type '.$type_categ.'is an unknown category type. Done nothing.', LOG_ERR);
9467  return -1;
9468  }
9469 
9470  // Get current categories
9471  $c = new Categorie($this->db);
9472  $existing = $c->containing($this->id, $type_categ, 'id');
9473  if ($remove_existing) {
9474  // Diff
9475  if (is_array($existing)) {
9476  $to_del = array_diff($existing, $categories);
9477  $to_add = array_diff($categories, $existing);
9478  } else {
9479  $to_del = array(); // Nothing to delete
9480  $to_add = $categories;
9481  }
9482  } else {
9483  $to_del = array(); // Nothing to delete
9484  $to_add = array_diff($categories, $existing);
9485  }
9486 
9487  $error = 0;
9488  $ok=0;
9489 
9490  // Process
9491  foreach ($to_del as $del) {
9492  if ($c->fetch($del) > 0) {
9493  $result=$c->del_type($this, $type_categ);
9494  if ($result < 0) {
9495  $error++;
9496  $this->error = $c->error;
9497  $this->errors = $c->errors;
9498  break;
9499  } else {
9500  $ok+=$result;
9501  }
9502  }
9503  }
9504  foreach ($to_add as $add) {
9505  if ($c->fetch($add) > 0) {
9506  $result = $c->add_type($this, $type_categ);
9507  if ($result < 0) {
9508  $error++;
9509  $this->error = $c->error;
9510  $this->errors = $c->errors;
9511  break;
9512  } else {
9513  $ok+=$result;
9514  }
9515  }
9516  }
9517 
9518  return $error ? -1 * $error : $ok;
9519  }
9520 
9529  public function cloneCategories($fromId, $toId, $type = '')
9530  {
9531  $this->db->begin();
9532 
9533  if (empty($type)) {
9534  $type = $this->table_element;
9535  }
9536 
9537  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
9538  $categorystatic = new Categorie($this->db);
9539 
9540  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."categorie_".(empty($categorystatic->MAP_CAT_TABLE[$type]) ? $type : $categorystatic->MAP_CAT_TABLE[$type])." (fk_categorie, fk_product)";
9541  $sql .= " SELECT fk_categorie, $toId FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."categorie_".(empty($categorystatic->MAP_CAT_TABLE[$type]) ? $type : $categorystatic->MAP_CAT_TABLE[$type]);
9542  $sql .= " WHERE fk_product = ".((int) $fromId);
9543 
9544  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
9545  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9546  $this->db->rollback();
9547  return -1;
9548  }
9549 
9550  $this->db->commit();
9551  return 1;
9552  }
9553 
9560  public function deleteEcmFiles($mode = 0)
9561  {
9562  global $conf;
9563 
9564  $this->db->begin();
9565 
9566  // Delete in database with mode 0
9567  if ($mode == 0) {
9568  switch ($this->element) {
9569  case 'propal':
9570  $element = 'propale';
9571  break;
9572  case 'product':
9573  $element = 'produit';
9574  break;
9575  case 'order_supplier':
9576  $element = 'fournisseur/commande';
9577  break;
9578  case 'invoice_supplier':
9579  $element = 'fournisseur/facture/'.get_exdir($this->id, 2, 0, 1, $this, 'invoice_supplier');
9580  break;
9581  case 'shipping':
9582  $element = 'expedition/sending';
9583  break;
9584  default:
9585  $element = $this->element;
9586  }
9587 
9588  // Delete ecm_files extrafields
9589  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."ecm_files_extrafields WHERE fk_object IN (";
9590  $sql .= " SELECT rowid FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."ecm_files WHERE filename LIKE '".$this->db->escape($this->ref)."%'";
9591  $sql .= " AND filepath = '".$this->db->escape($element)."/".$this->db->escape($this->ref)."' AND entity = ".((int) $conf->entity); // No need of getEntity here
9592  $sql .= ")";
9593 
9594  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
9595  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9596  $this->db->rollback();
9597  return false;
9598  }
9599 
9600  // Delete ecm_files
9601  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."ecm_files";
9602  $sql .= " WHERE filename LIKE '".$this->db->escape($this->ref)."%'";
9603  $sql .= " AND filepath = '".$this->db->escape($element)."/".$this->db->escape($this->ref)."' AND entity = ".((int) $conf->entity); // No need of getEntity here
9604 
9605  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
9606  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9607  $this->db->rollback();
9608  return false;
9609  }
9610  }
9611 
9612  // Delete in database with mode 1
9613  if ($mode == 1) {
9614  $sql = 'DELETE FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX."ecm_files_extrafields";
9615  $sql .= " WHERE fk_object IN (SELECT rowid FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."ecm_files WHERE src_object_type = '".$this->db->escape($this->table_element.(empty($this->module) ? "" : "@".$this->module))."' AND src_object_id = ".((int) $this->id).")";
9616  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9617  if (!$resql) {
9618  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9619  $this->db->rollback();
9620  return false;
9621  }
9622 
9623  $sql = 'DELETE FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX."ecm_files";
9624  $sql .= " WHERE src_object_type = '".$this->db->escape($this->table_element.(empty($this->module) ? "" : "@".$this->module))."' AND src_object_id = ".((int) $this->id);
9625  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9626  if (!$resql) {
9627  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9628  $this->db->rollback();
9629  return false;
9630  }
9631  }
9632 
9633  $this->db->commit();
9634  return true;
9635  }
9636 }
